descriptions.en:
Spawns a Heavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• Primary Weapons: 4.25x
• Special Weapons: 1.05x
• Exotic Primary Weapons: further 1.3?x on top of the Primary Multiplier (total of 5.525?⁠x)

Rocket-Assisted Sidearms count as Primary Weapons. Eriana's Vow inherits the Exotic Primary Multiplier but is still treated as a Special Weapon.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

Grants 20% Damage Resistance while overcharging a Void Grenade with Chaos Accelerant.

Grenade Hits grant 2000% [1000%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.

4 second cooldown between activations.

Charged Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.
descriptions.ko:
수류탄을 충전하는 동안:
혼돈 교환기는 20% 피해 저항을 제공합니다.

수류탄 적중 시 혼돈의 교환을 제공하고 2000% [1000%] 만큼의 수류탄 피해를 증가시키며 수류탄 재생 속도를 1.75초 만큼 줄입니다.
4초의 쿨다운이 있습니다.

충전된 소용돌이 수류탄이 착탄과 동시에 피해를 입히거나 마지막 틱으로 피해를 주면 두번 발동 할 수 있습니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你蓄力手雷时：
获得 20% 的伤害抗性。

手雷命中会触发混沌交易，为你提供 2000% [1000%] 额外基础手榴弹充能速率 1.75 秒。
触发冷却时间 4 秒。

如果敌人被蓄力漩涡手雷的初始爆炸和最后几次伤害命中，则可以触发两次混沌交易。

descriptions.en:
On Class Ability Usage with 1|2+ Mods equipped:
Collects Orbs of Power within 12.5|18.5 meters.

Also collects Motes of Light in Gambit as well as Crests in Supremacy.

Weapon or Grenade Kills grant a Stacking Damage Buff and 20 Handling for 4.5 seconds. Grenade Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly.

Damage Buff at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%
descriptions.es:
Bajas con el arma o una granada otorgan:
20 Manejo y Aumento de Daño acumulable, durante 4.5 segundos

El bufo se renueva con cada baja. Baja con granada otorga la maxima cantidad de Daño



Aumentado: La duracion del bufo aumenta a 5 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
当使用武器或手雷完成击杀时：
+20 操控性，并且获得一个可叠加的伤害增益，持续 4.5 秒。

增益持续时间可在击杀时刷新。手雷击杀直接获得 5 层增益。

descriptions.en:
Increases Kinetic Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While within 15 metres of an ally:
Grants a Stack of Nano-Munitions every 3 seconds, up to the maximum of 7. Consuming a Stack restarts the timer.

Consumes a Stack upon emptying the magazine to refill 25% of it.

Readying a Power Weapon removes all Stacks.

After Aiming Down Sights for 🡅1.4 seconds without firing, for one shot:
• 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 1 (e.g. 1.5x🠚2.5x)

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active. (This part of the perk is inconsistent and often doesn't get applied)

🡅 Activation time is reduced by 0.1 seconds.

Special Ammo Finder Bricks you create also spawn a copy for your allies.

Ammo Bricks spawned this way grant 27.5%|60% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2 Mods equipped.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a 20% [15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.
Loads 2 Ammo at a time.
descriptions.zh-chs:
每次填装两发弹药。
-35 填装速度。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant Stacks of Sword Logic.

The number of Stacks and the buff duration are tied to the highest [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) killed since activation:
• Minors: 1 Stack for 5.5 seconds
• Elites, Players: 2 Stacks for 7.5 seconds
• Minibosses and Players in their Super: 3 Stacks for 10.5 seconds
• Bosses: 4 Stacks for 15.5 seconds

Damage increase at 1|2|3|4 Stacks:
15% | 25% [20%] | 35% | 50%

Additional Kills refresh the buff duration to the duration tied to the highest Enemy Rank killed.

Remains active while stowed.

The next Weapon Kill within 10 seconds of using your Class Ability spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.

10|5|1 second cooldown between activations with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Hits and Kills with your Weapon grant you 'Points'. Hitting Point thresholds grants Stacks of Field Test.

Maximum of 5 Stacks. Buff is only removed on death.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 3 | 6 | 9 | 12 | 20 Range
• 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 50 Reload Speed
• ? | ? | ? | ? | 30? Stability
• ? | ? | ? | ? | ? Handling
• 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 55 Charge Rate (Swords)
• 5 | 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 Guard Resistance (Swords)

Points required for 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• Primary Weapons: 51|151|351|651|1001
• Special Weapons: 26|76|176|326|501
• Power Weapons: 11|31|71|131|201

Each Hit grants 1 Point regardless of Weapon Archetype and Enemy Rank. Does not require Direct Hits.

Points granted by Kills are based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1-2 Minors: 1 Point
• Tier 3-4 Minors, Tier 2+ Elites, and higher: 4 Points
• Tier 1 Elites: 5 Points
• Enemy Players: 10 Points

Kill Point Multipliers by Weapon Archetype:
• Primary Weapons and Shotguns: 5x
• Breech-Loaded Grenade Launchers: 2x

Grants the following benefits for your first shot (of the burst) after 3.1 seconds of not firing the weapon:
• 20 Aim Assist and 25 Range
• 5% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 10% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

Special weapons only receive 50% of the benefits. Stats are rounded up.
descriptions.zh-chs:
第一发子弹:
•  +20 瞄准辅助
•  +25 射程
•  -5% 精度锥角尺寸
•  -10% 精度锥角增长

开火后触发 3.1 秒冷却时间。

descriptions.en: Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Passively grants the Overload Shot buff to Rocket Launchers without an intrinsic Breaker Type and increases their damage against Overload Champions by 80%.

Rocket Launchers without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Overload Shots/effects apply Disruption for 6.5 [5] seconds. Applying Disruption stuns Overload Champions and prevents them from regenerating health for the duration of the effect.

Disruption decreases damage dealt by PvE Combatants by 25%. It also decreases Melee, Grenade, and Class Ability regeneration speeds by 40% in PvP.

Breaking a PVE Combatant's Shield with a Stasis or Strand Weapon has a chance to Freeze (if Stasis Weapon) or Suspend (if Strand Weapon) them.

Wearing seasonal armor improves the chances of the perk triggering.
Killing a Frozen PVE Combatant spawns a Stasis Crystal close to the target's location. Bosses spawn 2 Crystals.
Dealing Solar Ability Damage to Bosses and Champions Weakens them for 6 seconds.
Picking up an Orb of Power grants Unraveling Rounds for 7 [5] seconds.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Solar Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles, Eyes of Tomorrow, and Two-Tailed Fox do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Class Ability Usage changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Splits off 50% of the Weapon's Bodyshot damage into an Explosive damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PvE and isn't affected by damage Falloff.

[PvE] Total damage is increased by 15% of the weapon's Bodyshot damage. For crits, the overall increase is roughly equal to 15% divided by the Crit Multiplier.

[PvP] Don't want to talk about it.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13
descriptions.zh-chs: 此武器的持续伤害会在 5 [3] 秒内降低目标 10% 的伤害输出。

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13
Finishers with no active Armor Charge Stacks grant 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Onslaught for 4.5 seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Benefits at 1|2|3 Stacks of Onslaught:
• 16% | 28% | 37% decreased Firing Delay
• 15 | 25 | 35 Reload Speed

Grants the following to Strand Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants the following to Arc Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon scoring a Precision Kill or 3 kills within 3 seconds of each:
Spawns a Threadling on Enemy Death Location.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Void or Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

'Multi-Dodge Ready' appears on the Buff List while within 15 meters of an enemy.

Dodging while Multi-Dodge is ready allows you to chain dodges infinitely for 6 seconds. Kills extend the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 11 seconds.

Multi-Dodge Dodges don't activate:
• Winter's Shroud and Threaded Specter Aspects
• Dynamo, Bomber, Outreach, and Distribution Armor Mods

Ensnaring Slam removes the buff after one usage.

Finishing a reload overfills the Magazine from reserves by 10% of the Base Magazine Capacity (rounded up) for each ally within 15 meters.

Overfill amount maxes out at 50%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内每有一名盟友：
填装时会过量填充 10% 的弹匣，最高 50%。

descriptions.en:
On Precision Kill:
Spawns a Large Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.

[Tier 1-2 Minor](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants only spawn a Medium Stasis Crystal.

5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准击杀时：
在目标附近生成一块冰影水晶。
普通敌人生成中型水晶，高阶敌人生成大型水晶。

生成 5 块水晶后将进入 5 秒冷却。

descriptions.en:
Powered Hits grant 3% increased damage for 🡅4 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Buff.

Blocking removes all stacks.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Missing has a chance to refund 1 ammo into the magazine based on the ammo type:
• Primary Weapons: 🡅40%
• Special and Power Weapons: 🡅25%

🡅 Ammo Refund chance is increased by an additive 5%.

Upon scoring a set percentage of the Magazine Capacity as hits within ? seconds of each:
Fires a Tracking Rocket that matches Weapon's Elemental Damage Type.

Rockets deal 22.4 [14] impact and 24 [15] explosive damage on hit and inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling). On non-primary weapons, the rockets receive and additional damage increase.

% of Magazine Capacity as hits required and the Additional Damage Increase by weapon archetype:
• Hand Cannons, Pulse Rifles, Submachine Guns: 45% Magazine Capacity \\ 0% increased damage (Baseline)
• Sniper Rifles: 50%? \\ 100%
• Grenade Launchers: 30% \\ 25%
• Machine Guns: 25% \\ 50%
• Fusion Rifles, Shotguns: ?% \\ 150%

Further hits do not provide activation progress for 1 second after activation.

Precision Kills cause targets to explode, dealing up to 123.89 [95.3] elemental damage in a 4.5 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Increases damage against shielded targets:
• 125% increase against PVE Combatant (Over)Shields
• 50% increase against Barrier Champion Shields
• 20% increase against Player Overshields and for bodyshots against Players with Woven Mail

Combatant Shields include Elemental Shields, and Lucent Moth/Shadow Legion [Tech Pack](https://www.destinypedia.com/Tech_Pack) Overshields.

🡅 Damage Buff is increased.

Scoring 2 to 3 Stasis Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of Stasis Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds. Further Stasis Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard with a cooldown matching Towering Barricade's.

On Glacial Guard Cast:
• Grants Shielded buff for 20 seconds
• Grants the maximum 4 Stack of Weapon Surge
• Applies 40 Slow Stacks to PVE Combatants within 7 meters

Shielded:
• Grants a 100 HP Overshield that provides 62.5% Damage Resistance in PVE (breaking this overshield removes the buff)
• Prevents sprinting, using jump abilities, and sliding
• Cannot regain Class Ability Energy while active
• Taking damage refreshes the buff duration
• Class Ability activation removes the buff
descriptions.ko:
방벽을 빙하의 방비로 변환합니다.

빙하의 방비 시전 시:
7미터 이내에 있는 적들에게 감속 스택 40개를 부여합니다.

보호막은 20초 동안 지속되며 100HP의 체력을 가지고 있습니다. 62.5% 피해 감소를 부여합니다.
보호막의 지속 시간은 피해를 입으면 초기화되며 질주, 직업 점프, 그리고 슬라이딩을 봉인합니다.

보호막이 지속되는 동안 직업 능력 에너지는 재생되지 않습니다.
빙하의 방비가 활성화 된 상태에서 방벽을 사용하면 효과가 해제됩니다.

descriptions.en:
Glaive Melee Kills load 1 Ammo into the Magazine from reserves. Can overfill the Magazine up to double the normal capacity.

While within 15 meters of 3+ enemies:
Grants 50 Reload Speed and 100% Increased Melee Damage to Glaives.

On Projectile Kills with Glaives Matching your Subclass Element:
Enemies explode, dealing up to 350 [101] damage in a 4? meter radius.

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine (rounds up) and grants 🡅25 Range and Stability for your next shot within 2.5 seconds.

Only active for the first shot (of the burst).

0.3 second cooldown after activation but can activate multiple times during a slide.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 5?.

Grants the following benefits if you have not dealt or received damage in the last 5 seconds:
• 20 Range and 20 Handling
• 15% decreased Draw Time on Bows
• 10.78% increased damage against PvE Combatants. Linear Fusion Rifles only receive an 8.88% damage increase.

Deactivates 2 seconds after exchanging damage.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Precision Hits decrease Draw Time by 25% for 3 seconds.
descriptions.es:
En tiros de Precision:
Reduce en un 25% el tiempo de tensado durante 3 segundos

Aumentado: Aumenta la duracion del bufo a 4 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准命中时：
-25% 蓄力时间，持续 3 秒。

descriptions.en:
As you drop from 113 HP to critical health:
Linearly grants up to 100 Reload Speed and a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier.
descriptions.zh-chs:
低于 113 生命值时：
最高 +100 填装速度，0.9x 填装动画系数

根据生命值降低而线性提升增益效果。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following for 7 seconds upon breaking an enemy's shield or destroying a [Vehicle or Construct](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• 40 Reload Speed
• ?x Draw Time Multiplier

Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants Peregrine Strike after sprinting for 2 seconds and being airborne for 0.5 seconds. Buff is removed upon touching the ground.

Peregrine Strike increases the Impact Damage of Shoulder Charge Abilities by 225%.

Against [Minibosses](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) (inlcuding Champions and Tormentors), the buff is increased to 1000% and refunds your Melee Ability charge on hit.

Provides no benefits when hitting Frozen enemies.

On Powered Melee or Finisher Kills:
Grants Void Invisibility and restores Health, with Finishers providing a greater benefit to both.

Invisibility Duration and restored Health are based on the [rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the defeated target. Echo of Persistence increases Invisibility duration by 41.5%.

Invisibility|Health granted on Powered Melee Kills:
• Minors: 6.8 seconds | 100 HP
• Elites, Enemy Players: 9.8s | ? HP
• Minibosses: 12.8s | ? HP
• Bosses: 13.3s | 200 HP

Invisibility|Health granted on Finisher Kills:
• Minors: 9.8 seconds | ? HP
• Elites: 12.7 seconds | 200 HP
• Minibosses: 15.8 seconds | 200 HP
• Bosses: ? seconds | ? HP
descriptions.zh-chs:
充能近战击杀获得虚空隐身，并恢复 [?] 生命值。
（终结技的效果更显著）

隐身持续时间（使用终结技的效果）：
普通敌人 = 6.8 秒（9.8）
精英敌人/守护者 = 9.8 秒 （12.7）
次级首领 = 12.8 秒 （15.8）
首领 = 13.3 秒

坚韧回声可增加 41.5% 虚空隐身的持续时间。

首领和载具无法被终结。

descriptions.en:
Upon sliding after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds with your Class Ability fully charged:
Projects a 180° frontal shield that reflects all incoming projectiles for 0.45 seconds.

Reflected projectiles deal 50% increased damage.

After shield deactivation, 2% Class Ability energy is drained for every point of damage reflected.

Currently partially bugged and does not drain Class Ability Energy for projectiles reflected at the end of your slide.
descriptions.ko:
적어도 1.5초 이상 질주한 뒤 슬라이드 할 시:
투사체를 반사하고 피해를 무력화하는 180도의 정면 방어막을 생성합니다.

슬라이드 거리를 33% 증가시킵니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后滑行：
产生一个 180° 的正面护盾，可以反弹伤害和弹道。

滑行距离增加33%。

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple Hits against enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy. Does not require Direct Hits.

Hit requirements for activation:
• Bows: 5 Hits
• Swords: 10 Hits
• Grenade Launchers: 12? Hits
• Other: 67% of Magazine Size rounded down + 2

Precision Hits grants 1 Stack of Rapid Hit for 2 seconds. Further Precision Hits refresh the duration.

Benefits at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 2|12|14|18|25 Stability
• 5|30|35|42|60 Reload Speed
• 0.99x|0.96x|0.95x|0.945x|0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs: 每次精准命中获得 1 层增益，获得填装速度和稳定性提升，持续 2 秒。

descriptions.en:
While Magazine is at or above maximum capacity:
Grants 25% increased damage and causes enemies to explode on death, dealing 444 [162.5] damage in a ? meter radius.

Passively grants 30 Magazine Size stat. (Identical to Extended Mag)

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

While Crouched:
• 30 Handling and 20 Stability
• -40% Accuracy Cone Size
• -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
• -80% horizontal Recoil

Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
+30 操控性，+20 稳定性， -40% 精度锥角尺寸，-17% 精度锥角增长, -80% 横向后座力。

该特性对融合步枪的效果减半。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Rampage for 🡅5 seconds. Buff remains active while stowed.

Damage increase at 1|2|3 Stacks: 10%|21%|33.1%

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

While Aiming Down Sights with Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to a longer, more powerful burst.

While Aiming Down Sights with Arc Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Grants the following to Solar Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

After scoring a kill or multiple Precision Hits within 5 seconds of each with a different weapon:
Grants the 'Cascade Point Ready' buff for 5 seconds.

Readying the weapon while Cascade Point Ready is active reduces Firing Delay for 🡅2.75 seconds.

Firing Delay is reduced by 30% on SMGs and Machine Guns and by 40% on other archetypes.

Activation progress on Precision Hits:
• Bows, Linear Fusion/Sniper Rifles, Shotguns: 50%
• Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Scout Rifles: 17.5%
• Auto/Trace/Pulse Rifles, SMGs, Machine Guns: 8%

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.25 seconds.

Direct Weapon Hits grants a Stack of Precision Instrument for 1.25 seconds (2.1 seconds on Bows). Maximum of 6 Stacks. Missing removes all Stacks.

Precision Damage Increase at 1|2|... Stacks:
🡅5% | 10% | 15% | 20% | 25% | 30%

🡅 Precision Damage Buff is increased by 20%.

1 second after stowing Stasis Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

While at/above 50% of the Base Magazine Capacity:
Direct Hits apply 40 Slow Stacks for 4 [1.5] seconds (8 [2] with Whisper of Durance) to enemies within 4 meters.

Only activates once per shot/burst.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grants the following on Weapon Kills for 5 seconds:
• 15% increased damage
• Maximized Movement Speed

Remains active even if stowed.
descriptions.es:
En baja con Espada:
Aumento de 15% al Daño, y pone a la velocidad de movimiento hacia adelante a 9 metros por segundo durante [?] segundos

Se mantiene activo al guardar la espada

Mejorado: Aumenta la duración del bufo a [?] segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
当刀剑击杀时：
提高 15% 伤害，增加移动和冲刺速度，增加挥舞刀剑的前冲距离，持续 [?] 秒。

武器收起时依然生效。

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13
Powered Melee Hits make you and allies within 8 meters Radiant for 8 seconds (12 with Ember of Solace).

Targets killed by Solar Supers Ignite and spawn a Firesprite at their location.

Deadshot Golden Gun refunds 1 ammo per kill.

Note: Well of Radiance makes all of the caster's Weapon Damage count as Super Ability Damage so Solar Weapons Kills will also count as Solar Super Kills.

Solar Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Ember of Tempering for 8 seconds to you and allies within 12.5 meters.

Ember of Tempering grants the following benefits:
• 10|20|30 Recovery at 1|2|3 Stacks
• 20 Airborne Effectiveness
• Solar Weapon Kills spawn a Firesprite

Ignitions apply 40 Scorch Stacks (60 with Ember of Ashes) to enemies damaged by the explosion.

Does not apply to the Ignited enemy.

Applying certain buffs to allies grants 400% Additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Regeneration Rate for 6 [3] seconds.

Activation Triggers:
• Granting the Cure, Radiant, or Restoration Solar subclass buffs to allies
• Healing (from most sources), or reviving allies

Will NOT trigger Ember of Benevolence:
Empowering Rifts, Mods, Crest of Alpha Lupi's Healing Pulse, and Aeon Sect of Vigor's Healing

Grants 300% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate for 3 seconds upon applying Scorch to enemies.

Will not activate if the enemy dies from the hit that would have applied Scorch.

Solar Kills extend the duration of Restoration and Radiant effects up to the maximum of 15 seconds.

Time added based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 2 seconds
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 3s
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites, Enemy Players: 4s
• T4 Minors, T3 Elies, and higher: 8s

Solar Super projectiles home in on enemies.

Only affects Blade Barrage and Daybreak projectiles.

Restoration and Radiant effects applied to you last 50% longer.

Specific increases from Ember of Solace for Restoration and Radiant sources can be found in their descriptions.

Ignition Kills grant Grenade Energy based on the [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the killed targets:
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 8%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 12.25%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 16.5%
• Players: 20.75%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

Successive Hits within 0.2 seconds of each grant a ramping Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits (20% on SMGs). Missing deactivates the buff.

Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the buff [ramps up with each shot](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) once active. Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.

% of the Magazine Capacity as Hits required for each Visual Stack: 12.5%|35.5%|54.5%|74.5%|110.33%

All thresholds are increased by 60% for Submachine Guns, initially triggering at 20% and maxing out at 176.53%.

Damage Buff ramps up from 16.73% [10.46%] to 40% [25%] upon reaching maximum strength.

Assuming no missed shots, it provides roughly a 25% [15.85%] [Damage Buff on average](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) after firing 100% of the Magazine.
Radar immediately returns once no longer Aiming Down Sights. (Normally takes 1.5 seconds)

Grants Grenade Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Grenade Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a 20% [15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Fusion Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and detonate on impact, stunning Unstoppable Champions.

Fusion Grenade Kills refund Grenade Energy based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 25%
• Elites: 50%
• Players, Minibosses, Bosses: 100%
descriptions.ko:
융합 수류탄에 장거리 투하를 기본으로 제공하며 융합 수류탄이 탄착하는 순간 폭발합니다.

융합 수류탄 처치 시 수류탄 에너지를 반환합니다.
부하급 (빨간 체력)은 25%를 반환합니다.
리더급 (노란 체력)은 50%를 반환합니다.
보스급과 수호자는 100%를 반환합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
让融合手雷自带快速投掷能力，并且在撞击物体时爆炸。

使用融合手雷击杀敌人可以获得手雷能量。
对于普通敌人，获得25%的能量；
对于精英敌人，获得50%的能量；
对于守护者、次级首领、首领，获得100%的能量。

descriptions.en:
Finisher and (Glaive) Melee Kills grant a Stack of Burning Fists up to the maximum of 5 Stacks.

After not having scored further Finisher or (Glaive) Melee Kills for 2 seconds, your Stacks start decaying one at a time over 9.5|10|4|4|3 seconds for the 1st|...|5th Stacks.

Damage Buff at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• Melee: 55%|110%|165%|220%|275%
• Glaive Melee: 40%|80%|120%|160%|200%
• Weapon, PVE: 0%|20%|25%|30%|35%
• Weapon, PVP: 0%|0%|20%|25%|25%

Weapon damage increases are [Empowering Buffs](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs).
descriptions.zh-chs:
近战击杀后获得“燃烧之拳”：
“燃烧之拳”持续 5 秒，提供额外近战伤害，可叠加 5 层。

额外近战伤害：
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%

descriptions.en:
Grants an extra Scatter Grenade Ability Charge.

Scatter Grenades receive Chaos Accelerant's Tracking Bonus.
Does not stack with Chaos Accelerant's Bonus.

Being within 15 meters of 2 Allies grants 20% increased Precision Damage.

🡅 Grants 10 Handling while the perk is active.

Reviving Allies or performing Finishers prepares an Emergency Reload.

Emergency Reload refills the Magazine the next time it is emptied.

Refills magazine from reserves on (Glaive) Melee Kills.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

While Aiming Down Sights and targeting an Enemy:
Fired Rockets track the targeted enemy. Diminshed effectiveness in PVP.

Tracking persists for 1 second once no longer aiming at the enemy.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Blast Radius.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants 10% Damage Resist upon reaching Critical Health while at 3 or more Stacks Armor Charge and consumes all Armor Charges.

Buff lasts 6|9|12|15 seconds with 3|4|5|6 Stack of Armor Charge consumed.

Upon readying the weapon after scoring Kills with your other Weapons:
Refills and/or overfills the Magazine from reserves based on the amount of Weapon Kills scored.

Maximum total overfill amount is 200% of the Magazine Capacity. Each activation can only load up to 100% of the Magazine Capacity into the magazine.

Loaded ammo per Kill by ammo type (rounds up):
• Primary Weapons: 🡅12.5% of Magazine Capacity
• Special and Power Weapons: 🡅22.5%

🡅 Laded ammo per Kill is increased by 2.5% of the Magazine Capacity (e.g. 10%⁠🠚⁠12.5%).

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload and will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.

Upon readying the weapon within 3 seconds of getting a Kill with a different weapon:
Grants 20% increased damage and 15 Handling for 7 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用其他武器达成最后一击后 3 秒内切换到该武器：

+20% 伤害，+15 操控性，持续 7 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Upon dealing Melee damage while an Enemy is within 15 meters:
Grants 500% [100%] increased damage and 100 Handling for the next full burst within 10 seconds.

4 second cooldown after buff expires. Can be activated while stowed.

Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate the perk.
descriptions.zh-chs:
对 15 米范围内的敌人造成近战伤害后：
提升 500% [100%] 伤害，并 +100 操控性，持续 10 秒或直到下次射击。

4 秒冷却时间。武器在收起时也可触发。

需要冲刺或滑行的充能近战以及弹道猛击均不会触发该特性。

descriptions.en:
After dealing Non-Precision Weapon damage:
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 0.1175
• 10 Aim Assist

Buff lasts 0.55 seconds. Dealing additional Non-Precision damage refreshes the timer.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器造成非精准伤害后：
0.55 秒内 +8% 伤害，+[?] 瞄准辅助。
造成非精准伤害将刷新计时器。

descriptions.en:
Every 🡅3.5 seconds while not firing the weapon:
Loads 10% of the Magazine Capacity (rounded up) into the Magazine from reserves.

Can overfill the Magazine up to double the normal capacity.

🡅 Loading delay is decreased by 0.5 seconds.
Increases Shotgun Pellet Spread by 7.5%
descriptions.zh-chs: +7.5% 霰弹枪弹片散布。

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Void Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Elemental Kills grant 1 Stack of Recombination. Maximum of 10 Stacks.

Each Stack additively increases the damage of the next shot by 10% [5%], up to 100% [50%] at 10 Stacks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
元素最后一击时：
获得 1 层增益，提升此武器的下一击伤害。

最高叠加 10 层。

伤害提升数值（%）

descriptions.en:
Intrinsically grants Fastball to all grenades.

Enhances Tripmine Grenades:
• 14% increased Explosion damage
• Explosion Length and Width are increased to 14 meters
• Explosions don't have any damage falloff
• Explosion no longer deals self-damage
• Last 20 seconds longer (10s🠚30s)
• Grants Tripmine Grenades 70 HP
• Solar Ability Kills recharge 33% Grenade Energy with a 0.3 second cooldown
descriptions.zh-chs:
让手雷自带快速投掷能力。

增强感应手雷：
• 爆炸伤害增加 14%。爆炸的长度和宽度增加到 14 米。
• 爆炸不再造成自我伤害，并且没有伤害衰减。
• 持续 30 秒。(10s -> 30s)
• 将感应手雷的耐久度提高到 100 生命值，并有 50% 的伤害抵抗。

烈日技能伤害可为感应手雷充能 33%。
骨灰余烬可让感应手雷算作 2 次烈日技能伤害。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness, 100 Handling and 100 Reload Speed to Sidearms.

Upon readying a Sidearm while at Critical Health:
• Refills the Magazine of the Sidearm from reserves
• Grants 100% [10%] increased damage until you are no longer at Critical Health, after which it has a 5 second duration

Sidearm Kills extend the buff duration by 3 seconds (capped at 5 seconds) and refill your Magazine from reserves.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing extremely close to the barricade also consistently prevents enemy melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Performs an quick first-person dash, moving 8 meters in your current input direction.

Not inputting a movement direction results in a 4 meter backwards dash.

Only usable while on the ground.

Grants 1|2 Stacks while within 15 meters of 1|2+ enemies.

Bonuses at 1|2 Stacks:
• 🡅19|🡅44 Stability
• 🡅19|🡅63 Reload Speed
• 25|100 Handling
• 0.9x|0.81x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier

🡅 Grants 4? more stability when active as well as 1|3 more Reload Speed at 1|2 Stacks.

Breaking an enemy shield transfers one bullet from reserves. Breaking a combatant shield—or the shield of a Guardian using a Super—with that shield's energy type grants bonus damage for the rest of the magazine.

On Weapon Kill, for 8.5 seconds:
Grants 100 Handling and a 0.825x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier to all weapons.

Additional kills while the perk is active refresh the duration to 6.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
所有武器 +100 操控性，0.825x 操控动画系数，持续8.5 秒。

该增益持续时间可以刷新，最长 6.5 秒。

descriptions.en:
Aiming Down Sights grants 10% increased Effective Zoom and 5% faster Projectile Speed.

The Effective Zoom increase pushes out Aim Assist Falloff by 10%, reduces Recoil by 10% and narrows the Accuracy and Aim Assist Cones by the same amount. (This is the normal behavior of Zoom and isn't unique to Rangefinder)

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Killing multiple enemies within 3? seconds of each grants 6.25% increased Sprint Speed for 10 seconds. Remains active while stowed.

Activation progress by [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
Minors: 34% | Players, Elites, and higher: 100%

Duration is not refreshable. Stacks with other Sprint Speed buffs up to the cap of a 12.5% increase.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器 3 秒内击败多个目标：
提升冲刺速度，持续 10 秒。

持续时间无法被刷新。

最高冲刺速度为初始值的 112.5%。

守护者、强力战斗人员、高价值目标会更快地触发此增益。

descriptions.en:
After sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
Grants 35 ADS and Ready Handling while sprinting.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Solar or Stasis Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Swords are granted 30|50|60 Charge Rate with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Glaive Projectile Hits grant 20%|30%|35% Increased Weapon Energy. (Stacks additively with Immovable Object)

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Arc Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles, Swords, and Grand Overture.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles and Wardcliff Coil do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Weapon Kills grant 🡅11% Melee Ability Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant 🡅22%.

Dealing Melee Damage grants 35 Handling for 3 seconds.

🡅 Melee Ability Energy gains are increased by 10%. (e.g. 10%🠚11%)

Grants 40% [5%] Damage Resist while within 10 meters of a Frozen Enemy or a Friendly Crystal.

Lingers for 0.65 seconds once no longer in range.

Receiving damage from an enemy grants 5% Grenade Energy. Being at Critical Health increases this to 10%.

1 second cooldown between activations.

Grants Melee Energy once per second while within 15 meters of 2+ Enemies:
• 2 Enemies: 2.5% Melee Energy per second
• 3+ Enemies: 5% Melee Energy per second

Powered Melee Hits grant 40 Handling for 5 seconds and refill all weapons from reserves.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Melee Ability Charge.

Void Invisibility grants 50% [10%] Damage Resist.

Cloaking allies grants them the same Damage Resist benefits and refunds 50% Melee Ability Energy per ally made invisible.

Damage Resistance does not apply while in Super.

Spawns a Heavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• Primary Weapons: 4.25x
• Special Weapons: 1.05x
• Exotic Primary Weapons: further 1.3?x on top of the Primary Multiplier (total of 5.525?⁠x)

Rocket-Assisted Sidearms count as Primary Weapons. Eriana's Vow inherits the Exotic Primary Multiplier but is still treated as a Special Weapon.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

Direct Weapon Hits grants a Stack of Precision Instrument for 1.25 seconds (2.1 seconds on Bows). Maximum of 6 Stacks. Missing removes all Stacks.

Precision Damage Increase at 1|2|... Stacks:
4.17% | 8.33% | 12.5% | 16.67% | 20.83% | 25%

Weapon Kills grant a stacking Damage Buff until stowing or reloading the weapon. Maximum of 3 stacks.

PVE: 10% | 20% | 30% increased damage
PVP: 5% | 10% | 15% increased damage
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
增加伤害，直到收枪或换弹。

[PVE] 10% | 20% | 30% 伤害
[PVP] 5% | 10% | 15% 伤害

descriptions.en:
Applying an Elemental Debuff (with the exception of Weaken) grants the following benefits for 🡅5 seconds:
• 50? Reload Speed and 20 Aim Assist
• 20% decreased ADS Movement Speed Penalty

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Refills 50% of the Magazine from reserves upon breaking Elemental, Barrier Champion, or Player Shields.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13

Passively grants ? Reload Speed and 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Shotguns.

While Void Overshield is active:
• Shotguns deal 35% [10%] increased damage ([Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs))
• Shotgun Kills refresh Void Overshield duration

While on a Void Subclass:
Scoring 2 Shotgun Kills on [Minor Combatants](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) or 1 Shotgun Kill on other targets grants a Void Overshield and starts health regeneration.

Scoring 3 Precision Hits within 🡅3 seconds of each refills 1 Ammo into the Magazine from thin air.

Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.

🡅 Allowed time between Precision Hits is increased by 1 second.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Kinetic Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 2% with Forerunner.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.
Grants 10 Aim Assist while Aiming Down Sights (ADS) and decreases ADS Movement Speed Penalty by 10%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准时：
+10 瞄准辅助，-2.5% 瞄准移动速度惩罚。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability Usage reloads all equipped weapons from reserves and grants the Wraithmetal Mail buff for 9 seconds at the end of the dodge animation.

Counts as a manual reload and will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Wraithmetal Mail:
• Grants 50 Mobility
• Sets Handling and Reload Speed to 100
• Grants a 0.7x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier
• Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
• Increases Slide Distance by 33%

Hits with Arc Staff grant a Stack of 'Synapse Junctions' for 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 3 Stacks.

Damage increases | Passive Super Drain decreases:
• Synapse Junctions x1: 13.5% | ?%
• Synapse Junctions x2: 28.8% | ?%
• Synapse Junctions x3: 46.2% | ?%

Arcbolt Grenades can chain an additional time (3🠚4) and now apply Disruption.

Triggering Jolt damage grants ?% Arcbolt Grenade Ability Energy.

Ionic Trace Pickups grant additional Arcbolt Grenade Ability Energy.
descriptions.ko:
전기화살 수류탄으로 적중한 적 당 25%의 수류탄 에너지가 반환됩니다.

전기화살 수류탄이 4번 까지 이어집니다.

descriptions.en:
While above 50% Magazine Capacity:
🡅55 Reload Speed with a 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier.

🡅 Reload Speed bonus is increased by 5.

While on an Arc Subclass:
Receiving or dealing Melee damage grants 'Cross Counter' for 3 seconds or until scoring a Melee Hit.

Cross Counter grants 200% increased Melee damage and restores ? HP on Melee Hits.

The Melee damage buff is decreased to 80% when combined with the One-Two Punch perk.
descriptions.ko:
전기질주자 한정입니다.
근접 피해를 입거나 입히면 3초간 크로스 카운터가 활성화되며 근접 피해를 입히면 해제됩니다.

크로스 카운터는 근접 피해를 200% 증가시키며 근접 공격 적중 시 체력을 회복시킵니다.

크로스 카운터가 활성화 된 동안 원투 펀치의 위력은 80%로 줄어듭니다.

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills trigger an elemental explosion that deals up to 84 [56] damage in a 3 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

🡅 Passively grants 20 Inventory Size (identical to one Reserves Mod). Swords receive 20 Guard Endurance instead.

On Weapon Kill, for 6 seconds:
37.5% decreased Charge/Draw Time.

Kills while the perk active add 🡅5 seconds to the duration up to a maximum of 20 seconds.

🡅 Additional kills add 1 more second to the duration.

Powered Melee and Finisher Kills disorient and debuff enemies in a given radius around the target, increasing damage received by them by 30%.

Screen becomes fully blackened for 7.5 seconds upon getting hit by the debuff before gradually fading away over the next 7.5 seconds. (HUD remains unobstructed)

The debuff Duration and application radius are dependent on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 15 meter radius, 10 second duration
• Elites, Players: 20m radius, 15s duration
• Minibosses, Bosses: 25m radius, 20s duration
(Still requires retesting, will update once complete)

Finishers increase the debuff duration by 5 seconds, up to the maximum of 20 seconds. Applying Weaken to the target extends the debuff's duration.
descriptions.ko:
근접 공격 처치와 필살기 처치가 적을 실명시키고 30%의 추가 피해를 받게하는 폭발을 일으킵니다.
지속 시간과 폭발 반경은 적의 등급에 따라 결정됩니다.

적 등급은 부하/리더/미니보스/보스입니다.
필살기를 사용하면 지속 시간이 5초 추가됩니다. 수호자는 리더 취급입니다.

전쟁군주의 최후
폭발 범위: 폭심지로 부터 10/15/20/25 미터
지속 시간: 5/10/15/20 초
필살기를 사용했을 떄의 지속 시간: 10/15/20 초
descriptions.zh-chs:
充能近战击杀和终结技会在敌人周围施加削弱效果（+30% 承受伤害）和致盲效果。
持续时间和范围取决于敌人的等级。

击杀敌方守护者视为精英的效果。首领无法被终结。

descriptions.en:
Finishing a reload within 5.2 seconds of a Precision Kill reduces Firing Delay by 30% for 🡅7 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

Grants 30|50|60 Strength with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants the following to Solar Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Reduces Incoming Stasis Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Weapon Kills grant Stacks of Sword Logic.

The number of Stacks and the buff duration are tied to the highest [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) killed since activation:
• Minors: 1 Stack for 5.5 seconds
• Elites, Players: 2 Stacks for 7.5 seconds
• Minibosses and Players in their Super: 3 Stacks for 10.5 seconds
• Bosses: 4 Stacks for 15.5 seconds

Damage increase at 1|2|3|4 Stacks:
15% | 25% [20%] | 35% | 50%

Additional Kills refresh the buff duration to the duration tied to the highest Enemy Rank killed.

Remains active while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants more than 29 meters away by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

While above 50% Magazine Capacity:
50 Reload Speed with a 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier.
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣内子弹量高于 50% 时：
+50 装填速度，装填动画时间缩减为 0.95x。

descriptions.en:
After sprinting for 3 seconds:
Grants 20 Reload Speed for 3 seconds. Duration can be refreshed by sprinting.

Being Amplified increases the bonus to 60 Reload Speed.

Grants 30|50|60 Resilience with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Solar Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles, Eyes of Tomorrow, and Two-Tailed Fox do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.
Decreases charge time by 40ms and damage by 2%.
descriptions.es: Reduce en 40ms el tiempo de carga y reduce daño en 2%
descriptions.zh-chs: -40ms 充能时间，-2% 伤害。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant 10% Melee Ability Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant 20%.

Dealing Melee Damage grants 35 Handling for 3 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
 主武器和  重武器击杀可获取 10% 近战技能能量。
大多数  特殊武器获取 20% 能量。

偃月、追踪步枪、榴弹发射器相较其他特殊武器，仅获得一半能量。

使用近战技能造成伤害获得 +35 操控性，持续 3 秒。将 重新装填 弹匣。

descriptions.en:
Only works while on a Stasis Subclass.

Replaces Dodge with Shift:
Shift has a travel distance of 10 meters and renders you completely invisible (except for a trail) and invulnerable for the duration of the animation.

Shift usage grants 4 Stacks of Arc and Stasis Weapon Surge for 11 seconds. Class Ability Energy is locked to 0% while the Weapon Surge buff is active.

Grants a scaling buff to Handling and Accuracy as your Shield Health drops below 40 and reaches maximum strength at 0 Shield HP.

Buff at maximum strength grants:
• 30 Handling
• 40% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 17% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

The buff linearly scales from 0% at 80 Shield HP to 100% at 0 Shield HP (Critical Health).

It initially triggers as you drop to 40 Shield HP — giving you 50% of the maximum buff. However, as you regenerate your Shield Health, the buff will still remain until you reach 80 Shield HP where the benefits scale down to zero.
descriptions.zh-chs:
生命值低于 156 时：
最高 +30 操控性，-40% 精度锥角尺寸，-17% 精度锥角增长.

当生命值减少时，该效果线性提升，生命值降低到重伤时达到最高值。

descriptions.en:
Receiving damage highlights the enemy that dealt it for 8 seconds. Highlighting cannot be transfered to a different target before it expires.

Killing the highlighted enemy grants the Vengeance buff for 6 seconds, providing a 95 HP Overshield.

Highlighting is disabled while Vengeance is active.

Grants the following to Stasis Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Switching to the Weapon grants 100 Ready/Stow Handling and a 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier for 1 second.

Buff is removed as soon as ADS input is pressed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拔枪时：
+100 拔枪/收枪操控性，0.95x 拔枪动画系数，持续 1 秒，或直到瞄准。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants more than 29 meters away by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Grants Passive Bonuses based on your selected Subclass:
• Solar: 🡅55 Reload Speed
• Arc: 🡅55 Handling
• Void: 🡅25 Stability
• Strand: 🡅25 Airborne Effectiveness
• Stasis: 🡅25 Recoil Direction & 20% reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty

🡅 Stat Bonuses are increased by 5.
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据当前的分支职业增加属性：

 🠅+55 填装速度
 🠅+55 操控性
 🠅+25 稳定性
 🠅+25 后座方向，降低 5% 瞄准时移动速度惩罚

🠅 相应属性额外 +5。

descriptions.en:
After being in Combat for 6 seconds:
Grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness and 35% Flinch Resistance for 🡅12 seconds.

Can activate while stowed. Dealing and receiving damage refreshes the buff duration.

For Pefect Float, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 🡅3.5 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 2 seconds. Allowed time between damage exchanges is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Grants the following to Stasis Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Grants 25% [5%] Damage Resistance to allies inside Rifts you create. (Well of Radiance does not count but you can cast a Rift inside it for the benefits)

Reaching Critical Health grants the Dearly Departed buff, granting 50% [25%] Class Ability Energy.

Buff lasts until you are no longer at Critical Health, essentially serving as a Cooldown.

Dying spawns a Healing Rift at your location.
Decreases Hipfire Accuracy Cone Size by 30% and grants a 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier.
Weapon Kills restore 10 HP.
descriptions.zh-chs: 武器最后一击恢复 7 生命值。

descriptions.en:
Grenade Ability usage and Powered Melee hits grant 1 Stack of Well-Rounded. Super Ability usage grants 2 Stacks.

Grants 10 Range, 10 Stability, and 10 Handling per stack for 15 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
投掷手雷或使用充能近战击中目标可获得 1 层全面发展增益，使用超能可获得 2 层增益。

每层增益 +10 射程，+10 稳定性，+10 操控性。
最高叠加 2 层，持续 15 秒。

descriptions.en: Decreases Charge Time by 40ms without affecting damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
-40ms 充能时间
不会降低伤害。
不会显示在武器属性中。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Hits grant Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy.

Incandescent Scorch ticks and Chain Reaction or Dragonfly elemental explosions count as hits.

Ability Energy gains on hits by weapon:
• Trustee: 0.354%
• Posterity: 0.463%
• Commemoration: 0.42%
• Heritage: 0.86%
• Succession: 1.5%
• Bequest: 2% (Grenade and Class Ability only)
Kills against Void Debuffed enemies grant a 45 HP Void Overshield for 8 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器击杀受虚空负面效果影响的敌人时：
获得一个 虚空覆盖护盾 ，持续 8 秒。

大多数“虚弱”效果都可以触发该特性（神性除外）.

descriptions.en:
On Grenade Ability Usage:
Changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Kinetic weapons lose their Passive Damage Bonus (10-15%) against PVE Combatants.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

While within 8 meters of 3 Enemies:
🡅47% increased damage that lingers for 1.5 seconds after the condition is no longer met.

Swords only receive a 🡅41.75% damage increase.

Grenade and Rocket Launchers receive a 🡅41.75% Explosive Damage increase and a 🡅47% Impact Damage increase. Wolfpack Rounds receive a 🡅41.75% Explosive Damage increase.

🡅 Damage is increased by a further 5%. (40%🠚47%, 35%🠚41.75%)

Increases Melee Damage by 100% for 1.22 seconds after hitting a target with 🡅10 of the 12 Shotgun Pellets in the spread.

Against [Bosses and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants), this is increased to 150% for the following melee options:
All Unpowered Melees, Combination Blow, Disorienting Blow, Chain Lightning, and Grapple Melee

The following options do not benefit from the perk:
• Hunters: Proximity Explosive Knife's and Snare Bomb's detonations, Tempest Strike, Withering Blade, Threaded Spike
• Titans: Throwing Hammer, Consecration, Thunderclap, Shield Throw, Flechette Storm
• Warlocks: all abilities except Chain Lightning

The buff does not stack with the passive Melee Damage Increase against Frozen non-Boss targets. The [higher buff of the two](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1N_zEcw3-pGL2jGUCGaAHjoKEr_VIbDc7-UWel-DGmys/) takes precedence.

This means that with the exception of Shiver Strike and Howl of the Storm in PVE where the perk's buff is always higher, it will only provide a benefit over Freeze's buff when used against Bosses and Vehicles.

🡅 Requires 2 fewer Shotgun Pellets to activate.

While Aiming Down Sights with Arc Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Transmutation spheres you create can be picked up and wielded as weapons by you or your allies.
• [Light Attack]  : Light attack
• [Heavy Attack]  : Heavy attack
• [Block]  : Guard/Drain nearby combatants

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Void Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles and Two-Tailed Fox do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.
Grants 67% increased damage for Grounded Heavy Attacks that consume all remaining ammo.
descriptions.zh-chs:
如果你的重攻击消耗掉的是你的最后一发弹药：
+67% 地面伤害.

descriptions.en:
Upon sprinting for 0.5 seconds with a Shoulder Charge (or Ballistic Slam) Melee Ability charge:
Charges up a 75 HP Overshield over 3 seconds.

Overshield is instantly removed if no longer sprinting.

Grants 50% Melee Ability Energy upon dealing damage with the mentioned Melee Abilities. Prevents Melee Kickstart from activating.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在满生命值的情况下装备肩撞类近战且充能完毕时：

冲刺后 0.5 秒开始，在 3 秒内逐渐获得 75 生命值的覆盖护盾。
停止冲刺时覆盖护盾立即消失。

肩撞技能击中敌人后回复 50% 的近战充能。

有效的近战技能包括地震打击、弹道猛击、战锤打击、圣盾强袭。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following for 🡅2.5 seconds upon readying:
• 30% decreased Charge Time
• 20% decreased damage
• 100 Handling

Weapon must be stowed for 3 seconds before readying for the perk to activate.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Sets the Submachine Gun's Damage and Magazine Profile into that of a Precision Frame's.
descriptions.zh-chs: 将冲锋枪的伤害和弹匣属性调整为精确框架的数值。

descriptions.en:
Swords are granted 30|50|60 Charge Rate with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Glaive Projectile Hits grant 20%|30%|35% Increased Weapon Energy. (Stacks additively with Immovable Object)

Upon scoring a Precision Kill or 3 kills within 3 seconds of each:
Spawns a Threadling on Enemy Death Location.

Upon Sliding after Sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
Grants 15% increased damage and 20% decreased Charge Time for ? seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Stasis Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅7.5 seconds:
Grants 1 Stack on Bodyshot Kills and 2 Stacks on Precision Kills. Maximum of 4 Stacks.

Duration is refreshed on Weapon Kills.

Each stack grants 5 Range, 8 Stability, and -1.25% Accuracy Cone Size.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅9.5 seconds:
Grants 100 Handling and a 0.825x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier to all weapons.

Additional kills while the perk is active refresh the duration to 6.5 seconds.

🡅 Initial Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Aiming Down Sights without firing for 1 second with Hand Cannons that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants Unstoppable Shots.

Hand Cannons without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Unstoppable Shots/effects are required to stun Unstoppable Champions – immobilizing them and removing their passive 70% Damage Resistance for the duration of the stun.

Scoring 4 Precision Hits within 🡅3 seconds of each refills 2 Ammo into the Magazine from thin air.

Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.

🡅 Allowed time between Precision Hits is increased by 1 second.

Starts Health Regeneration and restores 🡅70 HP upon reaching 100% Activation Progress with Weapon Kills within 5 seconds of each.

Activation Progress by [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minor Combatants: 33.3%
• Players: 66.6%
• Majors and Bosses: 100%

🡅 Restores an additional 5 HP.

Increases Super Energy Gains from Grenade Kills based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) with 1|2|3 Mods equipped:
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 1%|?|?
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: ?|?|?
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: ?|?|?
• T4 Minors, T3-T4 Elites, and higher: 5%|?|?
• Players: ?|?|?

Bonus Super Energy gains from Grapple Melee Kills are reduced by 50%.

Class Ability Usage grants 1 Stack of Tight Fit to the wearer and allies within 15 meters for 15 seconds.

While Tight Fit is active:
• Kills or Dodges grant an additional Stack up to a maximum of 5 and refresh the duration of the buff.
• Allies within range receive the same number of Stacks as the wearer when the buff is refreshed.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 30|35|40|45|50 Airborne Effectiveness
• 40|40|45|50|55 Handling and Reload Speed
• 1x|0.925x|0.915x|0.91x|0.89x Reload Duration Multiplier

Scoring Weapon Hits against 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each grants 35% increased damage for 🡅11 seconds.  Does not require Direct Hits.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Weapons matching your Subclass Element and the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles, Swords, and Grand Overture.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles, Eyes of Tomorrow, Two-Tailed Fox, and Wardcliff Coil do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13

Grants an extra Grenade Ability Charge.

Does not stack with Touch of Thunder's extra Lightning Grenade charge.
descriptions.ko:
수류탄 에너지를 추가로 제공합니다.

타이탄의 직업 트리와 같이 사용해 수류탄 3개를 소지하는 것은 불가능합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
获得额外一次手雷技能充能。
手雷技能数量上限为 2。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability usage grants 6.25% increased Sprint Speed for 10 seconds. Duration is not refreshable.

Sprinting grants the following benefits:
• 100% [200%] Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate
• PVE: Grenade and Melee Ability Regeneration Rate is doubled
• PVP: 100% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate

(Multiplicative Ability Regeneration Rate increase in PVE is applied after all additive Ability Regeneration Rate modifiers)
descriptions.ko:
질주하는 동안:
수류탄과 근접 능력 재생 속도 100% 증가
수류탄과 근접 능력의 기본 재생 속도 100% 증가
추가로 직업 능력의 기본 재생 속도가 100%[200%] 만큼 증가합니다.

회피 직후:
10초 동안 질주 속도가 6.25% 증가합니다.
초기화 불가능합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺时：
• 手雷和近战技能的充能速度翻倍。
• 100% 额外的基础手雷/近战再生速度。
• 100% [200%] 额外的基础职业技能充能速度。

闪身时：
+6.25% 奔跑速度，持续10秒。
持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Kinetic Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Lumina.

Standing in a Rift creates Noble Seekers every 5 seconds that seek out allies within 35 meters and apply a buff to them:
• Healing Rift Seeker: restores 75 HP and starts Health Regeneration
• Empowering Rift Seeker: Grants 35% [15%] increased damage for 5 seconds ([Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs))

Noble Seekers grant Noble Rounds to Lumina.

Number of Noble Seekers spawned is equal to [Fireteam Size]-1, with a minimum of 1 Seeker.

Each time a Noble Seeker applies a buff, the Rift Duration is paused for 5 seconds.
descriptions.ko:
균열에 서있으면 5초 마다 고귀한 추적기를 생성합니다. 추적기는 35미터 이내에 있는 아군을 찾아가며 균열의 종류에 따라 버프를 부여합니다.

고귀한 추적기가 버프를 부여 할 때 마다 균열의 지속시간이 5초 증가합니다.

치유 균열 추적기는 아군의 체력을 75HP 만큼 회복하고 즉시 체력 재생을 발동합니다.
강화 균열 추적기는 5초간 35% [20%]> 만큼의 피해 증가를 부여합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
为流明被动提升 +30 空中效率。

站在裂缝中每 5 秒会产生一个寻找盟友的高贵追踪弹，在35米范围内寻找盟友，并根据你站立的裂隙的类型给他们施加一个增益效果。
产生的高贵追踪弹数量等于队伍人数减 1，最低为 1 个。

每当一个高贵追踪弹施加一个增益效果，裂隙的持续时间延长 5 秒。

治疗裂隙产生的追踪弹为友军提供 75 点生命值，并开始恢复生命值。
强能裂隙产生的追踪弹为友军提供持续 5 秒的 35% [15%] 伤害增益。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following for 🡅8 seconds upon readying the weapon within 7? seconds of scoring a kill with a different weapon:
• 0.75?x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
• 25% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness

Weapon Kills while Discord is active fully refill the Magazine of Primary Weapons, and refund 1 Ammo for Special Weapons. (Scoring multiple kills with a single shot/burst still only refunds 1 ammo.)

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1? second.

Grants the following benefits while Crouched:
• Prevents Radar Ping when shooting
• ? Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• Increases Arrow Hold Time by 25%
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
防止蹲伏射击时产生雷达信号。
[+?] 填装速度，0.8x 装填动画系数，提升保持拉弓最长时间 25%。

descriptions.en:
Drengr's Lash creates 2 additional Lashes. Lashes are granted stronger seeking capabilities and travel ?% farther.

Grants Woven Mail for 10 seconds upon applying Suspension to enemies.

Grants an extra Coldsnap Grenade Ability Charge.

Coldsnap Grenades have better tracking, travel 35% farther, and grant Grenade Ability upon hitting or freezing an enemy.

Grenade Ability Energy gains based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• 7%: Enemy Players
• 10%: Tier 1 Minors
• 22%: Tier 2 Minors, Tier 1 Elites
• 34%: Tier 3 Minors, Tier 2 Elites
• 50%: Tier 4 Minors, Tier 3-4 Elites, Minibosses, and Bosses

The next 5 Hits within 8 seconds of using your Class Ability apply Sever to hit targets (even if they are currently immune to damage).

Applying Sever refreshes the buff duration. Activates even while stowed.

Aiming Down Sights while airborne grants 'Tome of Dawn' while on a Solar Subclass.

Tome of Dawn lasts 2.8 seconds and holds you in place midair. Weapon Hits add ? seconds to its duration.

Tome of Dawn grants the following benefits:
• 50 Airborne Effectiveness
• 25% Flinch Resistance
• 15% Damage Resistance
• Weapon Kills refill the magazines of all equipped Solar Weapons from reserves

Grants the following with Fusion Grenades equipped:
• An extra Grenade Charge
• 100% Class Ability Energy on Fusion Grenade Kills
• Passive 20% Additional Base Grenade Ability Recharge Rate

While in an Empowering Rift or Well of Radiance:
• Grants 20% Grenade Energy on Weapon Kills
• Grants 2.5% Grenade Ability Energy on Weapon Hits with a 0.4 second cooldown

Scoring 2 to 3 Arc Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of Arc Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds. Further Arc Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Grants a 75 HP Overshield upon casting the Fists of Havoc Super that negates Precision Damage.

Grants the maximum 4 Stacks of Weapon Surge after the Fists of Havoc Super ends.
descriptions.ko:
대혼란의 주먹을 시전하면 단호함이 활성화됩니다.

단호함은 75HP 짜리 보호막괴 정밀 피해 저항을 제공합니다.

보호막은 대혼란의 주먹 시전 중 영겁의 전사를 뺐다가 다시 장착하면 다시 부여됩니다만 그런 뻘짓하는 사람이 있을까요.
descriptions.zh-chs:
施放浩劫之拳时获得一道力场护盾。

力场护盾为一个 75 生命值，可以抵消精准伤害的覆盖护盾。

descriptions.en:
Upon Aiming Down Sights or Guarding within ? seconds of receiving damage:
Grants 30 Mobility, 30 Handling, and 20 Charge Rate (Swords) for 7.5 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

Reduces Incoming AoE Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Passively grants:
• 35% increased Projectile Velocity
• 20 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier to Rocket Launchers
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier to Glaives and Grenade Launchers

(Reload Duration Multiplier for Bows and Rocket-Assisted Sidearms is unknown but it's likely one of the listed values)
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升：
• +35% 弹头速度
• +10 填装速度，0.8x 填装动画系数

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Arc Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Passively decreases the ADS Animation Duration:
• 50% decrease on Primary Weapons
• 20% decrease on Special Weapons
descriptions.zh-chs:
主武器瞄准动画系数调整为 0.5x。
特殊武器瞄准动画系数调整为 0.75x。

descriptions.en:
Increases Blast Radius by ?% and reduces Self-Damage while within 15 meters of 3 enemies. Effect lingers for 3.5 seconds.

Grenade Launchers: 40% reduced Self-Damage

Rocket Launchers: 99.99% reduced Self-Damage and allows for rocket jumping
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内有 3 个敌人时：
增加 [?]% 爆炸范围，降低 40% 自身伤害.

线性持续 4(?) 秒。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power on Grenade Kills that grants 0.8%|1.1%|1.25% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

10|5|1 second cooldown between activations.

Grants the following to Arc Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon readying the weapon after scoring Kills with your other Weapons:
Refills and/or overfills the Magazine from reserves based on the amount of Weapon Kills scored.

Maximum total overfill amount is 200% of the Magazine Capacity. Each activation can only load up to 100% of the Magazine Capacity into the magazine.

Loaded ammo per Kill by ammo type (rounds up):
• Primary Weapons: 10% of Magazine Capacity
• Special and Power Weapons: 20%

Refills Magazine from reserves upon dropping to 30% Shield Health. Can activate while stowed.

Grants 50 handling and a 0.95x Ready/Stow Animation Duration multiplier while at or below 30% Shield Health. Buff lingers for 1 second once the condition is no longer met.
descriptions.zh-chs:
低于 110 生命值时：
+50 操控性，0.9 拔枪/收枪动画系数，并且重新填装武器。

武器收起时也有效。

descriptions.en: Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against [Elite Combatants](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对精英和强大的战斗人员的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple Hits against enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy. Does not require Direct Hits.

Hit requirements for activation:
• Bows: 5 Hits
• Swords: 10 Hits
• Grenade Launchers: 12? Hits
• Other: 67% of Magazine Size rounded down + 2

🡅 Spawned Orbs grant more Super Energy.

Grants the following for 5 seconds upon finishing a Reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
• 20 Aim Assist
• ? ADS Handling
• ?% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Ammo Pickups grant 15 Range and 15% Flinch Resistance. Swords receive 100 Charge Rate instead.

Buff disappears 1.5 seconds after firing (or swinging the sword).

Grants 15% decreased Charge/Draw Time while within 15 meters of 2 enemies. The buff lingers for 1.5 seconds once no longer surrounded.

🡅 Grants 10 Stability while the perk is active.

Upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
25% increased damage for 5 seconds.

Buff stays active while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器击杀后 3.8 秒内换弹：
+25% 伤害，持续 5 秒。

增益持续时间无法被再次换单而刷新。武器收起时保持生效。

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Void Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

While Aiming Down Sights with Solar Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Grants 10% Damage Resist upon reaching Critical Health while at 3 or more Stacks Armor Charge and consumes all Armor Charges.

Buff lasts 6|9|12|15 seconds with 3|4|5|6 Stack of Armor Charge consumed.
Increases Super Energy Gains from Melee Kills based on enemy rank.
Grants 10%|13%|15% Ability Energy to the least-charged Ability on Orb of Power pickups.

When a Class Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Class Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Class Ability Energy refunds.

Class Ability Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

While aiming-down-sights:
Decreases Shotgun Pellet Spread by 3.75%
Reduces Precision Damage by 7.6%
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准时：
-3.75% 弹头散布。
-[?]% 精准伤害系数。

descriptions.en:
Hits against non-Matching Element or Barrier Champion Shields deal increasingly higher damage.

Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.

Damage increase per Weapon Archetype:
• Fusion Rifles: 29% per hit, up to 435%
• Machine Guns, Auto/Pulse/Trace Rifles: 33.33% per hit, up to 500%
• Linear Fusion Rifles: 150% per hit, up to 450%
• Bows, Glaives, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 166.67% per hit, up to 500%
descriptions.es:
Luego de impactar con un Escudo de otro elemento al arma, o la Barrera de un Campeon:
Los proximos impactos aumentan en daño contra el escudo del enemigo.

El bufo se termina si se impacta contra un escudo con mismo elemento, o contra un enemigo sin escudo.


Dependiendo del tipo de arma
descriptions.zh-chs:
当命中与武器元素不匹配的护盾，或屏障勇士护盾时：
每次命中都会逐渐提升对护盾的伤害。


当命中与武器元素匹配的元素护盾，或没有护盾的敌人时，移除伤害增益。

额外信息

descriptions.en:
Kills have a chance to release a varying number of Submunitions on top of where the enemy died.
6? second cooldown after activation.

The number of Submunitions spawned is tied to [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 1 Submunition
• Elites, Players: 3 Submunitions
• Minibosses, Bosses: 7 Submunitions

Submunitions:
• Identical to Telesto Bolts in behavior, exploding on proximity or contact and last up to 10.5 seconds after attaching to a surface.
• Deal up to 39.5? [?] damage and inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
Ignitions have a 20?% increased blast radius.

Increases the number of Scorch Stacks you apply to targets by 50% in most cases.

Always rounds up: 3 🠚 4.5 🠚 5

Specific increases from Ember of Ashes for Scorch sources can be found in their descriptions.

Killing 2 enemies within ? seconds of each with Ignitions creates an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Killing Scorched enemies spawns a Firesprite and grants Melee Ability Energy based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 8%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 15%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 17.5%
• Players: 20%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

Increases Blast Radius by ?% and reduces Self-Damage while within 15 meters of 3 enemies. Effect lingers for 3.5 seconds.

Grenade Launchers: 40% reduced Self-Damage

Rocket Launchers: 99.99% reduced Self-Damage and allows for rocket jumping

🡅 Passively grants 5 Blast Radius.

Grants the following to Solar Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Solar Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Kills while standing in a Rift with your Class Ability charged consume that charge to spawn a Healing and Empowering Rift at Enemy Death Location.

Daybreak Kills also spawn a Healing and Empowering Rift at Enemy Death Location.

Solar Weapon Kills grant Class Ability Energy based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• 4.5%: Tier 1 Minors
• 6.5%: Tier 2 Minors, Tier 1 Elites
• 7.5%: Enemy Players
• 10%: Tier 3 Minors, Tier 2 Elites
• 15%: Tier 4 Minors, Tier 3-4? Elites
• 20%: Minibosses
• 25%: Bosses

Energy gains are doubled while standing in a Rift.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Kinetic Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 2% with Forerunner.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Weapons matching your Subclass Element with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

While Aiming Down Sights with Stasis Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Applying an Elemental Debuff (with the exception of Weaken) grants the following benefits for 4.5 seconds:
• 50? Reload Speed and 20 Aim Assist
• 20% decreased ADS Movement Speed Penalty

Grants the following to Arc Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Finisher consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant Class Ability Energy.

Energy Gains with 3|4|5|6 Stacks Consumed:
70% | 80% | 90% | 100%

Grants 30|50|60 Intellect with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

When a Melee Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Melee Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Melee Energy refunds.

Melee Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Bug: Doesn't work if you have more recharged Melee Ability Energy than a single ability charge.
Combines the overpenetration from Armor-Piercing Rounds, the guaranteed ricochets from Ricochet Rounds, and the flinch increase from High-Caliber Rounds.
descriptions.zh-chs: 结合穿甲弹药的穿甲特性、弹跳型弹药的弹跳特性、高冲击力弹药的增大敌人后仰抖动特性。

descriptions.en:
Increases Class Ability Regeneration Rate while at least 3 enemies are within 15 meters.

Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate with:
• 3 Enemies: 250%
• 4 Enemies: 666%
• 5 Enemies: 1085%
• 6+ Enemies: 1500%

1 second after casting a Rift:
The Rift releases an Arc Shockwave that deals 300 [100] damage and knocks back enemies in a 7.5 meter radius.

Rifts also emit additional Arc Shockwaves every 5 seconds, dealing 200 [70] damage to enemies within ? meters.

Enemies killed by Shockwaves explode, dealing 100 damage (and Blinding nearby targets if on an Arc Subclass).

Upon Blocking an attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Grats 50% increased damage for 🡅3 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.
Passively grants 10 Airborne Effectiveness, 35 Reload Speed, and 35 Handling to all weapons.

Grants Grenade Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Grenade Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Being within 15 meters of 3+ enemies grants the 'Biotic Enhancements' buff for 8 seconds.

Biotic Enhancements benefits:
• ? Handling and 35 Reload Speed
• 50% increased Super damage
• 165% [100%] increased Melee damage
• 100% increased Glaive Melee damage
descriptions.zh-chs:
被 3 名以上敌人包围时：激活生物强化

生物强化在 8 秒内提高近战和常能伤害。

50% 超能伤害。
提高 200% 近战伤害。
提高 100% 近战伤害。

扩大近战前冲范围到 7 米。

descriptions.en:
Melee Hits grant 1 Stack of Armor Charge. (Each damage instance is counted separately)

Having active Armor Charges grants Melee Damage Resistance. Receiving a Melee Attack consumes all Armor Charges and emits a Jolting Arc Burst in a ? meter radius.

Benefits with 1|2|…|6 Armor Charges:
• Arc Burst Damage: 90|130|170|200|225|245
• Melee Damage Resistance: 23.3% | 46.7% | 70% | 73.3% | 76.7% | 80%
descriptions.ko:
근접 공격을 적중 시 분노 도체 스택을 쌓게 됩니다.
근접 공격을 받으면 5미터 주위에 전기 폭발을 일으킵니다.
전기 폭발은 분노 도체 스택 하나 마다 근접 공격 위력의 22% 식 오릅니다.

분노 도체는 스택에 따라 33-50-70%의 근접 피해 감소를 제공합니다.

근접 공격 피해를 입거나 10초 이상 근접 공격을 적중하지 못하면 모든 스택이 사라집니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
近战命中可获得的“狂怒导体能量”层数。
被近战命中会释放一个 5 米范围的电弧爆炸，造成 40 伤害。

“狂怒导体能量”提供近战伤害抗性，并提升电弧爆炸的伤害量，根据叠加层数增多。
33%   | 55%   | 70%   近战伤害抗性
100% | 200% | 300% 提升电弧爆炸伤害

受到近战伤害后，或 10 秒内未造成近战伤害，“狂怒导体能量”的层数将被移除。

descriptions.en:
Scoring 2 to 3 Void Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of Void Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds. Further Void Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Grants the following on Powered Void Melee Kills:
• 20% [10%] Super Energy once per ability usage
• All 4 Stacks of Void Weapon Surge

Sentinel Shield's Shield Throw Hits grant 10% Super Energy, extending Super Duration.
descriptions.ko:
공허 근접 능력으로 처치 시 20% [10%]의 궁극기 에너지를 얻습니다.

파수병의 방패를 사용하는 동안 방패 투척을 적중하면 10%의 궁극기 에너지를 반환 받습니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用虚空近战技能击杀敌人会获得 20% [10%] 超能能量，每次使用只能获得一次。

哨兵圣盾的圣盾投掷命中时，会回复 10% 超能能量。

descriptions.en:
After a Melee Kill, for 7.5 seconds:
Weapon Kills cause the enemy to explode, dealing up to 123.5 [?] damage over a 4.5? meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling) and match the element of the Weapon.

Weapon or Melee Kills grant a Stacking Damage Buff for 🡅6.5 seconds. Melee Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly.

Damage increase at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 2 seconds.

Only works with a Solar Subclass.

Spawns a Sunspot under you upon reaching Critical Health (if your Class Ability is charged as it consumes a Class Ability Charge) or upon casting a Barricade.

The spawned Sunspot grants the Sol Invictus buff even without having the Aspect equipped. (The Aspect is still required to extend the sunspot's duration)
descriptions.ko:
방벽을 시전하거나 방벽이 충전된 상태에서 치명상을 입으면 방벽 소모와 함께 흑점이 생성됩니다.

생성된 흑점은 회복 x1을 부여합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当职业技能充能完毕时受到重伤，或释放屏障时：
在你脚下生成一个太阳黑子。

仅在烈焰分支生效。
生成的太阳黑子即使没有装备“无敌索尔”星象也会获得其收益。

descriptions.en:
Upon scoring multiple hits within 6 seconds of each:
• Refills 10% of the Magazine (rounded up) from thin air. Can be reactivated without a cooldown. Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.
• Grants 40% increased damage against [Constructs and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) for 5 seconds. Additional hits refresh the buff duration.

Number of Hits Required:
• If Magazine Size is 1: 3 Hits
• Otherwise: 2 + 50% (25% on Primary Weapons) of Base Magazine Capacity rounded down

Hits against Constructs and Vehicles provide 1.5x activation progress for Primary weapons and 2x progress for Special weapons.

Pellet Shotguns, Rocket-Assisted Sidearms, and non-Wave Frame Grenade Launchers can trigger the perk twice on initial activations (when the buff isn't active). Note: please don't ask about the specifics of this.

Wave Frame Grenade Launchers:
• Direct Impacts count as 2 Hits
• Doesn't receive bonus activation progress against Constructs and Vehicles

Pellet Shotguns:
• Runs into network-related issues for triggering the perk and granting ammo on non-construct hits
• Only needs one pellet to hit per shot, they aren't considered separate Hits for the purpose of the perk
• Activation progress granted by each shot scales with distance: point-blank shots follow the standard formula but as few as 2 shots can trigger the perk on more distant targets

Passively grants 🡅55 Blast Radius.

Rockets attach on impact and detonate after 3 seconds, dealing 25% increased Explosive Damage.
