🡅 Grants 5 more Blast Radius passively.

On Precision Kill:
70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier for 6 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准击杀后：
+70 填装速度，0.9x 填装动画系数，持续 6 秒。

descriptions.en: Finishers consume 2 Stacks of Armor Charge and grant 50% Ability Energy to your least-charged Ability.

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Feeding Frenzy for 3.5 seconds, increasing the Reload Speed of the weapon. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 🡅13 | 🡅55 | 🡅65 | 🡅85 | 100 Reload Speed Stat
• 0.975x | 0.9x | 0.868x | 0.837x | 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier

🡅 Increases Reload Speed Stat bonus by 5 at 1-3 Stacks and by 10 at 4 Stacks.

On Precision Kill:
Spawns a Large Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.

[Tier 1-2 Minor](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants only spawn a Medium Stasis Crystal.

5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Upon readying the weapon within 3.5 seconds of getting kills with other weapons while it was stowed:
Grants 10 Handling, 10 Reload Speed, and 10 Stability per Stack for 🡅8.5 seconds.

Maximum of 3 Stacks. Buff is removed on stow.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Weapon Kills grant an additional 🡅1.33% Super Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant an additional 🡅2% instead.

🡅 Bonus Super Gains are increased by 33.3%. (e.g. 1.5% » 2%)

On Precision Kill:
• Target explodes, dealing 104 [80] Solar damage in a 4 meter radius
• Grants 🡅55 Reload Speed for 6 seconds

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

🡅 Grants 5? more Reload Speed.
While at full health, spinning up this weapon protects you with an Arc Shield.

Grants 30|50|60 Recovery with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

On Weapon Kill, for 7 seconds:
Grants 1 Stack on Bodyshot Kills and 2 Stacks on Precision Kills. Maximum of 4 Stacks.

Duration is refreshed on Weapon Kills.

Each stack grants 5 Range, 8 Stability, and -1.25% Accuracy Cone Size.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+5 射程， +8 稳定性， -1.25% 精度锥角尺寸。精准击杀获取两层增益。增益最多叠加四层。


持续 7 秒，击杀可刷新。

descriptions.en: Finishers with no active Armor Charge Stacks grant 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with with a Void Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Kills during Stormtrance grant a Stack of 'Ascending Amplitude' for 8 seconds.

Ascending Amplitude increases Stormtrance's damage by 10% per Stack, up to 100% at 10 Stacks.

Refunds up to 50% of Super Energy based on the number of enemies killed with your Super.

Kills restore 60 HP after a 0.25 second delay while within 15 meters of 3 enemies or a Nightmare.

3 second cooldown between activations.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当 [15?] 米内有 3 个战斗人员或梦魇时， 完成最后一击时：
0.25 秒后恢复 40 生命值。

触发间隔为 3 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants 30|50|60 Discipline with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon readying the gun after receiving damage within [?] seconds:
Grants 30 Handling for 4 seconds.

Swords receive 100 Guard Resistance, 100? Guard Endurance, and 100 Charge Rate.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在受到伤害 [?] 秒内拔出此武器：
+30 操控性，持续 4 秒。

刀剑获取更高的充能效率、防御抗性、防御耐性。


刀剑获得更高的充能效率、防御效率、防御抗性。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights with Kinetic Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Passively grants 20 Handling and 20 Reload Speed.

While Last Guardian Standing:
• 100 Handling, 100 Reload Speed, ? Aim Assist
• Greatly increased Flinch Resistance
• Increased Accuracy
• Stronger Sight Highlight
• Enables Radar while ADS

Does not activate when playing solo.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你作为你的火力战队最后一名存活的队员时：
+100 操控性，+100 填装速度，+[?] 瞄准辅助。
大幅降低收到伤害时的屏幕抖动。
瞄准时可显示雷达。

被动属性提升：+20 操控性，+20 填装速度。

descriptions.en:
Grants linearly scaling benefits as the Magazine drops from 50% of its base capacity to empty:
• 12.5% to 25% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 0 to 30? Stability

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Feeding Frenzy for 3.5 seconds, increasing the Reload Speed of the weapon. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 8 | 50 | 60 | 75 | 100 Reload Speed Stat
• 0.975x | 0.9x | 0.868x | 0.837x | 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier

Scoring 4 Precision Hits within 2 seconds of each refills 2 Ammo into the Magazine from thin air.

Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.

On Precision Kill:
70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier for 6 seconds.

Heavy Ammo Finder Bricks you create also spawn a copy for your allies.

Ammo Bricks spawned this way grant 27.5%|60% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2 Mods equipped.

Explosion releases 8 Cluster Bombs.

Each Cluster Bomb deals 51 [?] damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
爆炸产生 8 枚集束炸弹。
每枚炸弹造成额外 3% 的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Upon stunning a Champion:
• Refills 25% of the Magazine from reserves (rounds up)
• Restores 60 HP
• Grants 40 Recovery for 3 seconds
descriptions.zh-chs: 晕眩一个勇士可 刷新 [25?%] 弹夹，恢复 60 生命值，并在 3 秒内获得 40 恢复属性。

descriptions.en: Killing four or more combatants in a single volley increases the damage of the next volley.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload and will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Reduces Incoming PVE Combatant Damage matching your Subclass Element by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Weapons matching your Subclass Element and the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles, Swords, and Grand Overture.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles, Eyes of Tomorrow, Two-Tailed Fox, and Wardcliff Coil do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Grants the following to Weapons matching your Subclass Element 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Strand Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Dealing sufficient Weapon Damage to an Unraveled Target spawns a Threadling depending on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 80 damage
• Elite: 180 damage
• Minibosses: 200 damage
• Bosses: 420 damage
• Players: 100 damage

Unraveling Thread Kills sometimes spawn a Threadling.
Solar Precision Kills on PVE Combatants while Radiant cause an Ignition.

Enemies Shatters deal 12.5% [5%] Increased Damage. Stasis Crystal Shatters deal 28.6% Increased Damage

Upon shattering a Stasis Crystal:
Releases 5 homing ice shards in a ☆star pattern with one shard going towards the closest enemy and the rest spreading out uniformly around the Crystal.

Each ice shard deals 50 damage and applies ? [10] Slow Stacks for ? seconds.

Firing a Rocket Launcher consumes 1 Stack of Armor Charge to grant the Godslayer Warheads buff for 4.5 seconds.

Godslayer Warheads grants 15% Increased Rocket Damage (stacks with everything) and increases Reload Speed.

Does not consume additional Armor Charge Stacks while the buff is active.
Increases Weapon and Ability Damage against PVE Combatants by 15% while you are the only member of your fireteam.

Guarding with Sentinel Shield disorients enemies within 7 [3.5] meters for 5 seconds.

Allies inside your Ward of Dawn receive Starless Night, granting them a 45 HP Void Overshield. Enemies that enter your Ward of Dawn are disoriented for 5 seconds.
descriptions.ko:
깃발 방패로 막으면 7미터 이내에 있는 적들을 5초간 실명시킵니다.

새벽의 수호물을 시전하면 별 없는 밤이 활성화되며 수호물에 들어온 아군에게 65HP 짜리 보호막을 부여합니다.

수호물에 들어온 적들을 5초간 실명시킵니다.

descriptions.en: Decreases Ready/Stow Animation Duration by 10%.

Stepping into an Empowering Rift cast by you with a ⁠Void Subclass equipped grants ⁠Devour for 11 seconds (17 with ⁠Echo of Persistence).

Kills can refresh ⁠Devour's duration up to 11 seconds (22 with ⁠Echo of Persistence).

Empowering Rifts you cast grant ⁠Overload Shot to you and allies inside it, allowing weapons to cause ⁠Disruption on hit.

Weapons with a Breaker Type (either intrinsic or from Artifact Perks) will not benefit from this.

Overload Shots/effects apply Disruption for 6.5 [5] seconds. Applying Disruption stuns Overload Champions and prevents them from regenerating health for the duration of the effect.

Disruption decreases damage dealt by PvE Combatants by 25%. It also decreases Melee, Grenade, and Class Ability regeneration speeds by 40% in PvP.

On Precision Kill:
70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier for 🡅7 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

Scoring 4 Precision Hits within 2 seconds of each refills 2 Ammo into the Magazine from thin air.

Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.
descriptions.zh-chs:
4 次快速精准命中目标会向弹匣里返还 2 枚弹药。
如果 2 秒内没有精准命中，则计数器会被重置。

descriptions.en:
Each shot while holding down the trigger grants:
• 1 Stability
• -5% Accuracy Cone Size
• -10% Accuracy Cone Growth

Reaches maximum strength after 10 shots, granting 10 Stability, -50% Accuracy Cone Size, and -100% Accuracy Cone Growth.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当按下扳机时：
每次命中都将 -10% 精度锥角尺寸并 +1 稳定性，10 次命中可达到最高 -100% 精度锥角尺寸并 +10 稳定性。

效果达到最高值时即完全没有子弹散布。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights:
• Increased Body Shot damage
• -20%? Auto Aim Cone Size (No effect on Magnetism AKA reticle stickiness)

Body Shot damage increases:
• Auto/Scout Rifle, Bow, Hand Cannon: 20%
• Pulse/Trace Rifle, Sidearm, SMG: 10%
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准时：
增加身体伤害，-55% 瞄准辅助锥角尺寸。

身体伤害提升：
• 自动步枪、弓箭、手炮： 20%
• 脉冲步枪、手枪、冲锋枪： 10%

descriptions.en:
Grants the following benefits for your first shot (of the burst) after 3.1 seconds of not firing the weapon:
• 🡅25 Aim Assist and 🡅30 Range
• 5% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 10% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

Special weapons only receive 50% of the benefits. Stats are rounded up.

🡅 Grants 5 more Aim Assist and Range.

Ionic Traces move faster and grant doubled Ability Energy.

Total Ability Energy Gained per Ionic Trace:
Grenade: 25% | Melee: 25% | Class Ability: 30%

Allies within ? meters receive 10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy when you pick up an Ionic Trace.
descriptions.zh-chs:
离子轨迹会更快地移动，并提供翻倍的能量。

每个离子轨迹获得的总能量：
手雷：25% | 近战：25% | 职业技能：30%

拾取一个离子轨迹时，[?] 米范围内的盟友可以获得 10% 的手雷、近战、职业技能能量。

descriptions.en:
Assists on targets previously hit by the Weapon or Assisted Kills with the Weapon refill 66% of the Magazine from reserves.

The refill can overflow the magazine and the refill amount is always rounded up to a whole number.

Can only activate once before needing a manual reload.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Kinetic Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upon damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each, for 🡅11 seconds:
• 35 Handling and Reload Speed
• 10 Stability and Range
• 5% increased damage Falloff Distance
• 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier

Buff cannot be refreshed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.
This weapon fires faster and more accurately the longer the trigger is held. Continous damage generates stunning lightning strikes.

While standing in a Rift or a Well of Radiance:
• Grants 2 Stacks of Subclass-Matching Weapon Surge
• Kills grant 'Blood Magic' for 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 15 seconds

Blood Magic pauses the duration of the Rift for as long as it is active. Doesn't apply to Well of Radiance.

While Magazine is at or above maximum capacity:
Grants 25% increased damage and causes enemies to explode on death, dealing 444 [162.5] damage in a ? meter radius.

Passively grants 30 Magazine Size stat. (Identical to Extended Mag)
descriptions.zh-chs:
满弹匣时：
+25% 伤害并使敌人在死亡的爆炸，在 [?] 米范围内造成 444 [163] 伤害。

被动提升 +30 弹匣容量。
（等效于一个加长弹匣）

descriptions.en:
While moving at a minimum of 2 meters per second:
Gain a Stack after 2 and 10 seconds.

Each stack provides 10 Stability, 10 Handling, and 10 Reload Speed. All stacks are removed if movement speed is below 2 m/s for 0.5 seconds.

Works and can activate while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
保持移动时(每秒移动 2 米以上)时：
2 秒后触发第一层增益，10秒后触发第二层增益。

每 0.5 秒检测一次状态，若没有保持移动，则失去所有增益层数。

武器收起时也可触发和保持该增益。

descriptions.en: Grants a 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier to reloads started with an empty magazine.
descriptions.es:
Al recargar con el cargador vacio:
Aumento del 15% a la Velocidad de Recarga
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹夹为空时：
加快 15% 换弹装填动画。

descriptions.en:
Grants an additional Shield Throw Melee Ability Charge.

Shield Throw gains Shield-Piercing Breaker Type and Weakens targets for ? seconds on hit.

Stunning a Barrier Champion with Shield Throw grants a Melee Ability Charge.

Increases Magazine Capacity by 1 and Total Reserve Size by 5. decreases Firing Delay by 25%.

Decreases Blast Radius by 30, Reload Speed by 20, and damage by 25%.

Passively grants 40 Airborne Effectiveness and 10 Draw Time Stat (equivalent of a Draw Time Masterwork) to Bows.

Full Draws grant 'Adamantine Brace':
• Allows Perfect Draws to be held indefinitely
• Grants 37.5% increased damage against PVE Combatants for every 0.5 seconds you hold a perfect draw, up to a 150% increase 

PVE Damage buff only affects the initial Impact damage (e.g. Wish Ender's overpenetration is unaffected) and expires after 4 seconds of Adamantine Brace being active. Leviathan's Breath does not receive the damage increase.

Blade Barrage Hits and Kills refund Super Energy depending on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) up the the maximum of 50%.

Throwing Knife Kills grant 2.5-5% Super Energy depending on Enemy Rank.

Weapon Kills reduce Pellet Spread by 20% for 7.5 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

Increases Duskfield Grenade radius by 25%.

While inside a Duskfield Grenade's Slowing Field:
• Enemies deal 50% [20%] decreased damage
• Allies receive 25% [5%] Damage Resistance

When combined with the Touch of Winter aspect:
• Increases Crystal size from Medium to Large
• Radius increase stacks additively for a total of 75%

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13

Grenade Ability Usage grants 1 Stack of Explosive Pact. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Grenade Kills and Healing Grenade orb pickups (by anyone) grant 1 Stack each.

Benefits at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks of Explosive Pact:
• ? Stability
• 8|16|20|24|44 Reload Speed
• 0.98x|0.98x|0.975x|0.96x|0.945x Reload Duration Multiplier

Increases Strand Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Void Souls last 5 seconds longer and can be retrieved by interacting with them. Retrieving them grants 'Void Soul Ready' for 25 seconds, allowing it to be redeployed while keeping its Kill Bonuses.

Void Soul Kills increase their damage and Damage Resistance, maxing out after 6 Kills:
• 16.6%|33.3%|50%|66.67%|83.3%|100% increased Void Soul damage with 1|2|...|6 Kills
• 8.3%|16.7%|25%|33.3%|41.7%|50% increased Void Soul Damage Resistance

If multiple Void Souls tether the same enemy, they will each deal the damage of the first Soul to do so.
Grants 10% Increased Damage against Taken Combatants.
descriptions.zh-chs: 增加 10% 对傀儡的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Immediately upon firing, for 🡅0.76 seconds:
40 Stability, -50% Recoil, and -10% Accuracy Cone Size.

Fusion Rifles Only Receive 25% of the benefits.

[Controller-Only] Weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.

🡅 Stronger Effect. Duration is increased by 0.16 seconds.

Every 4 seconds while not firing the weapon:
Loads 10% of the Magazine Capacity (rounded up) into the Magazine from reserves.

Can overfill the Magazine up to double the normal capacity.
descriptions.zh-chs:
持续 4 秒没有射击：
重新填装 10% 弹匣，直至两倍弹匣容量。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon Kill:
10 Resilience and 5% Damage Resist against PvE Combatants for 5 seconds.

Maximum of 3 Stacks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击:
在 5 秒内可提供 10 韧性以及 5% 对战斗人员的额外伤害抗性。
可叠加 3 次。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 20 Reload Speed.

Refills stowed weapons from reserves upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill.

🡅 Allowed time before reloading is increased.

On hit against Minor Combatants:
Grants 1 Stack of Redirection, up to a maximum of 20 Stacks.

On hit against [Major, Boss, or Vehicle](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants, for one shot:
Consumes up to 🡅4 Stacks granting 🡅25% increased damage per Stack consumed.

🡅 Damage increase per Stack is increased by 25% and the maximum buff requires 1 less Stack. (20%⁠🠚⁠25%)

Deals increased damage against [Minibosses, Bosses, and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants), as well as Players in their Super Ability.

Damage increase by Ammo Type:
• Primary Weapons: 20% [60%]
• Special Weapons: 15% [20%]
• Heavy Weapons: 10% [20%]
descriptions.zh-chs:
提高对首领、强大敌人、载具，以及激活超能的玩家的伤害。

PVE: 主武器：+20% | 特殊武器：+15% | 重型武器：+10%

PVP: 对激活超能的玩家：
主武器：+40% ~ 50%
特殊武器：+10% ~ 20%
重型武器： +5% ~ 10%

descriptions.en: Charging this weapon increases the freeze radius and amount of Stasis crystals created.

Scoring multiple Direct Hits against a target within 3 seconds of each emits 3 damaging shockwaves from its location at the time of activation.

Shockwaves appear 0.285 seconds after scoring enough Hits and have a 1 second delay between each pulse.

Each shockwave deals up to 120 [20] damage in a 5? meter radius. Shockwaves deal 25% less damage when activated on [Minor and Elite](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) PvE Combatants.

Shockwaves inherit Weapon Damage Buffs, the weapon's passive Kinetic Damage Bonus in PVE (10% on Primary, 15% on Special), and its [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling). They also count as non-direct Hits with the weapon for other interactions.

The perk cannot be retriggered by anyone on a target until 2? seconds after the last shockwave.

Hits Required for Activation:
• Submachine Guns: 14 (enhanced unavailable)
• Auto Rifles: 12 (enhanced unavailable)
• Pulse Rifles: (11🠚)🡅10
• Non-burst Sidearms: (8🠚)🡅7
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: (6🠚)🡅5
• Sniper Rifles: (3🠚)🡅2

🡅 Hit Requirements are reduced.

Splits off 50% of the Bow's Bodyshot damage into an Explosive damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PvE.

Detonation time after hitting a target or surface varies on draw and distance.

[PvE] Total damage is increased by ~15% of the weapon's Bodyshot damage. On crits, the overall increase is 10.33% for Precision Bows and 9.69% for Lightweight Bows.

[PvP] Don't want to talk about it.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Accuracy.

While Aiming Down Sights with Solar Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

On Heavy Ammo Pickup:
Grants 25% of your maximum Special Ammo Reserves.

Equipping two Special Weapons halves the amount of ammo granted.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拾取重型弹药时：
生成 25% 特殊弹药备弹容量。

装备两把特殊武器时，生成的弹药将平分给两把武器。

descriptions.en:
Hits inflict increased Flinch on Enemies.

[PVE] [Tier 1-2 Minors](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) can be repeatedly staggered. Higher Tier Combatants stagger quicker.

[PVP] Flinch against Players varies based on damage and Weapon Archetype. Flinch increase ranges between 5-10%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
命中后增加敌人的后仰抖动。

[PVE] 允许主武器作用于高阶敌人，并可使低阶普通敌人持续晕眩。

[PVP] 根据武器框架不同，增加敌方守护者 6% 至 11% 的后仰抖动，/>

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Kinetic Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

On Precision Kill:
• Target explodes, dealing 104 [80] Solar damage in a 4 meter radius
• Grants 50 Reload Speed for 6 seconds

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

Upon emptying the Magazine:
Refills 🡅70% of the number of Hits landed (rounded up) into the Magazine from reserves.

Hits are counted from either your last reload or the last time the perk was triggered. Does not require Direct Hits.

Requires firing 28.75% of the Magazine Capacity (rounded up) for the refill to activate.

Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.

Hits after triggering a refill do not count while the Rewind Rounds buff is active (1? second).

🡅 Refill ratio is increased by an additive 10%.

Weapon Kills grant the following for 5.5 seconds:
• 15 Stability and 20 Recoil Direction
• 15% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 15% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

Stacks 2 times. Cone scalars stack multiplicatively (15%⁠🠚⁠27.75%). Buff remains active while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
-15% 精度锥角增长， +15 稳定性，+20 后座力方向。

可叠加 2 层。

descriptions.en:
Upon damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each, for 10 seconds:
• 35 Handling and Reload Speed
• 10 Stability and Range
• 5% increased damage Falloff Distance
• 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier

Buff cannot be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
3 秒内命中 3 个不同目标：
+10 射程，+5% 有效射程，+10 稳定性，+35 操控性，+35 填装速度，0.95x 填装动画系数，持续 10 秒。

该增益无法持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Void Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13

Grants the following for 2 seconds upon readying:
• 30% decreased Charge Time
• 20% decreased damage
• 100 Handling

Weapon must be stowed for 3 seconds before readying for the perk to activate.
descriptions.zh-chs:
切换至此武器时：
-30% 充能时间
-20% 伤害
+100 操控性

持续 [?] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability Usage while within 15 metres of an enemy grants Super Ability Energy.

Super Energy Gains with 1|2+ Mods:
2.5% [1.25%] | 4% [2.4%]

Energy Multipliers based on Class:
Hunters: x1 | Titans: x1.2 | Warlocks: x2

Passively grants increased damage against...
• [Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants): 15%
• Turrets, Barricades, Ward of Dawn, Well of Radiance: 30%
• Stasis Crystals: 45%
descriptions.zh-chs:
增加 15% 对载具和建筑物的伤害

增加 30% 对炮台、屏障的伤害

增加 45% 冰影水晶的伤害

可在 [Court's Spreadsheet](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant) 查询敌人分类

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 20 Range but deactivates if you drop to 0 Shield HP (Critical Health).

Buff reactivates 0.5 seconds after your Shields HP fully regenerates.

🡅 Reactivation delay is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

Readying the Sword grants 🡅100% increased Grounded and 🡅80% increased Airborne Lunge Distance for 🡅1.5 seconds.

3 second cooldown between activations.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds. Lunge Distance bonus is increased by 25% (80%⁠🠚⁠100%).
All Armor Charge sources grant an additional Stack.

Modifies Burning Maul into a single-use slam that deals 650% Increased Damage and releases 3 tracking Waves. Waves create Cyclones on impact which also track enemies.

Waves apply 20 (60 with Ember of Ashes equipped) Scorch on Impact. The released Cyclones deal 20 [16] damage every 0.2 seconds, and apply 3 (5 with Ember of Ashes) Scorch every 0.56 seconds.

Consecration's center wave creates a Cyclone that deals ? [3] damage and does not have tracking, however it retains the Scorhing capability.

Damage from multiple Cyclones can overlap.
Refills magazine from reserves on (Glaive) Melee Kills.
descriptions.zh-chs:
造成近战击杀时：
全部武器将重新装填。

descriptions.en:
Diamond Lance creates a Stasis Crystal on impact. Hitting Bosses or Vehicles creates ? additional Stasis Crystals.

While on a Stasis Subclass and standing behind a Rally Barricade:
Scoring a Kill or 3 Precision Hits within ? seconds of each spawns a Diamond Lance next to you.

Shares a Cooldown with the Diamond Lance Aspect but using the Aspect is not required.

Grants linearly scaling benefits as the Magazine drops from 50% of its base capacity to empty:
• 12.5% to 25% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 0 to 30? Stability
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣容量低于 50 % 时：
• 线性提供 -25% ~ -50% 精度锥角尺寸
• -[?]% 精度锥角增长
• +30(?) 稳定性

descriptions.en:
Grants 🡅65 Guard Resistance, Guard Endurance, and (Guard) Charge Rate on Sword Kills until stowed.

🡅 Grants 5 points of each Stat.

Energy Weapons are refunded 1 Ammo upon hitting Matching Elemental Shields.

Refills magazine upon breaking a PVP Combatant, Barrier Champion, or Guardian Shield.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Grants the following benefits while Crouched:
• Prevents Radar Ping when shooting
• ? Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• Increases Arrow Hold Time by 25%

Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness

While standing in a Sunspot:
Solar Kills create Sunspots at the target's location.

Grants 350% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate if your Solar Super is Charged.
descriptions.ko:
태양 하위직업 장착 시:
수류탄과 근접 공격의 기본 재생 속도가 75% 증가합니다.

태양 궁극기 충전 시:
수류탄과 근접 공격의 기본 재생 속도가 350% 증가합니다.

descriptions.en:
Casting your Barricade restores 80 Health and 75 Shield HP to you as well as allies within 12 meters as long as they have line of sight to you.

Super Abilities generate an extra Orb of Power that grants 7.14% Super Energy (regular Super Orb).

Specific Interactions:
• Roaming Supers generate an Orb with the first Kill instead of needing at least 2 Kills for that
• Ward of Dawn generates 4 Orbs with each granting 3.57% Super Energy (up from 3 Orbs granting 2.3% each for a ~2x increase)
descriptions.ko:
방벽 시전 시:
플레이어와 12미터 이내의 아군을 치유하는 치유의 파동을 일으킵니다.
치유의 파동은 58 - 130HP를 회복시킵니다.
아군이 효과를 받기 위해선 시전자의 시선 안에 있어야 합니다.

궁극기가 힘의 보주 하나를 추가로 생성합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你释放屏障时：
会产生一个治疗脉冲，瞬间治愈你和 12 米范围内的盟友。

治疗脉冲治疗 58 点生命值，或者恢复至 130 点生命值。
取恢复血量更多的那个值。

需要对友军有直线视线。

超能会产生额外一个能量球。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Auto Rifles and Machine Guns.

Refills 10% of readied Auto Rifles' and Machine Guns' Magazines every 1.5 seconds.
descriptions.ko:
자동 소총군과 기관총군에 상시로 공중 효율을 30 만큼 올려줍니다.

발사하는 동안 1.5초마다 자동 소총/기관총의 탄창의 10%를 재장전합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
对自动步枪和机枪 +30 空中效率。

对手持中的自动步枪和机枪每 1.5 秒装填其 10% 弹夹。

descriptions.en:
Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Void Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants 30|50|60 Recovery with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Weapons matching your Subclass Element with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

On Elemental, Barrier or Guardian Shield Break:
Applies Kinetic Damage Vulnerability to the enemy, increasing Kinetic damage taken by 50% for 5.5 seconds.

Stacks with all other Buffs and Debuffs.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用武器破坏敌人的护盾（元素护盾、屏障勇士护盾、守护者护盾）时：
对他们施加负面状态，额外承受 50% 的动能伤害，持续 5.5 秒。
不会作用于冰影伤害。

因其为武器特性，故可以与其他负面状态叠加。

descriptions.en:
Refills Magazine from reserves upon dropping to 🡅35% Shield Health. Can activate while stowed.

Grants 50 handling and a 0.95x Ready/Stow Animation Duration multiplier while at or below 🡅35% Shield Health. Buff lingers for 1 second once the condition is no longer met.

🡅 Activates with 5?% more Shield Health remaining.
Readying the Sword grants 30% increased damage for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拔出刀剑时：
+30% 伤害，持续 1.5 秒。

descriptions.en: Increases charge time by 40 and damage by 2%.
descriptions.zh-chs: 增加 40 蓄力时间， 增加 2% 伤害。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following benefits to Hand Cannons:
• 20 Airborne Effectiveness
• 100 Handling to Ready Speed
• 0.6x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier
• -40% Accuracy Cone Size for 4 seconds on Readying

In PVE, upon readying a fully loaded Kinetic Hand Cannon or one matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 60% increased Direct Hit damage per hit for 5.5 seconds. Maxes out at 600% after 10 Hits.

Eriana's Vow only receives 30% increased damage per hit. Sturm's Overcharged Rounds, Malfeasance's Explosive Shadow, and Hawkmoon's Paracausal Shot are unaffected by the buff.

After the Buff runs out or you swap weapons:
Cannot gain stacks or reacquire the damage buff for 10 seconds.
descriptions.ko:
핸드 캐논 총집이 기본으로 내장되어 있습니다.
핸드 캐논을 꺼내는 순간 4초 동안 준비 속도가 100 증가하며 지속 시간 배율이 0.6으로 증가, 공중 효율 20 증가, 그리고 착탄 범위가 40% 좁아집니다.

물리 속성이나 장착한 하위 속성과 일치하는 속성의 핸드 캐논을 준비할 시:
5초 동안 한발 마다 피해가 60% 식 증가하며 10발에서 최대 600% 피해 증가가 부여됩니다./>
수호자에겐 적용되지 않습니다.

경이 핸드 캐논의 피해 배율을 보고 싶으시면 [이 차트를 확인하세요](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1i1KUwgVkd8qhwYj481gkV9sZNJQCE-C3Q-dpQutPCi4/edit#rangeid=1312688627)

버프의 지속 시간이 끝나거나, 무기를 바꾸거나, 5초 동안 사격했을 시:
버프를 10초 동안 얻을 수 없습니다.

descriptions.en:
Deadfall returns Ability Energy per Enemy Tethered:
• X% Super Energy up to the maximum of 50%
• 10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy

Moebius Quiver can fire an additional volley per Super Activation.

Passively grants 30% Damage Resistance against PVE Combatants while Airborne.

Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25% and Slide Distance by 33%. Greatly increases the initial momentum of all Jump Abilities.

Grants the following to Weapons matching your Subclass Element 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier
Kills grant 5% Class Ability Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs: 使用此武器完成最后一击可获得 5% 职业技能能量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power on Powered Melee Kills that grants 0.8%|1.1%|1.25%|1.5% Super Energy with 1|2|3|4 Mods equipped. (4 Mods is only achievable through Exotic Armor)

10|5|1 second cooldown between activations.

Finishing a reload within 5.3 seconds of a Weapon Kill grants Voltshot for 🡅8 seconds.

While Voltshot is active, your next Weapon Hit applies Jolt and consumes the buff.

🡅 Buff can be held 1 second longer.

After 1.25 seconds of sprinting and while maintaining both sprint and a movement speed of at least 5 meters per second:
Grants 150% [75%] Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.

Deactivates once Class Ability Energy is full.
Scoring a Melee Hit grants 50 Reload Speed and a 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier for 5 seconds.

Arc Weapon Kills progress a counter that spawns an Ionic Trace at the killed target's location upon reaching 100%.

Activation progress granted by [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 34%
• Elites, Players: 67%
• Minibosses and Bosses: 100%

Killing a Jolted enemy creates an Ionic Trace.

10 second cooldown between activations.
Arc Grenades apply Jolt on Hit.

Sliding over Ammo Bricks refills your held weapon from reserves and grants Melee Energy.

Special Ammo Bricks grant 20% Melee Energy and Heavy Ammo Bricks grant 50%.

Grants 25% [10%] Damage Resistance while within 15 meters of 3+ enemies.

Remains active for 2 seconds once the activation condition is no longer met.
Arc Special Weapon Kills while Amplified create an explosion, Blinding enemies within ? meters.

Lightning Grenades release an additional lightning bolt. (4🠚5)

Pulse Grenades release an additional 2 pulses. (6🠚8)

Storm Grenades release a third volley, dealing the same damage as the second volley.

When combined with the Touch of Thunder titan aspect, Storm Grenade's Roaming Storm lasts 1.5 seconds longer. (4🠚5.5s)
Grants 400% [200%] Additional Base Grenade and Melee Ability Regeneration Rate while at Critical Health.

Passively grants 100 Guard Resistance and Guard Endurance to Swords.

While Guarding:
• Grants 50% [10%] Damage Resistance (Stacks multiplicatively with the Damage Resistance provided by Sword Guard against blocked attacks)
• Blocking a hit grants 2 Stacks of Perfect Guard. Maximum of 100 Stacks. (Cannot gain stacks while you have the Restoration buff)
• Sword Energy does not decay from holding guard

All Stacks are removed if no hits have been blocked in the last 10 seconds.

Dealing Sword Damage with active Perfect Guard Stacks grants Restoration x2:
4 [3] second duration at 1 Stack, scaling up to 16 [6] seconds at 100 Stacks. (Ember of Solace increases this by 50%, up to 24 [9] seconds)

Upon blocking damage with Glaive Shield:
Decreases Glaive Block's Movement Speed Penalty by ?% for ? seconds, or until you stop blocking.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Weapon Hits grant 1 Stack of the perk for 1 second up to the maximum of 5 Stacks.

Benefits granted per Stack:
• Grants ?% Flinch Resistance
• Reduces Visual Weapon Shake 34%
• Reduces Reticle Bounce by 34%

Stacks gained per Weapon Hit by weapon type:
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 2
• Pulse Rifles, Sidearms: 1.5
• Other Weapons: 1

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.
Gain 1 Ammo after scoring 3 Powered Hits within 2? seconds of each.
descriptions.zh-chs:
2 秒内进行三次有能量的轻攻击：
提供 1 枚刀剑弹药。

descriptions.en: Grants 10%|13%|15% Grenade Ability Energy on Orb of Power Pickups with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upon Sliding after Sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
Grants 15% increased damage and 20% decreased Charge Time for ? seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后滑行：
+20% 伤害，0.8 倍充能时间，持续 [?] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Extends Armor Charge decay time to 15|18|20 seconds with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Armor Charge decays at the rate of 1 Stack every 10 seconds by default with Passive Mods equipped.

Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants less than 4 meters away by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

When a Melee Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Melee Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Melee Energy refunds.

Melee Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Bug: Doesn't work if you have more recharged Melee Ability Energy than a single ability charge.
Being within 15 meters of 2 Allies grants 20% increased Precision Damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
[?] 米范围呢有两个以上友军时：
+20% 精准伤害。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Hits grant stacks of Enlightened Action for 2 seconds. Stacks 12 times.

Stat bonuses at 1|2|…|12 Stacks:
2|7|12|15|20|25|30|35|38|40|45|50 Handling and Reload Speed

Stacks granted per hit by Weapon Type:
• Hand Cannons: 3 Stacks
• Bows: ? Stacks
• Automatic Weapons: 1 Stack

🡅 Maximum Stat Bonus is increased by 5. (50🠚55, breakdown by Stacks currently unknown)

On Grenade Ability Usage:
Changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Kinetic weapons lose their Passive Damage Bonus (10-15%) against PVE Combatants.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用手雷技能后：
将此武器的伤害类型切换至对应你的分支职业的属性，直到你收起此武器。

descriptions.en:
Grants 30|50|60 Discipline with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Glaive Projectile Kills grant 30% increased Glaive Melee damage for 10 seconds.

Dealing Projectile or Melee damage extends the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 10 seconds.

Remains active while stowed.

Extends Armor Charge decay time to 15|18|20 seconds with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Armor Charge decays at the rate of 1 Stack every 10 seconds by default with Passive Mods equipped.
Grants 15% decreased Charge/Draw Time while within 15 meters of 2 enemies. The buff lingers for 1.5 seconds once no longer surrounded.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当 15 米范围内有两个以上敌人时：
-15% 充能/蓄力时间。

增益持续 1.5 秒，效果线性减弱。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Stasis Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Refills 10% of the Magazine from reserves on Weapon Kills.

Submachine Gun and Auto Rifle Kills refill 17% of the magazine.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
重新装填 10% 弹匣（大部分武器）。

冲锋枪和自动步枪的装填量为 17%。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants:
• 100 Handling
• 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier
• -55%(?) Auto Aim Cone Size (No effect on Reticle Stickiness)
descriptions.zh-chs: 被动提升 +100 操控性，0.95x 拔枪动画系数，-80% 瞄准辅助锥角尺寸。

descriptions.en:
Assisting Allies by Reviving, Healing, or Empowering them, or granting Subclass Buffs to them grants 10 Stacks of Noble Deeds. Maximum of 10 Stacks.

Kills remove 1 [2] Stacks of Noble Deeds.

Grants 30 Handling and 30 Reload Speed while you have active Stacks. Swords receive 20 Charge Rate instead.

Replaces Towering Barricade with Assault Barricade:
• 33% decreased HP (600🠚400)
• Takes 25% increased damage from Enemy Players
• 50% decreased duration (20🠚10 seconds)
• 72.4% increased Cooldown Time
• Allows caster and allies to shoot through it
descriptions.ko:
치솟은 방벽을 변형시킵니다.

공격 방벽은 체력과 지속 시간이 줄어들지만 아군들이 방벽을 뚫고 사격 할 수 있게 해줍니다.

방벽 수치
600HP -> 350HP
20초 -> 10초
descriptions.zh-chs:
将巍峨屏障变为突击屏障。

可以让你和你的盟友穿过它进行射击。

突击屏障属性：
600生命值 -> 350生命值
20秒 -> 10秒

descriptions.en:
Increases Arc Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Class Ability usage drops a Parting Gift that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 440 [120] damage over a 7.5 meter radius. Detonates instantly on contact with a surface or an enemy.

Parting Gift has an additional effect based on Subclass:
• Arc: Applies Lite Blind for 7 [3] seconds
• Solar: Applies 40 Scorch (60 with Ember of Ashes)
• Stasis: Applies 40 [20] Slow Stacks
• Void: Applies Lite Suppression for 9 [7] seconds
• Strand: Applies Sever for ? seconds

Lite Suppression does not Suppress guardians in their Super. Lite Blind does not synergize with the Arc elemental sandbox.
Grants 10%|13%|15% Melee Ability Energy on Orb of Power Pickups with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants the following benefits while hipfiring:
• 25 Stability and 15 Aim Assist
• 2.7° Larger Precision Aim Angle
• 30% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 20% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• 20% increased Damage Falloff Distance

The Damage Falloff increase does not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.
descriptions.zh-chs:
腰射时：
• +20%:
    • 瞄准辅助有效距离
    • 准星吸附有效距离
    • 有效射程距离
• -15% 精度锥角尺寸
• +15 瞄准辅助
• +2.7° 精准角度范畴
• +25 稳定性

有效射程距离系数不会作用于遗言、霰弹枪、狙击步枪、融合步枪。

descriptions.en:
Increases damage against shielded targets:
• 125% increase against PVE Combatant (Over)Shields
• 50% increase against Barrier Champion Shields
• 20% increase against Player Overshields and for bodyshots against Players with Woven Mail

Combatant Shields include Elemental Shields, and Lucent Moth/Shadow Legion [Tech Pack](https://www.destinypedia.com/Tech_Pack) Overshields.
descriptions.zh-chs:
对拥有覆盖护盾的目标造成额外伤害。

+20% 伤害对覆盖护盾。
+10% 伤害对战斗人员护盾。

descriptions.en:
Immediately upon firing, for 0.6 seconds:
40 Stability, -50% Recoil, and -10% Accuracy Cone Size.

Fusion Rifles Only Receive 25% of the benefits.

[Controller-Only] Weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.
descriptions.zh-chs:
开火时：
+40 稳定性，-50% 最大后坐力，-10% 精度锥角尺寸，持续 0.6 秒。

融合步枪仅获得上述数值 25% 的增益。

[手柄] 轻触扳机键即会开火。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Weapons matching your Subclass Element 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Grants 30|50|60 Mobility with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

On Weapon kills while Super Ability is charged:
Grants 20 Discipline and 20 Strength for 12 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
超能能量全满时使用此武器完成最后一击：
在 12 秒内 +20 力量、+20 纪律。

descriptions.en:
Starts linearly increasing Explosive Damage 0.2 seconds after the projectile is fired. Reaches maximum strength after 1.1 seconds at 25%.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Blast Radius.

Weapon Kills grant 🡅11% Grenade Ability Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant 🡅22%.

Using your Grenade Ability refills the Magazine with a 3 second cooldown.

🡅 Grenade Ability Energy gains are increased by 10%. (e.g. 10%🠚11%)

Ability usage grants 'Empowered' for other abilities for 5 seconds depending on the Ability used.
e.g.: Barricade Usage 🠚 'Empowered Melee' and 'Empowered Grenade'

Empowered Melee x1|x2:
• 10% | 20% increased damage
• 400% [100%] | 800% [200%] Additional Base Melee Regeneration Rate

Empowered Grenade x1|x2:
• 20% [10%] | 35% [20%] increased damage
• 400% [100%] | 800% [200%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate

Empowered Barricade x1|x2:
• 25%|50% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate
• Currently does not grant a benefit to Barricade HP despite stating it does
descriptions.ko:
능력을 사용하면 다른 능력들이 10[5]초 동안 강화됩니다.
(예: 방벽 사용 -> 수류탄과 근접 능력 강화)

강화 되었을 때:
강화된 근접 능력: 10% | 20% 피해 증가.
근접 능력 기본 재생 속도 400% [100%] || 800% [200%] 증가.

강화된 수류탄: 20% [10%] | 35% [20%] 피해 증가.
수류탄 기본 재생 속도400% [100%] || 800% [200%] 증가.

강화된 방벽: 방벽 체력 증가.
직업 능력 기본 재생 속도 150%[37.5%] || 300%[75%] 증가.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用一个技能（手雷、近战或屏障）可为另外两个技能赋能 10[5] 秒。
例如：使用屏障，可赋能近战和手雷技能。

强化近战：
10% | 20% 额外伤害。
400%[100%] || 800%[200%] 额外近战回复效率。

强化手雷：
20%[10%] | 35%[20%] 额外伤害。
400%[100%] || 800%[200%] 额外手雷回复效率。

强化屏障：
X% | Y% 额外生命值。
150%[37.5%] || 300%[75%] 额外屏障回复效率。

descriptions.en:
When a Grenade Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Grenade Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Grenade Energy refunds.

Grenade Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Weapon Kills apply Volatile to enemies in a 6.5 meter radius around the target.

3 second cooldown after activation.

🡅 Cooldown is reduced.

Collecting Ionic Traces grants 2% Super Energy with Chaos Reach selected.

Chaos Reach refunds 10% Super Energy on hit.
0.75 second cooldown between refunds.

This can increase Chaos Reach Duration by ~120%.
descriptions.ko:
혼돈 범위를 적중시키면 궁극기 에너지의 10%를 반환받습니다. 0.75초의 쿨다운이 있습니다.
궁극기의 지속 시간을 100% 까지 증가시킬 수 있습니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
混沌之触每次命中回复 10% 的超能能量。
每次回复有 0.75秒 冷却时间。可以增加最多 100% 的超能持续时间。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants:
• 100 Handling
• 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier
• 🡅-50%(?) Auto Aim Cone Size (No effect on Reticle Stickiness)

🡅 Auto Aim Penalty is decreased by an additive 5%(?).

Splits off 55% of the Weapon's Bodyshot damage into an Explosive damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PvE and isn't affected by Damage Falloff.

Payload detonates after a 0.6 second delay.

[PvE] Total damage is increased by ~16.5% of the weapon's Bodyshot damage. On Crits, the overall increase is 10.9% for Adaptive/Precision Hand Cannons and 10.17% for Aggressive Hand Cannons.

[PvP] Don't want to talk about it.
descriptions.zh-chs:
将 55% 的武器伤害转化为 增伤 30% 的爆炸伤害，该部分伤害不会因距离衰减。爆炸在 0.6 秒后产生。

[PVE] 身体伤害提高 16%。 精准伤害将根据武器精准伤害系数变化。
[PVP] 总伤害不变。

descriptions.en:
Switching to the Weapon grants 100 Ready/Stow Handling and a 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier for 1 second.

Buff is removed as soon as ADS input is pressed.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.
Refills 1 round into the Magazine from reserves upon blocking damage. 1 second cooldown after activation.
Grants 5% increased damage against PvE Combatant Shields. Bullets overpenetrate enemies once.
descriptions.es:
Otorga de forma pasiva:
+5 al Alcance
+5% al Daño contra escudos de enemigos

Las balas son capaces de penetrar enemigos 1 vez
descriptions.zh-chs:
增加 5% 对战斗人员护盾的伤害。

子弹可以穿透敌人一次。

descriptions.en:
Thunderclap Kills refund Melee Energy based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• 9%: Tier 1 Minors
• 13%: Tier 2 Minors, Tier 1 Elites
• 15%: Enemy Players
• 20%: Tier 3 Minors, Tier 2 Elites
• 30%: Tier 4 Minors, Tier 3 Elites
• 40%: Tier 4 Elites, Minibosses
• 50%: Bosses

Thunderclap strikes enemies within ? meters with lightning, dealing 200 [50] damage. Lightning Damage is increased by 50% while Amplified.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Weapons matching your Subclass Element with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Weapon Kills with a Matching Subclass Element grant a Stack of Death Throes for 11 seconds. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Death Throes grants 50% additional Base Grenade Recharge Rate and 20% increased Grenade Damage per Stack.

On Grenade Ability Usage with active Death Throes Stacks, for 5 seconds:
Allies receive 'Feel The Flames' while within 20 meters.

'Feel the Flames' grants 10x Grenade Recharge Rate.

Grenade Regeneration Rate Multiplier is applied after all Additive Grenade Regeneration Rate Modifiers.

Upon breaking a Combatant's Elemental Shield or the Shield of a Guardian in their Super:
Grants a 30 HP Overshield for 🡅11.4 seconds.

🡅 Increases the Overshield duration by 1.4 seconds.

Increases damage by 12.1% [3%] to 25.6% [6%] as the Magazine drops from 🡅55% of its base capacity to empty.

The buff in PVE ranges between 10.3% and 22.9% instead on Fusion Rifles and Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles.

🡅 Activates with 5% more of the Magazine Capacity remaining.

Upon finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Overfills Magazine from reserves based on the amount of Kills scored within 7 seconds of each.

Overfill amount maxes out at 150% of the Magazine Capacity. Always rounds up.

Overfill amount per Kill scored:
• Primary Weapons: 20%
• Special and Power Weapons: 10%.
descriptions.es:
Luego de recargar despues de  [?] segundos despues de una Baja con el arma:
Aumenta la capacidad del Cargador por baja dentro de [?] segundos

Puede llegar a ser un 150% la cantidad del cargador original. Redondea hacia arriba.

Armas Primarias reciben un 20% a la capacidad aumentada por baja. Armas Especiales y Pesadas reciben un 10%

Aumentado: Otorga +5 a la velocidad de recarga de forma pasiva
descriptions.zh-chs:
该武器击杀后 7 秒内换弹：
7 秒内的每个击杀都可过量填加弹匣，

最高过量填加 50%，计算结果向上取整。

 主武器：每个击杀过量填加 20%。
 特殊武器和  重武器：每个击杀过量填加 10%。

descriptions.en:
While moving at a minimum of 2 meters per second:
Gain a Stack after 2 and 🡅9 seconds.

Each stack provides 10 Stability, 10 Handling, and 10 Reload Speed. All stacks are removed if movement speed is below 2 m/s for 0.5 seconds.

Works and can activate while stowed.

🡅 Second Stack is gained 1 second sooner.

Taking damage while Guarding with a Sword grants Class Ability Energy:
• 1.5% for every point of Melee damage Blocked
• 1% for every point of "other" damage Blocked
• 0.5% for every point of Non-Blocked damage (getting hit from behind)
descriptions.zh-chs:
格挡伤害时：
根据伤害量获取职业技能能量。

可获取大量能量。

descriptions.en:
Grants Melee Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Melee Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Upon scoring a Kill or hitting every shot in a burst:
Grants 20% increased damage and 10% decreased Charge Time for 2 seconds.

🡅 Currently doesn't grant any measurable benefits.

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine and grants 25? Stability and 20 Handling for 3 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed. Buff duration also serves as a cooldown for Magazine Refills but this can be bypassed by stowing the weapon.
descriptions.zh-chs:
滑行时：
重新装填 15% 弹匣，+20 稳定性，+20 操控性，持续 3 秒或直到开枪。发多次该特性效果。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills apply Volatile to enemies in a 6.5 meter radius around the target.

3 second cooldown after activation.

Grants 20 Stability, 60 Handling, and 60 Reload Speed while Grenade, Melee, and Class Abilities are all uncharged.

Swords receive 50 Charge Rate and 40 Guard Endurance instead.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Kinetic Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Readying the Sword grants 80% increased Grounded and 64% increased Airborne Lunge Distance for 1 second.

3 second cooldown between activations.
descriptions.zh-chs:
切换到此武器时：
提升 100% 刀剑前冲距离，持续 1 秒。

移动速度过快时将立即结束该效果。

冷却时间 4 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing extremely close to the barricade also consistently prevents enemy melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in darkness and temporarily blinding them.

Weapon Kills grant 10% increased damage for 7 seconds (x1 Stack).

Grenade or Melee Kills grant 20% increased damage for 7 seconds (x2). Scoring another Grenade or Melee Kill increases this to 30% (x3).

Can activate while stowed. Weapon Kills refresh the buff duration.

Weapon fires Full Auto. (Identical to the setting)

Decreases Firing Delay by 10% on Shotguns.
descriptions.zh-chs:
扣住扳机时将以全自动模式进行射击。

使用霰弹枪时会提高 10% 射速。

descriptions.en:
Void Invisibility effects last 2 seconds longer.

While Invisible:
• Grants 100 Recovery and 100 Reload Speed
• 400% [100%] Additional Base Melee Regeneration Rate.
• 1 to 2+ enemies within 15 meters will increase the bonus to a total of 600% [200%] and 800% [300%]
descriptions.ko:
공허 은신의 지속 시간이 2초 증가합니다.

은신한 상태에서:
기본 근접 능력 재생 속도가 400% [100%] 증가합니다.
15미터 이내에 있는 적의 수 만큼 600% [200%] and 800% [300%]까지 증가합니다.

회복력과 재장전 속도로 100으로 증가시킵니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
虚空隐身效果持续时间增加 2 秒。

隐身时：
• 400% [100%] 额外的基础近战充能速度。
• 15 米范围内的敌人将使额外充能速度增加至 600% [200%] 到 800% [300%]。（和敌人数量相关）

+100 恢复
+100 填装速度

descriptions.en:
Hits and Kills with your Weapon grant you 'Points'. Hitting Point thresholds grants Stacks of Field Test.

Maximum of 5 Stacks. Buff is only removed on death.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 3 | 6 | 9 | 12 | 20 Range
• 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 50 Reload Speed
• ? | ? | ? | ? | 30? Stability
• ? | ? | ? | ? | ? Handling
• 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 55 Charge Rate (Swords)
• 5 | 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 Guard Resistance (Swords)

Points required for 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• Primary Weapons: 51|151|351|651|1001
• Special Weapons: 26|76|176|326|501
• Power Weapons: 11|31|71|131|201

Each Hit grants 1 Point regardless of Weapon Archetype and Enemy Rank. Does not require Direct Hits.

Points granted by Kills are based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1-2 Minors: 1 Point
• Tier 3-4 Minors, Tier 2+ Elites, and higher: 4 Points
• Tier 1 Elites: 5 Points
• Enemy Players: 10 Points

Kill Point Multipliers by Weapon Archetype:
• Primary Weapons and Shotguns: 5x
• Breech-Loaded Grenade Launchers: 2x

Increases Super Energy Gains from Grenade Kills based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) with 1|2|3 Mods equipped:
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 1%|?|?
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: ?|?|?
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: ?|?|?
• T4 Minors, T3-T4 Elites, and higher: 5%|?|?
• Players: ?|?|?

Bonus Super Energy gains from Grapple Melee Kills are reduced by 50%.

Grenade Ability usage and Powered Melee hits grant 1 Stack of Well-Rounded. Super Ability usage grants 2 Stacks.

Grants 🡅12 Range, 🡅12 Stability, and 🡅12 Handling per stack for 15 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 2.

Grants 20% [10%] increased damage to targets standing on 1? meter lower ground than you.

Does not work while airborne.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13

Upon readying the weapon within 3.5 seconds of getting kills with other weapons while it was stowed:
Grants 10 Handling, 10 Reload Speed, and 10 Stability per Stack for 7.5 seconds.

Maximum of 3 Stacks. Buff is removed on stow.
descriptions.zh-chs:
此武器收起时使用武器或技能完成最后一击，并在 3.5 秒内拔出此武器：
每层增益 +10 操控性，+10 填装速度，+10 稳定性，持续 7.5 秒。

最多叠加 3 层。收枪时移除该增益。

descriptions.en:
Finishing a reload within 5.3 seconds of a Weapon Kill grants Voltshot for 7 seconds.

While Voltshot is active, your next Weapon Hit applies Jolt and consumes the buff.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 3 秒内进行填装：
7 秒内的下一次武器命中会震颤敌人。

此次震颤的伤害量可以通过其他增益效果提升。

descriptions.en: Allies within 18 meters receive 1 Armor Charge on Orb of Power Pickup.

Proximity Explosive Knife applies 60 Scorch on detonation. (Unaffected by Ember of Ashes)

Proximity Explosive Knife kills cause an Ignition.

Grants 500% Additional Base Melee Recharge Rate while Proximity Knife remains unexploded.
descriptions.ko:
근접 칼이 폭발할 시 알 수 없는 양의 소각 스택을 입힙니다. 적중시켜 처치하면 해당 타겟을 점화시킵니다.

근접 칼이 폭발하지 않고 있는 동안 알 수 없는 만큼의 근접 공격 재생 속도를 증가시킵니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
感应飞刀在爆炸时施加 60 层灼烧。
如果使用感应飞刀直接击中击杀敌人，则会触发点燃效果。

感应飞刀未爆炸时，近战技能基础冷却速度增加 500%。

descriptions.en:
While in Spectral Blades:
Refunds Super Energy on Heavy Attack based on the number of Spectral Blade Kills.

Super Energy Refund after 1|2|3|4|5+ Kills:
• PVE: 11.1% | 14.3% | 16.5% | 16.9% | 17.1%
• PVP: 8.3% | 12.5% | 14.2% | 15.8% | 16.7%
descriptions.ko:
스팩트럼 칼날 시전 중:
강공격을 하면 스팩트럼 칼날로 처치한 적의 수에 비례해 궁극기 에너지를 반환합니다.

궁극기 반환률:
descriptions.zh-chs:
在超能鬼灵利刃期间：
根据重攻击的击杀数量，恢复超能能量。

基于击杀数量的超能能量增长（%）

descriptions.en: Grants an extra Class Ability Charge.
Immediately Starts Health Regeneration on Orb of Power Pickups.

Grants 1 Armor Charges to Allies within 21 meters on Super Cast. Allies on a different Subclass Element are granted 2 Charges.

Caster receives 1 Armor Charge if already charged.

Kinetic Damage Precision Kills cause enemies to explode, dealing up to 280 [100] Elemental Damage matching your Subclass in a ? meter radius.

Enemies hit by the explosion receive an elemental debuff corresponding to your Subclass:
• Arc: Blinds for ? [1] seconds
• Solar: Applies 15 Scorch (20 with Ember of Ashes)
• Stasis: Applies 30 Slow Stacks for 7 seconds (8 with Whisper of Durance)
• Strand: Severs for 6 seconds (8 with Thread of Continuity)
• Void: Weakens for 4 seconds
descriptions.ko:
물리 피해 정밀타 처치 시:
적이 현재 장착한 하위직업의 속성 폭발을 일으킵니다.
폭발 반경과 피해 사거리는 무기의 사거리 수치에 기반합니다.

중심부에서 약 200의 피해를 일으킵니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
动能武器取得精准最后一击时：
敌人释放出与当前所选职业相匹配的元素爆炸，造成最多 210 [200] 伤害。

爆炸半径和衰减距离会根据武器的射程属性有细微的改变。

descriptions.en:
Grants additional Super Energy on Kills (by either you or allies) while inside your Well of Radiance and below 50% Super Energy.

Amount of Super Energy gained is reduced by 1.5% for each successive Kill, down to a minimum of 4% Super Energy per Kill:
10% 🠚 8.5% 🠚 7% 🠚 5.5% 🠚 4% 🠚 4% ...

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a 20% [15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.

Upon breaking a Combatant's Elemental Shield or the Shield of a Guardian in their Super:
Grants a 30 HP Overshield for 10 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破战斗人员或正在使用超能的守护者的护盾时：
获得一个持续 10 秒，30 生命值的覆盖护盾。

descriptions.en:
Increases damage by 12.1% [3%] to 25.6% [6%] as the Magazine drops from 50% of its base capacity to empty.

The buff in PVE ranges between 10.3% and 22.9% instead on Fusion Rifles and Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles.

Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

On Elemental, Barrier or Guardian Shield Break:
Applies Kinetic Damage Vulnerability to the enemy, increasing Kinetic damage taken by 50% for 5.5 seconds.

Stacks with all other Buffs and Debuffs.

🡅 Debuff Duration is increased.

Weapon Kills grant 2 Stacks of Shot Swap, granting 100? Ready/Stow Handling.

Maximum of 8 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack when readying or stowing the weapon.

🡅 Stronger effect.

Upon blocking damage with the Glaive Shield:
20% increased Projectile Damage for 4 seconds or until no longer blocking.

Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用偃月格挡伤害后：
+20% 弹头伤害，持续 4 秒，或直到停止格挡。

格挡任意伤害可刷新持续时间。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Glaive Projectile Kills grant 30% increased Glaive Melee damage for 🡅11 seconds.

Dealing Projectile or Melee damage extends the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 🡅11 seconds.

Remains active while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon Blocking a Melee Attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Disorients and Weakens the enemy for 4 seconds, making them receive 20% increased damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
格挡后 0.5 秒内受到近战伤害：
抑制并虚弱该名敌人，使他受到额外 20% 伤害，持续 4 秒。

descriptions.en: Grants a 200 HP Overshield for the duration of your Finisher Animation.

Increases Arc Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants the following if no allies are within 15 meters:
• 10% decreased ADS Movement Speed Penalty
• 0.85x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内没有盟友的情况下瞄准：
-2.5% 移动速度惩罚
[0.85x?] 瞄准动画系数

descriptions.en:
Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Strand Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

After being in Combat for 6 seconds:
Grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness and 35% Flinch Resistance for 10 seconds.

Can activate while stowed. Dealing and receiving damage refreshes the buff duration.

For Pefect Float, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 3 seconds.

Grants the following benefits while Crouching:
• Doubles Radar Resolution (6🠚12 Sectors)
• Prevents Crouch Speed from being decreased below 4 meters per second

Upon Suppressing an enemy:
• Refills readied weapon from reserves
• Grants 30 mobility for 10 seconds
• Increases Forward Movement Speed by 4% for 10s

10 second cooldown between activations.

Killing Suppressed enemies spawns a Void Breach.

Grenade Ability Damage grants Melee Energy once per Damage Instance.

'Damage Over Time' grenades only provide Melee Energy once per damage tick regardless of the number of enemies damaged. Other grenades only grant Melee Energy once per submunition.

Melee Energy granted per Damage Instance:
• 3%: Void Spike, Void Wall, Scatter Grenade, and Vortex Grenade
• 8%: Axion Bolt, Suppressor Grenade, and Magnetic Grenade (including when used with the Chaos Accelerant aspect)
Void Ability Kills cause enemies to explode, dealing up to 160 [130] damage in a 7 meter radius.

Improves lingering Void Grenade Abilities:
• Axion Bolt: tracks enemies for ?% longer
• Void Spike: lasts 40% longer and starts dealing damage 0.1 seconds earlier
• Void Wall: lasts 60% longer
• Vortex Grenade: lasts 25% longer (55% longer when overcharged by Chaos Accelerant) and starts dealing damage 0.13 seconds earlier

Melee Kills grant Grenade Energy based on the [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the killed target:
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 7.5%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 11%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites, and Players: 16.25%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%
Void Grenades apply Weaken on hit for 5 [2.5] seconds.

Kills grant an additional ?% Super Energy while 3 enemies are within 8 meters.

1? second cooldown between activations.
Melee Kills start Health Regeneration for you and allies within ? meters.

Void Buffs applied to you last longer.

Devour and Void Overshield: 50% increased duration
Invisibility: 40% increased duration

Specific increases from Echo of Persistence for Void Buff sources can be found in their descriptions.

Orb of Power pickups grant 1 Stack of Explosive Light. Maximum of 🡅7 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack per Shot, granting 100 Blast Radius and increased damage.

Grenade Launchers: 60% increased Explosive damage.

Rocket Launchers: 25% increased Impact and Explosive damage. (No effect on Wolfpack Rounds)

🡅 Maximum number of Stacks is increased by 1.

Increases Magazine Capacity by 1 and Total Reserve Size by 5. decreases Firing Delay by 25%.

Decreases Blast Radius by 🡅25, Reload Speed by 🡅15, and damage by 25%.

🡅 Stat penalties are reduced by 5.

Increases Solar Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.
Reloading randomly overfills the Magazine from reserves by 10% to 50% of the base Magazine Capacity (rounded up). Average of a 30% overfill.
descriptions.zh-chs:
装填时：
随机过量装填弹匣容量 10% ~ 50% 的弹药。
数值向上取整。

descriptions.en:
Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Currently bugged and does not work with Swords.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Kinetic Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants the following while Crouched:
• 🡅55 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• 0.8x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier

Passively grants 🡅40 Inventory Size Stat. (Equivalent of 2 Reserve Armor Mods)

🡅 Grants 5 more Reload Speed and 10 more Inventory Size Stat.

Refills 4% of the Magazine of Trace Rifles from reserves every 0.7 seconds. Works while stowed.

Rapidly scoring 5 Trace Rifle hits on a [Miniboss, Champion, Boss, or Vehicle](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) marks them for 10 seconds. Additional hits refresh the mark duration. Does not require Direct Hits.

Only one target can be marked at a time and the mark cannot be transferred to a different target unless the duration runs out or the enemy is defeated.

Ally kills on Marked Enemies generate Heavy Ammo for allies and Special Ammo for the wearer.

Multiple Cenotaph Mask users can mark the same target allowing each of them to individually trigger the ammo generation.

Spawned Ammo Bricks grant 10.33% of your total reserves (rounded up to the nearest whole number).

Enhances the effects of the following Origin Traits and weapons with them are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Nano-Munitions (Season of Undying Reprisals):
Halved delay between gaining Stacks: 3s 🠚 1.5s

Nanotech Tracer Rockets (Lightfall):
Rockets deal 20% Increased Damage:
• 22.4 [14] 🠚 26.9 [16.8] Impact Damage
• 24 [15] 🠚 28.8 [18] Explosive Damage
(Does NOT affect Quicksilver Storm's rockets)

Sundering (Warlord's Ruin):
Doubled? Stat Bonuses

Increases Ability Damage by 5% against Scorn and Taken Combatants.

Includes the caster's weapon damage while standing in their Well of Radiance.
Grants the ability to equip the Solar/Strand and Solar/Stasis (Thermodynamic) Siphon helmet mods.

While ⁠Radiant:
Dealing ⁠Solar Weapon Damage applies 30 ⁠Scorch Stacks (45 with ⁠Ember of Ashes) to PVE Combatants that aren't already ⁠Scorched.

Solar Effects initially triggered by Kindling Trigger (i.e. an ⁠Ignition where the initial ⁠Scorch was applied by Kindling Trigger) do not benefit from Weapon or Ability Damage increases.

Does not work while standing in a ⁠Well of Radiance.
Scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with Grenade Launchers or Rocket Launchers grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Increases Kinetic Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants 20% [10%] increased damage to targets standing on 1? meter lower ground than you.

Does not work while airborne.

Increases Solar Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While Aiming Down Sights with Kinetic Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

On Barricade Placement:
Unleashes a Solar Wave that returns back to the Barricade after traveling 18.5 meters.

The Wave deals 240 [100] damage and applies 60 [30] Scorch when returning (unaffected by Ember of Ashes).

Solar Kills grant 25% Class Ability Energy.
descriptions.ko:
방벽 시전 시:
18.5미터를 나아간 뒤 다시 방벽으로 돌아오는 태양 파동을 내보냅니다.
100 피해를 줍니다.

태양 처치 시 직업 능력 에너지 25%를 반환합니다.

descriptions.en:
Dealing Melee Damage grants the following for the next 3 shots within 5 seconds:
• 30 Reload Speed and 30 Handling
• 50% increased damage

Weapon Hits grant 1 Stack of the perk for 1 second up to the maximum of 5 Stacks.

Benefits granted per Stack:
• Grants ?% Flinch Resistance
• Reduces Visual Weapon Shake 34%
• Reduces Reticle Bounce by 34%

Stacks gained per Weapon Hit by weapon type:
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 2
• Pulse Rifles, Sidearms: 1.5
• Other Weapons: 1
descriptions.zh-chs:
连续命中时：
降低最大后坐力角度、武器晃动。
最高叠加 5 层，持续 1 秒。

使用手柄时移除准星抖动。

descriptions.en:
Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine and grants 🡅30? Stability and 🡅25 Handling for 3 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed. Buff duration also serves as a cooldown for Magazine Refills but this can be bypassed by stowing the weapon.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 5.

Weapon Kills trigger an elemental explosion that deals up to 84 [56] damage in a 3 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
descriptions.zh-chs: 武器击杀会触发一次元素爆炸。

descriptions.en: When fully drawn, the bolt creates a large concussive blast that knocks combatants back.

Scoring 50% of the Base Magazine Capacity as Precision Hits grants 20% increased damage for 🡅12 seconds.

Stowing or Reloading resets the Precision Hit counter but the buff remains active while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Kinetic Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Void Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Class Ability Usage while within 15 metres of an enemy grants Super Ability Energy.

Super Energy Gains with 1|2+ Mods:
2.5% [1.25%] | 4% [2.4%]

Energy Multipliers based on Class:
Hunters: x1 | Titans: x1.2 | Warlocks: x2

On Weapon Kill, for 7 seconds:
• 30 Stability
• 45% increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 3-3.5° Precision Aim Angle
• -95%? Accuracy Cone Size
• -95%? Accuracy Cone Growth.

Only applies to hipfiring.

Weapon or Grenade Kills grant a Stacking Damage Buff and 20 Handling for 🡅5 seconds. Grenade Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly.

Damage Buff at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Class Ability Usage changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Arc Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles, Swords, and Grand Overture.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles and Wardcliff Coil do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Grants the following benefits for 4 seconds upon scoring 4 Hipfire Hits within 4? seconds of each:
• 20 Range, Handling, and Reload Speed
• 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier
• 1.5° Larger Precision Aim Cone
• Decreases ADS Movement Speed Penalty by 10%

Replaces Grenade Ability with Barri-Nade on Class Ability Usage. Barri-Nade is lost if Class Ability fully recharges.

Barri-Nade spawns your selected Barricade type on the impact location and inherits the benefits of Aspects such as Bastion and Drengr's Lash. Non-barricade class abilities default to Towering Barricade and match its cooldown.

Enemies within 5? meters of the Barri-Nade's impact location are disoriented. Spawned Barricade deals no Contact Damage within 2 seconds of its creation.

Barri-nade has no collision with enemies.

Spawns an Orb of Power on Powered Melee Kills that grants 0.8%|1.1%|1.25%|1.5% Super Energy with 1|2|3|4 Mods equipped. (4 Mods is only achievable through Exotic Armor)

10|5|1 second cooldown between activations.

On Weapon Kill, for 5 seconds:
• 50 Mobility
• 40 Handling and 20 Range
• 5% increased Damage Falloff Distance

Additional Kills extend the duration by 5 seconds, up to 8 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+50 敏捷，+20 射程，+40 操控性，+5% 伤害衰减距离。

持续 5 秒，额外击杀增加 5 秒，持续时间上限为 8 秒。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 20 Range but deactivates if you drop to 0 Shield HP (Critical Health).

Buff reactivates 1 second after your Shields HP fully regenerates.
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升 +20 射程。
受到伤害后 5 秒内失去上述增益。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing Void Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill grants 17% | 33% | 50% increased damage for 5 seconds with 1|2|3 Weapon Kills scored within 3.5 seconds of each.

Buff is overwritten every time it is triggered.
descriptions.zh-chs:
击杀后 3.8 秒内换弹：
根据 [?] 秒内的击杀数量，增加 17% | 33% | 50% 伤害，持续 5 秒。

增益可以被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Dealing Melee Damage grants the following for the next 3 shots within 5 seconds:
• 🡅35 Reload Speed and 🡅35 Handling
• 50% increased damage

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 5?.

Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

While on Stasis Subclass:
Barricade is replaced by a Stasis Crystal Wall that lasts 14 seconds. Stasis Wall is made of 4 Medium Crystals and a Small Crystal in the middle.

Applies Rally Barricade Bonuses to players standing behind the middle Crystal for the entire duration, even if destroyed. Overrides Class Ability Cooldown with Towering Barricade's.
descriptions.ko:
시공 하위직업을 장착했을 때:
방벽이 시공 수정으로 변환됩니다.

시공 수정 방벽은 7개 중간 크기 수정으로 이루어져 있으며 중앙은 작은 수정입니다.

시공 수정 방벽은 집결 방벽의 효과를 부여하지만 수정이 3개 이상 파괴되면 기능을 잃게 됩니다.

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Weapons matching your Subclass Element with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Primary Ammo Weapons deal 100% Increased Damage against Stasis Crystals and 50% Increased Damage against Frozen Enemies.

Also applies to Fighting Lion, Revision Zero, Vex Mythoclast, and their alternate fire modes.

Frozen enemies normally receive 5% [50%] decreased damage from Primary Weapons. Using the fragment results in a 42.5% overall Damage Increase in PVE and a 25% overall Decrease in PVP.
Stasis Shards within 15 meters are pulled toward you after a 1 second delay.

Collecting small Shards restores 5 HP, large Shards restore 35? HP.

If at Full Health, the restored HP is instead added as a Stasis Overshield that can have up to 50 HP.

Stasis Shards grant increased Melee Energy:
• Small Shards: 10% 🠚 17.5%
• Large Shards: 50% 🠚 75%

Spawns an Orb of Power on Grenade Kills that grants 0.8%|1.1%|1.25% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

10|5|1 second cooldown between activations.

Weapon Kills grant ability energy based on your subclass' elemental alignment:
• Light Subclass: 5% Grenade Ability Energy
• Dark Subclass: 5% Melee Ability Energy

Grants 🡅35 Handling and 🡅45 Reload Speed while within 15 meters of an ally.

Buff lingers for 1.5 seconds.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 5?.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing extremely close to the barricade also consistently prevents enemy melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Scoring 2 to 3 Solar Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of Solar Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds. Further Solar Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Being Frozen or scoring a Kill with any Solar Grenade grants all 4 Stacks. These do not (reliably) work in PvE for whatever reason.

Slow Stacks and Duration are halved. Damage from Stasis Breakout is removed.

Stasis Breakout creates a burst of Solar Energy, dealing up to 105 damage over a 9 meter radius.

Firing or swinging the weapon grants a Stack of Nadir Focus for 2 seconds. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Benefits at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 2 | 4 | 6 | 8 | 10 Range
• 1.5% | 3% | 4.5% | 6% | 7.5% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• ?% increased Lunge Distance (Swords)
• ?% increased Projectile Velocity (Launchers)

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Increases Stasis Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon dealing Melee damage while an Enemy is within 15 meters:
Grants 500% [100%] increased damage and 100 Handling for the next full burst within 🡅11 seconds.

4 second cooldown after buff expires. Can be activated while stowed.

Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate the perk.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

Kills against Void Debuffed enemies grant a 45 HP Void Overshield for 🡅10 seconds.

🡅 Overshield Duration is increased by 2 seconds.

After Aiming Down Sights for 1.5 seconds without firing, for one shot:
• 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 1 (e.g. 1.5x🠚2.5x)

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active. (This part of the perk is inconsistent and often doesn't get applied)
descriptions.zh-chs:
未射击下瞄准 1.5 秒：
+10% 瞄准辅助衰减距离，并提高下一发子弹精准命中伤害（伤害系数+1）。

按下瞄准键即开始计时。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants less than 4 meters away by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Elemental Pickup Interactions grant 20% [10%] increased damage for 🡅8 seconds.

Additional Pickup Interactions extend the duration by 7 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

Elemental Pickup Interactions:
• Throwing Strand Tangles or Elemental Orbs
• Collecting Firesprites, Ionic Traces, Stasis Shards, or Void Breaches

🡅 Initial buff duration is increased by 1 second.
