After crouching for 2+ seconds before standing up:
Grants ? Handling and 10 Reload Speed for 5 seconds.

Finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill grants 17% | 33% | 50% increased damage for 🡅5.5 seconds with 1|2|3 Weapon Kills scored within 3.5 seconds of each.

Buff is overwritten every time it is triggered.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the Maximum Number of Armor Charge Stacks you can hold from 3 to 4|5|6 with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Weapon Kills grant 2 Stacks of Shot Swap, granting 100? Ready/Stow Handling.

Maximum of 8 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack when readying or stowing the weapon.
Swords are refunded 1 Ammo after every other Powered Kill.
descriptions.zh-chs: 每隔一次的赋能刀剑击杀提供 1 发刀剑弹药。

descriptions.en:
Upon scoring a Kill or hitting every shot in a burst:
Grants 20% increased damage and 10% decreased Charge Time for 2 seconds.

Spawns a Special Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.66% to 1.8%. Average of 57.25 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• Primary Weapons: 3.25x
• Special Weapons: 1.1x
• Exotic Primary Weapons: further 1.3?x on top of the Primary Multiplier (total of 4.225?⁠x)

Rocket-Assisted Sidearms count as Primary Weapons. Eriana's Vow inherits the Exotic Primary Multiplier but is still treated as a Special Weapon.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

Weapon Kills increase damage by 15% for 7 seconds.

Matching Grenade or Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% increased damage for 10 seconds.

The 50% damage Buff's duration can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+15% 伤害，持续 7 秒。

此增益生效期间，相同伤害类型的手雷或近战击杀会 +50% 伤害，并延长持续时间 10 秒。
持续时间仅可被另一种技能击杀刷新。

descriptions.en:
While Super is not charged:
Kills with Weapons matching your Subclass Element grant Energy Siphon for 2 seconds. (Essentially a Cooldown)
Energy Siphon grants 3% [1.45%] Super Energy.

While Super is charged:
Kills with Weapons matching your Subclass Element grant 4 Stacks of Subclass-Matching Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Change this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.

Grants 30 Handling and 40 Reload Speed while within 15 meters of an ally.

Buff lingers for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内有 1 个以上敌人时：
+30 操控性，+40 填装速度。

线性持续 1.5 秒。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing Void Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Grants an extra Melee Ability Charge.

Acts as a copy of the Heavy Handed armor mod.
descriptions.ko: 추가 근접 공격 횟수를 제공합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
获得额外一次近战技能充能。
近战技能数量上限为 2。

descriptions.en: Thrown Grenades travel 25% faster.

On Weapon Kill, for 6 seconds:
37.5% decreased Charge/Draw Time.

Kills while the perk active add 4 seconds to the duration up to a maximum of 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+37.5% 充能/拉弓速度，持续 6 秒。

增益触发时完成击杀，增加 4 秒持续时间，最高 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Weapons matching your Subclass Element 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants Stat Bonuses depending on the number of Charged Abilities.

Stat Bonuses with 1|2|3+ Charged Abilities:
• 5|15|25 Stability
• 5|25|60 Handling
• 10|25|60 Reload Speed

🡅 Stronger Effect.

Grenade Kills grant Volatile Rounds for 11 seconds, making Void Weapons apply Volatile on Hit.

(Volatile explosions do not count as damage originating from your weapon)

Killing Weakened enemies spawns a Void Breach and an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.
Finishers grant Void Invisibility for 5 seconds (7 with Echo of Peristence).
Picking up an Orb of Power or Void Breach grants Devour for 5 seconds (7.5 with Echo of Persistence).

Dealing Ability Damage to a [Major, Boss, or Player](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) target grants 4 Stacks of Subclass-Matching Weapon Surge and highlights the target for 10 seconds each. Weapon Surge duration is not refreshable.

Killing highlighted targets spawns a Subclass-Matching Elemental Pickup.

Elemental Pickups include Firesprites, Ionic Traces, Stasis Shards, Strand Tangles, and Void Breaches.
descriptions.ko:
상시 공중 효율을 20만큼 증가시킵니다.

1초 동안 적 근처에 조준을 하면 5초간 표식을 남깁니다.
표식은 벽을 통해서 볼 수 있습니다.

적의 체력이 30% 이하 일 때:
30%로 부터 남은 체력의 %당 1%의 추가 피해를 받습니다.
(예: 체력 10% -> 20% 피해 증가)

피해 증가는 능력과 무기에 모두 적용됩니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提供 +20 空中效率。

准星悬停在敌人附近 1 秒后，标记敌人 5 秒。
标记穿墙可见。

如果敌人血量低于 30%：
提供低于 30% 对应百分数的伤害提高。
（例如：剩 10% 的血量 -> 伤害增加 20%）

伤害提高适用于所有造成的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Modifies Golden Gun to only fire a single shot that deals 650% increased damage. (~72.1% more damage compared to 3 Precision Hits with Marksman Golden Gun. Also, please only use it with Marksman Golden Gun)

Scoring a Golden Gun Kill refunds 33% Super Energy and causes the enemy to explode, dealing up to 400 [?] damage in a ? meter radius.

Precision Kills grant 1.5-4.5% Super Energy depending on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.ko:
황금 총의 탄환을 1발로 강제합니다.

황금 총의 피해를 500% 증가시키며 황금 총의 공중 효율을 100 만큼 증가시킵니다.
(줄 세우기 x3 보다 37% 더 높습니다)

궁극기 처치 시 33%의 궁극기 에너지를 반환합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
黄金枪每次激活只能开一枪。

黄金枪造成 500% 额外伤害。
（比使用射手黄金枪精确命中 3 次造成的伤害高 37%）。

击杀敌人时返还 33% 的超能能量。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness and Radar remains active while Aiming Down Sights.

Crouching grants Enhanced Radar (6⁠🠚⁠12 sectors)

Hovering your reticle near enemies for 1 second marks them for 5 seconds. Marks are visible through walls.

If an Enemy is below 30% Health:
Increases all outgoing damage against them by 1% for every percentage point below 30%.
(10% HP left 🠚 20% increased damage)

PVE Combatant and Player Shields do not count as Health.
descriptions.ko:
무기를 조준하는 동안에도 레이더가 활성화됩니다.

웅크릴 때:
레이더가 향상됩니다.
(섹터가 6개에서 12개로 증가합니다.)

descriptions.en:
Applies 30 Scorch Stacks (🡅45 [40] with Ember of Ashes) and deals up to 30 damage to enemies within 4? meters of the target on Weapon Kills.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the radius to 8 meters.

Scorch damage can be increased through [Weapon Damage Buffs](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs).

🡅 Applies to 5 more Scorch Stacks to PVE Combatants when Ember of Ashes is equipped.

On Weapon Kill:
Grants 🡅9% Ability Energy split equally amongst all uncharged abilities.

Abilities with multiple charges only receive one third of the ability energy normally split to them once they have a full ability charge ready.

🡅 Ability Energy Gain is increased by 12.5%. (8%🠚9%)

Increases Melee Damage by 100% for 1.22 seconds after hitting a target with all 12 Shotgun Pellets in the spread.

Against [Bosses and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants), this is increased to 150% for the following melee options:
All Unpowered Melees, Combination Blow, Disorienting Blow, Chain Lightning, and Grapple Melee

The following options do not benefit from the perk:
• Hunters: Proximity Explosive Knife's and Snare Bomb's detonations, Tempest Strike, Withering Blade, Threaded Spike
• Titans: Throwing Hammer, Consecration, Thunderclap, Shield Throw, Flechette Storm
• Warlocks: all abilities except Chain Lightning

The buff does not stack with the passive Melee Damage Increase against Frozen non-Boss targets. The [higher buff of the two](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1N_zEcw3-pGL2jGUCGaAHjoKEr_VIbDc7-UWel-DGmys/) takes precedence.

This means that with the exception of Shiver Strike and Howl of the Storm in PVE where the perk's buff is always higher, it will only provide a benefit over Freeze's buff when used against Bosses and Vehicles.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当一发弹药的 12 枚弹片全部命中时：
在 1.22 秒内增加近战伤害。

未充能近战：+100% 伤害。
充能近战：+40% 伤害。

对首领和载具时，再增加 25% 伤害。和上述增伤乘法叠加。

descriptions.en:
Upon picking up Special or Heavy Ammo:
Refills and Overfills the Magazine from reserves.

Overfill amount maxes out at 🡅120% of the Magazine Capacity. Activates even while stowed.

🡅 Maximum overfill amount is increased by 20% (rounds up).

Grants 10 Aim Assist while Aiming Down Sights (ADS) and decreases ADS Movement Speed Penalty by 10%.

🡅 Aim Assist bonus is slightly increased.

Grants the following to Solar Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Scoring a Precision Kill grants 1 Stack of 'Precision Final Blows' up to the maximum of 10 Stacks.

Reloading converts `Precision Final Blows` Stacks into `Magnificent Howl` Stacks.

Each shot consumes 1 Stack of Magnificent Howl, granting 50% increased damage and ?% increased Damage Falloff Distance.

Precision Kills with buffed shots don't consume Stacks.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing extremely close to the barricade also consistently prevents enemy melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with an Arc Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Weapon Kills grant an additional 1% Super Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant an additional 1.5% instead.
descriptions.zh-chs:
 主武器 或  威能武器击杀提供额外 1%  超能充能。
 特殊武器击杀提供额外 1.5% 超能充能。

[PVP] 武器击杀提供额外 1% 超能充能。

descriptions.en:
Grants a Stack of Warlord's Sigil on (Glaive) Melee Kills for 5 seconds, increasing (Glaive) Melee damage.

(Glaive) Melee damage increase at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%

PVE Combatants hit by Penumbral Blast automatically shatter.
descriptions.zh-chs:
近战击杀后获得“督军印记”：
“督军印记”持续 5 秒，提供额外近战伤害，可叠加 5 层。

额外近战伤害：
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%

descriptions.en:
Melee Kills grant Cure x3 and Restoration x1.

Finishers grant Cure x3 and Restoration x2.

Restoration lasts 8 seconds (12 with Ember of Solace) in both cases.
descriptions.ko:
근접 공격 처치 시:
50HP의 체력을 회복하고 초당 30HP를 재생합니다.

8초 동안 지속됩니다.
연장이 가능합니다.

descriptions.en:
Only works with the Solar Element Grenades named Solar Grenade equipped.

Solar Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and last 4 seconds longer (4🠚8s normally, 6🠚10s with Touch of Flame equipped).

Powered Melee Kills grant 5 seconds of Sunbracers Ready. Using your Grenade Ability while Sunbracers Ready is active grants the Sunbracers buff.

'Sunbracers' grants 20,000% Additional Base 'Solar Grenade' Regeneration Rate for 5 seconds. (Effectively recharges ~132% of a 'Solar Grenade' charge per second)

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Stasis Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Weapon Kills grant the following for 🡅6.5 seconds:
• 15 Stability and 20 Recoil Direction
• 15% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 15% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

Stacks 2 times. Cone scalars stack multiplicatively (15%⁠🠚⁠27.75%). Buff remains active while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon readying the weapon within 3 seconds of getting a Kill with a different weapon:
Grants 20% increased damage and 15 Handling for 🡅8 seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Grants 30|50|60 Strength with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with with a Void Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Feeding Frenzy for 3.5 seconds, increasing the Reload Speed of the weapon. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 8 | 50 | 60 | 75 | 100 Reload Speed Stat
• 0.975x | 0.9x | 0.868x | 0.837x | 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
提高装填速度。


持续 3.5 秒，最高叠加 5 层。

descriptions.en:
After sprinting for 3 seconds:
Grants 20 Reload Speed for 3 seconds. Duration can be refreshed by sprinting.

Being Amplified increases the bonus to 60 Reload Speed.

🡅 Buff duration is increased. Even stronger effect while Amplified.
Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against [Minibosses, Bosses, and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对首领和载具的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Void Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

On Orb of Power Pickups:
Grants 5%|7.5%|10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants the following to Stasis Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Daybreak Projectiles deal 90% increased damage and apply 30 Scorch on hit (40 with Ember of Ashes).

(Daybreak Projectiles can often hit twice for double damage and double Scorch)

Scorch (from all sources) deals 200% [50%] increased damage and each Damage Tick grants 5% Melee Ability Energy.
descriptions.ko:
여명 투사체 적중 시 적에게 소각 스택 60개를 부여합니다. 재의 불씨를 장착하면 스택이 90개로 증가합니다.

소각 피해는 200% [50%] 만큼 증가합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
黎明射弹命中时会造成 60 层灼烧。
如果装备了骨灰余烬，会提升到 90 层。

灼烧会对敌人造成 200% [50%] 额外伤害。

当灼烧造成伤害时，会获得 [?] 近战能量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns 2 Threadlings upon destroying a Tangle.

Threadlings apply Unravel for [?] [5] seconds on hit. This is increased to [?] [7.5] seconds with Thread of Continuity equipped.

1 second after stowing Stasis Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Melee Hits grant the following for 5.5 seconds:
• 50 Airborne Effectiveness
• ? Mobility
• ?% increased Jump Height
+ Refills the Magazine of your held weapon from reserves

Powered Melee Hits refill the Magazines of all your equipped weapons.

7 second cooldown between activations.

1 second after stowing Strand Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with an Arc or Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Void Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles and Two-Tailed Fox do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload and will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.

Holding [Grenade] summons a Sentient Arc Soul for 20 seconds and makes you Amplified.

Sentient Arc Soul grants 5% Grenade Energy once per burst if it damages an enemy.
descriptions.ko:
전기 수류탄을 충전하고 먹으면 20초 동안 강력한 전기 영혼을 소환합니다.

강력한 전기 영혼은 29미터 이내의 적을 자동으로 공격하며 11 피해를 주는 볼트를 6연발로 발사합니다.

전기 영혼이 적중하면 4.5%의 수류탄 에너지를 반환받습니다.

전기 영혼 균열에 들어가면 지속 시간이 초기화되며 모든 전기 영혼이 강력한 버전으로 바뀝니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
按住[手雷]键召唤一个有电弧之魂，持续 20 秒，并使你进入增幅状态。

电弧之魂每次连射如果对敌人造成，会提供 4.5% 的手雷能量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Solar or Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The upper 50% of the Magazine has up to 20 Stability and 30 Reload Speed.

The benefits decrease linearly as the Magazine approaches 50% capacity.
descriptions.zh-chs: 此武器的前半弹匣弹药获得 +20 稳定性，+30 填装速度。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Hits against Orbs of Power collect them.

If collecting ammo is possible:
Weapon Hits against Ammo Bricks pick them up, trigger Ammo Pickup Effects, and refill all Weapons from reserves.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Range.

Aiming Down Sights grants 10% increased Effective Zoom and 5% faster Projectile Speed.

The Effective Zoom increase pushes out Aim Assist Falloff by 10%, reduces Recoil by 10% and narrows the Accuracy and Aim Assist Cones by the same amount. (This is the normal behavior of Zoom and isn't unique to Rangefinder)
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准时：
+10% 有效焦距 +5% 弹头速度。

descriptions.en:
Precision Kills cause targets to explode, dealing up to 123.89 [95.3] elemental damage in a 4.5 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
descriptions.zh-chs:
造成精准击杀时：
目标将爆炸，在 3 米范围内造成 65 点与武器元素类型相同的伤害。

对战斗人员将乘以 1.3 倍的伤害系数，之后再计算战斗人员阶级相关的系数。

descriptions.en:
Taking damage while Guarding with a Sword grants Class Ability Energy:
• 🡅1.56% for every point of Melee damage Blocked
• 🡅1.5% for every point of "other" damage Blocked
• 🡅0.63% for every point of Non-Blocked damage (getting hit from behind)

🡅 Increases Class Ability Energy gains by an additive 0.055%, 0.5%, and 0.125% in that order.

Weapon Kills grants strong projectile tracking for ? seconds. Stacks 4 times.

Dealing damage extends the buff duration.

Upon Blocking a Melee Attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Disorients and Weakens the enemy for 4 seconds, making them receive 20% increased damage.

🡅 Passively grants 10 Ammo Capacity.

Grants 35% Flinch Resistance after 1 second of Aiming Down Sights (ADS) without firing. Remains active until you're no longer ADS.

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准 1 秒后不射击：
-35% 后仰抖动，直到取消瞄准。

按下瞄准键即开始计时。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following while Crouched:
• 50 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• 0.8x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier

Passively grants 30 Inventory Size Stat. (50% more than 1 Reserve Armor Mod)
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
+50 装填速度， 0.8x 填装动画系数， 0.8x 拔枪/收枪动画系数

被动提升备弹容量。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Void Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
Starts linearly increasing Explosive Damage 0.2 seconds after the projectile is fired. Reaches maximum strength after 1.1 seconds at 25%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
距目标 10 米范围外时，每米增加 0.63% 爆炸伤害。

50 米时增加 25% 爆炸伤害。

对属性为 50 爆炸范围的威能榴弹发射器，总计增加 17% 的伤害。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon Kill for 🡅8 seconds:
• 30% increased damage
• 20% longer Firing Delay/Charge Time/Draw Time
• 10 Range

Bows and Shotguns only receive a 20% damage increase.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 7 秒内:
-20% 射速/充能效率

更多信息

🠅 增益持续时间增加到 8 秒。

descriptions.en:
During Winter's Wrath Super:
Shockwave (Heavy Attack) deals 100% increased Shatter damage.

Allies within range of the Shockwave (30 meters) receive the following for 15 [6] seconds:
• 50 HP Stasis Overshield
• 4 Stacks of Stasis Weapon Surge

On Rift Cast with the Frostpulse Aspect equipped:
You and allies within ? meters receive 2 Stacks of Stasis Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds alongside a 50 HP Stasis Overshield that lasts 15 seconds.

Scoring 50% of the Base Magazine Capacity as Precision Hits grants 20% increased damage for 11 seconds.

Stowing or Reloading resets the Precision Hit counter but the buff remains active while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣的一半弹药造成精准伤害后：
+20% 伤害，持续 11 秒。

达到足够精确命中数后可刷新持续时间。

收枪或装填将重置精确命中计数。该特性触发后，收枪也会维持武器的增益效果。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant a stacking Damage Buff until stowing or reloading the weapon. Maximum of 3 stacks.

PVE: 10% | 20% | 30% increased damage
PVP: 5% | 10% | 15% increased damage

🡅 Passively grants 10 Magazine Stat. (Identical to Tactical Mag)

Passively grants 🡅12 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants 🡅32 Airborne Effectiveness per stack for 5 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.

Grounded Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack while airborne kills grant 2 Stacks.

🡅 Grants 2 more Airborne Effectiveness passively and per Stack.

Increases Stasis Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
25% increased damage for 🡅5.5 seconds.

Buff stays active while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Precision Hits grants 1 Stack of Rapid Hit for 2 seconds. Further Precision Hits refresh the duration.

Benefits at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 2|12|14|18|25 Stability
• 5|30|35|42|60 Reload Speed
• 0.99x|0.96x|0.95x|0.945x|0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier

🡅 Stronger Effect.

Successive Hits within 0.2 seconds of each grant a ramping Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits (20% on SMGs). Missing deactivates the buff.

Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the buff [ramps up with each shot](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) once active. Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.

% of the Magazine Capacity as Hits required for each Visual Stack: 12.5%|35.5%|54.5%|74.5%|110.33%

All thresholds are increased by 60% for Submachine Guns, initially triggering at 20% and maxing out at 176.53%.

Damage Buff ramps up from 🡅18.82% [12.55%] to 🡅45% [30%] upon reaching maximum strength.

Assuming no missed shots, it provides roughly a 🡅28.13% [19.02%] [Damage Buff on average](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) after firing 100% of the Magazine.

🡅 Damage Buff is increased by 12.5% [20%].

Grants the following for 5 seconds upon finishing a Reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
• 20 Aim Assist
• ? ADS Handling
• ?% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth
descriptions.zh-chs:
消灭目标后在 6 秒内填装：
+20 瞄准辅助、-20% 瞄准圆锥范围、[?] 瞄准时的操控性，持续 5 秒。

该增益持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
The Sol Invictus buff your receive from Sunspots lasts twice as long (5⁠🠚⁠10 seconds).

Sunspots you create now also benefit allies, granting them the Sol Invictus buff for 10 seconds.

While Aiming Down Sights with Stasis Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

While at/above 50% of the Base Magazine Capacity:
Direct Hits apply 40 Slow Stacks for 4 [1.5] seconds (8 [2] with Whisper of Durance) to enemies within 4 meters.

Only activates once per shot/burst.
descriptions.zh-chs:
前半弹匣直接命中敌人时：
将产生一个冰影爆炸，附近 [?] 米内的敌人获得 50 层减速效果。持续 4 [1.5] 秒。

每次射击仅触发一次效果。
（狼群弹药可触发多次。）

耐久之吟 可将持续时间增加到 8 [2] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Performs a dive to the ground in the direction of your movement input. Not inputting a movement direction results in a vertical downward dive.

Applies Cure x2 to you and allies within 9 meters upon landing.

Grants additional benefits if Heat Rises is active:
Grants you Restoration x2 for 3 seconds instantly upon activation. Deals 100 Damage and applies 40 Scorch Stacks (60 with Ember of Ashes) to enemies within 5 meters upon landing.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a 20% [15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.

Kills with a Weapon matching your Subclass Element grant Restoration x1 to you and allies within 15 meters for 3 seconds  (4.5 with Ember of Solace). 3 second cooldown between activations.

Reviving allies or being revived projects a 15-meter field around the wearer for 10 seconds that grants the wearer and allies inside it the Shielded buff.

Shielded grants a 100 HP Overshield that regenerates in 1 second as long as it remains active after not receiving damage for 2 seconds.

Shielded is removed if the Overshield is destroyed and you cannot regain it by leaving and reentering the field. If the wearer's Overshield is destroyed, the field granting it to allies is removed as well.

Super Kills spawn an Orb of Power for Allies.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.75%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

1.5? second cooldown between Orb spawns.

While Last Guardian Standing or Solo:
20 Range, 20 Stability, 50 Reload Speed, and 10 Aim Assist.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你成为火力战队最后存活的成员或单刷时：

可提高 20 填装速度、 20 稳定性、 10 瞄准辅助和 10 射程。

descriptions.en:
On Grenade Ability Usage:
Changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Kinetic weapons lose their Passive Damage Bonus (10-15%) against PVE Combatants.

Grants the following to Strand Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

After being in Combat for 12 seconds:
Grants 15% increased damage, 100 Handling, and 100 Reload Speed for 7.2 seconds.

Works and can activate while stowed. Dealing and receiving damage refreshes the buff duration.

For Frenzy, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 🡅5 seconds.

🡅 Allowed time between damage exchanges USED TO BE extended by 0.5 seconds. Currently provides no benefit.

Grants the following to Strand Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon Blocking an attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Grats 50% increased damage for 2 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
做出防御动作的 0.5 秒内成功格挡敌人伤害：
+50% 伤害，持续 2 秒。

descriptions.en: Finishing a reload within 5.3? seconds of a Kill grants Cure x2 to you and Cure x1 to allies within 15? meters.

Upon missing multiple times within 2.5 seconds of each without scoring a hit:
Grants +25? Stability for 2.5? seconds.

Misses in a row required:
• Auto Rifle: 10
• Hand Cannon: 4
• Linear Fusion Rifle, Pulse Rifle: unknown

Buff is removed 1? second after scoring a hit.
Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against [Elite, Miniboss, Boss, and Vehicle Combatants](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对强大的战斗人员、首领和载具的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants -200 Blast Radius and 25% decreased damage.

[Non-Boss, Non-Champion Combatants](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) within ? meters of the explosion are disoriented for 4.5 seconds. (Effectively the equivalent of Arc Blind without any of the elemental synergies)

Players near the explosion briefly lose their HUD and have their screen distorted for up to ? seconds. Duration varies depending on the distance from the blast.
descriptions.zh-chs: 榴弹爆炸可产生短暂失明效果。

descriptions.en:
Splits off 50% of the Weapon's Bodyshot damage into an Explosive damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PvE and isn't affected by damage Falloff.

[PvE] Total damage is increased by 15% of the weapon's Bodyshot damage. For crits, the overall increase is roughly equal to 15% divided by the Crit Multiplier.

[PvP] Don't want to talk about it.
descriptions.zh-chs:
将 50% 原伤害量，转换为爆炸伤害，该爆炸伤害提升 30% 伤害量。
引爆延迟和距离相关。

[PVE] 实际增加 15% 命中身体的伤害。 精准伤害的提升量根据武器类型变化。

[PVP] 总伤害量不变（即只有射程上的收益）。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Arc Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier
Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.
Finishing a reload within 5.2 seconds of a Precision Kill reduces Firing Delay by 30% for 6 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在精准击杀后 6 秒内装填：
提高射速（降低 30% 射击间隔），持续 6 秒。
该增益可以被刷新。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon Kill, for 🡅8 seconds:
• 30 Stability
• 45% increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 3-3.5° Precision Aim Angle
• -95%? Accuracy Cone Size
• -95%? Accuracy Cone Growth.

Only applies to hipfiring.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Each shot while holding down the trigger grants:
• 🡅1.25 Stability
• 🡅-6.25% Accuracy Cone Size
• 🡅-12.5% Accuracy Cone Growth

Reaches maximum strength after 🡅8 shots, granting 10 Stability, -50% Accuracy Cone Size, and -100% Accuracy Cone Growth.

🡅 Effect reaches maximum strength 2 shots sooner.
Finishers consume 3 Stacks of Armor Charge and spawn an Orb of Power for allies.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Grants 30|50|60 Resilience with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon dealing damage with all equipped Weapons within 7 seconds of each:
Grants 30% increased damage for 10 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在 [?] 秒内使用所有武器造成伤害后：
提高 35% 该武器伤害，持续 10 秒。

descriptions.en: Scoring a Kill with any Weapon grants 15% increased damage for 7 seconds.

While Aiming Down Sights with Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Energy Weapons are refunded 1 Ammo upon hitting Matching Elemental Shields.

Refills magazine upon breaking a PVP Combatant, Barrier Champion, or Guardian Shield.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破战斗人员、勇士、或守护者的护盾时：重新装填弹匣。

若能量武器与战斗护盾元素类型吻合，击中目标时可重生弹药。

descriptions.en:
Upon blocking damage with the Glaive Shield:
20% increased Projectile Damage for 🡅5 seconds or until no longer blocking.

Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Starts Health Regeneration and restores 65 HP upon reaching 100% Activation Progress with Weapon Kills within 5 seconds of each.

Activation Progress by [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minor Combatants: 33.3%
• Players: 66.6%
• Majors and Bosses: 100%
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器连续击杀 3 名敌人时：
开始生命恢复，恢复总值约为 80。

普通敌人记为 1 个击杀。
守护者记为 2 个击杀。
精英、强大敌人、首领记为 3 个击杀。

可在 [Court's Spreadsheet](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant) 查询敌人分类

连续击杀敌人需在 5 秒内完成。

descriptions.en:
Increases Strand Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants the following benefits while hipfiring:
• 25 Stability and 15 Aim Assist
• 2.7° Larger Precision Aim Angle
• 30% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 20% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• 20% increased Damage Falloff Distance

The Damage Falloff increase does not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.

🡅 Stronger Effect.

Loads 🡅3 Ammo at a time.

🡅 Loads 1 more Ammo at a time.
Refills magazine from reserves on (Glaive) Melee Kills.

While blocking and stationary:
Glaive Projectiles Hits grant 90% increased Weapon Energy.
Refills 1 round into the Magazine from reserves upon blocking damage. 1 second cooldown after activation.

Super Kills spawn an Orb of Power for Allies.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.75%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

1.5? second cooldown between Orb spawns.

When a Class Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Class Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Class Ability Energy refunds.

Class Ability Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine (rounds up) and grants 20 Range and Stability for your next shot within 2.5 seconds.

Only active for the first shot (of the burst).

0.3 second cooldown after activation but can activate multiple times during a slide.
descriptions.zh-chs:
滑行时：
重新装填 15% 弹匣，+20 射程，+30 稳定性，持续 3 秒或直到开枪。
仅第一发子弹有效。

0.3 秒冷却时间，但一次滑行中快速射击可触发多次该特性效果。

descriptions.en:
Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Stasis Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

On Orb of Power Pickups:
Grants 5%|7.5%|10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Equipping multiple Root of Nightmares Weapons grants increased Handling, Reload Speed, as well as increased damage against Tormentors, Lucent Hive, and Enemy Players in their Super.

Nezarec counts as a Tormentor. Ghosts of the Deep bosses count as Lucent Hive.

Bonuses with 2|3 Root of Nightmares weapons:
• 3.33% [?%] | 9.98% [?%] increased damage
• 10 | 20 Handling
• 0 | 20 Reload Speed
• 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Stasis Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Super Kills cause targets to explode, dealing up to ? damage and Suspending targets in a ? meter radius.

Scoring multiple Precision Hits within 2 seconds of each applies Sever to enemies within ? meters of the target.

Further hits are not counted for 4 seconds after an activation.

Activation Progress per Precision Hit:
• Slug Shotguns: 50%
• Bows, Sniper Rifles: 34%
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 25%
• Sidearms: 20%
• Auto Rifles: 15%
• Machine Guns, Pulse Rifles: 12%
• Submachine Guns, Trace Rifles: 10%

Strand Debuffs generally last 50% longer.

Specific increases from Thread of Continuity for debuff sources can be found in their descriptions.

Dealing damage grants Grenade Ability Energy for each damage instance.

Grenade Ability Energy Gains vary depending on the source and the amount of damage dealt. Generally, more damage means more energy.

Orb of Power pickups grant 1 Stack of Explosive Light. Maximum of 6 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack per Shot, granting 100 Blast Radius and increased damage.

Grenade Launchers: 60% increased Explosive damage.

Rocket Launchers: 25% increased Impact and Explosive damage. (No effect on Wolfpack Rounds)
descriptions.zh-chs:
每拾取 1 个能量球获取 1 层爆炸光能，提升伤害并 +100 爆炸范围。

最高叠加 6 层。每次射击消耗 1 层。

榴弹发射器：提升 65% 至 84% 爆炸伤害。总伤害量提升约为 52%。

火箭发射器：提升 25% 冲击伤害和爆炸伤害。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Solar Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

If no enemies are within 15 meters:
Grants 10 Range, 🡅35 Reload Speed, and decreases Accuracy Cone Growth by 🡅7.5?%.

🡅 Grants an additional 5 Reload Speed and further decreases Accuracy Cone Growth by 2.5?%. (5?⁠%🠚7.5?⁠%)

On hit against Minor Combatants:
Grants 1 Stack of Redirection, up to a maximum of 20 Stacks.

On hit against [Major, Boss, or Vehicle](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants, for one shot:
Consumes up to 5 Stacks granting 20% increased damage per Stack consumed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
命中普通敌人时：
获得 1 层转向增益，最高叠加 10 层。

命中精英、次级首领、首领敌人时：
每层增益 +20% 伤害，最高 100%。

当增益层数不高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 1 层增益。
当增益层数高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 5 层增益。

查询 [该表格](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant) 获取敌人分级信息。

descriptions.en:
Scoring a Kill from any source matching the elemental alignment of the weapon grants 20% increased damage for 6 seconds.

Can activate and stay active while stowed.

Light Alignment: Arc, Solar, Void
Darkness Alignment: Stasis, Strand

Grants the following to Void Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Enables hipfiring while in Lift and passively grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness while hipfiring.

Increases Lift Duration to 4 seconds:
• High Lift: 2.6🠚4 (54% increase)
• Strafe Lift: 2.2🠚4 (82% increase)
• Catapult Lift: 1🠚4 (300% increase)
descriptions.ko:
부양 도중 비조준 사격을 할 수 있게 되며 비조준 사격 한정으로 상시 공중 효율을 50 만큼 증가시킵니다.

부양의 지속 시간을 4초로 증가시킵니다.

부양 지속 시간 증가:
높은 부양: 2.6초 -> 4초 (54% 증가)
제어 부양: 2.2초 -> 4초 (82% 증가)
사출 부양: 1초 -> 4초 (300% 증가)

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 40 Airborne Effectiveness, 50 Handling, and a 0.8x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier to Submachine Guns (SMGs).

Grants the following while holding an SMG:
• 25 Mobility
• 6.25% increased Sprint Speed
• 33% increases Slide Distance
• 33% decreased ADS Movement Speed Penalty (25%⁠🠚⁠16.75%)

Refills the Magazine of SMGs 1 second after they are stowed.

Passively increases Sprint Speed by 6.25% and Slide Distance by 33%. Sprinting for 1.5 seconds grants 'Linear Actuators' for 7 seconds.

On Melee Hit with Linear Actuators active:
Applies 'Shocked' debuff to the hit enemy. Shocked enemies chain 220 [50] Arc Damage to targets within 12 meters and spread the 'Shocked' debuff.

Shocked lasts 2 seconds and its duration is refreshed on chains. Shocked Players are immune to further chains for 2 seconds.
descriptions.ko:
1.5초 간 질주 한 이루 7초 동안 선형 구동기가 활성화됩니다.

근접 공격 적중 시:
선형 구동기가 맞은 적에게 2초 동안 충격을 남깁니다. 만약에 다른 적이 20미터 이내에 있을 경우 연쇄 번개가 일어납니다. 충격은 연쇄 번개 발동 이후 초기화됩니다.

약 300% 근접 공격 피해
85 피해. 맞은 이후 2초간 사막행군병의 효과에 면역.

질주 속도 6.25% 증가
슬라이드 거리 33% 증가
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后，获得"线性促动器"，持续 7 秒。

在近战命中时:
"线性促动器"对敌人施加震荡 2 秒，释放一个连锁电弧，当另一个敌人在 20 米范围内时就会连锁。震荡会在连锁时被刷新。

[PVE] [?] 伤害
[PVP] 85 伤害。在震荡状态下对额外的连锁伤害免疫，持续 2 秒。

+6.25% 冲刺速度
+33% 滑行距离

descriptions.en:
Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown after activation.

Class Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing extremely close to the barricade also consistently prevents enemy melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Scoring 4 Precision Hits within 3 seconds of each grants the following for 10 seconds:
• 40? Handling
• 30 Reload Speed
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Activating the buff on an [Elite or Miniboss](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) or stunning a Champion marks them for 30 seconds. Mark duration cannot be refreshed.

Marked enemies are highlighted for allies and take 20% increased damage from them. Damage increase stacks with everything.

Upon marking a target for the first time, Aeon Allies not using Sect of Force receive 33.33% Grenade and Melee Ability Energy per second for 3 seconds.
descriptions.ko:
각 정밀타를 2.5초 이내에 4번 적중하면 6초 동안 영겁의 분노 효과를 얻게 됩니다.

영겁의 분노는 재장전 수치를 10 올려주며 조작성 수치 또한 10을 올려줍니다.

용사 기절, 미니보스 및 보스 처치 시:
30미터 이내에 있는 아군들은 수류탄과 근접 능력 에너지 50%를 받습니다.

추가로 영겁 시리즈를 장착한 아군들은 궁극기 에너지 10%를 받습니다.

효과 발동 사이에 4초의 쿨다운이 있습니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在 2.5 秒内完成 4 次精准攻击会获得“永劫教派武器加速”增益，持续6秒。

“永劫教派武器加速”提供 +10 填装速度（附带 0.8x 填装动画系数），对拔枪/收枪动作 +10 操控性。

在击晕勇士、次级首领或者首领时：
• 30 米范围内的队友获得 50% 的手雷和近战能量。
• 永劫教派队友额外获得 10% 的超量能量。

触发间隔 4 秒。

descriptions.en:
On Matching Elemental Shield Break:
Explosion disorients enemies within 7 meters for 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破属性相匹配的元素护盾时：
爆炸可使 7 米范围内敌人迷失方向，持续 5 秒。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing Kinetic Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
Finishers make you Amplified.
Precision Kills against Blinded enemies release a Blinding explosion, Blinding enemies within 3? meters.

Scoring 2 kills within ? seconds of each while Amplified creates an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Being struck by a Melee Attack grants 75% [50%] increased Melee Damage for your next Melee Attack within 5 seconds.

Buff duration is not refreshable.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with with a Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Passive grants the following benefits:
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness
• 25% increased Blink distance
• 20% decreased Blink cooldown (3.55s⁠🠚⁠2.85s)
• 30% decreased Blink activation delay (1.65s⁠🠚⁠1.15s)
• Removes Super Energy cost of Nova Warp's Dark Blink

Blinking grants 100 Handling for 2 seconds and the Radar remains active during the animation.

Enemies within 10? meters become Volatile when initiating Blink (animation does not need to start).
descriptions.ko:
상시 공중 효율을 30만큼 증가시켜줍니다.

점멸 거리를 25% 증가시킵니다.
점멸 쿨다운을 약 16% 정도 증가시킵니다.

점멸 시:
무기 준비 속도 100 증가와 점멸 이후 레이더가 사라지지 않습니다.

점멸 쿨다운:
2.5초 (기본 3초)
쿨다운 = 4.5초 (기본 5초)
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升 +30 空中效率。

+25% 闪烁距离。
并减少 [?]% 闪烁冷却时间。

当闪烁时：
+100 操控性（对拔枪动作），并且使雷达保持活跃状态。

descriptions.en:
Scoring a Kill from any source matching the elemental alignment of the weapon grants 20% increased damage for 🡅7 seconds.

Can activate and stay active while stowed.

Light Alignment: Arc, Solar, Void
Darkness Alignment: Stasis, Strand

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.
Refills stowed weapon from reserves after 2.5 seconds of stowing it.
descriptions.es:
<Rellena el arma guardada luego de 2.5 segundos

Mejorado: El tiempo de activacion es reducido a 2.3 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs: 武器收起 2.5 秒后重新装填弹匣。

descriptions.en:
Increases Grenade Impact Damage:
• 12.12% Increase on Special Grenade Launchers
• 12.5% Increase on Heavy Grenade Launchers

Due to the ratio of Detonation and Impact Damage being tied to the Blast Radius stat on Grenade Launchers, a lower stat will provide a slightly higher overall damage increase.
descriptions.zh-chs:
+50% 榴弹直击伤害。

因爆炸伤害和直击伤害的比例和榴弹发射器“爆炸范围”属性相关，故尖刺榴弹起作用时，更低的爆炸范围可造成更高的总伤害。

鼠标移动至此处查看细节

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Elemental Pickup Interactions grant 20% [10%] increased damage for 7 seconds.

Additional Pickup Interactions extend the duration by 7 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

Elemental Pickup Interactions:
• Throwing Strand Tangles or Elemental Orbs
• Collecting Firesprites, Ionic Traces, Stasis Shards, or Void Breaches
Grants 4%|5%|6% Class Ability Energy on Orb of Power Pickups with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Elemental Kills grant 1 Stack of Recombination. Maximum of 🡅8 Stacks.

Each Stack additively increases the damage of the next shot by 🡅12.5% [🡅6.25%], up to 100% [50%] at 8 Stacks.

🡅 Damage Buff ramps up 25% faster, reaching maximum strength 2 Stacks sooner.
Grants 30 Magazine Stat. Identical to Extended Mag.

Missing has a chance to refund 1 ammo into the magazine based on the ammo type:
• Primary Weapons: 35%
• Special and Power Weapons: 20%

Rifts and Wells of Radiance you cast grant 100 Reload Speed and a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier to all weapons for you and all allies inside them.

**Empowering** Rifts and Wells of Radiance you cast also double the Damage Falloff Distance of weapons.
descriptions.ko:
빛의 샘이나 균열안에 있을 떄:
안에 있는 수호자의 재장전 속도를 100 만큼 증가시킵니다.

빛의 샘이나 강화의 균열안에 있을 때:
무기의 사거리가 2배로 증가합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当站在裂隙或光焰之井内时：
为所有在内的守护者提供 +100 装填速度，0.9 倍装填动画系数。

当在**强能裂隙**或光焰之井内时：
增加 100% 的伤害衰减距离。

descriptions.en:
Refills held weapon from reserves after sprinting for 1.5 seconds.

Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25% and Slide Distance by 33%.

Prevents Crouch Speed from being decreased below 4 meters per second.

Passively grants 20 Reload Speed.

Refills stowed weapons from reserves upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 6 秒内完成填装：
重新填装 收起的武器。

被动提升 +20 填装速度。

descriptions.en:
Finishing a Reload restores health based on the number of hits scored with the weapon before reloading.

Scoring 100% of the Magazine as hits restores 50 HP. No known upper limit to the total amount.

Glaive Melee hits don't count. Grenade Launcher hits each count as 50% of the Magazine.
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据填装之前完成的命中数恢复生命值。
每次命中可恢复的生命值和武器类型相关。

可恢复生命值为 20 至 80 点。

descriptions.en:
Splits off 50% of the Bow's Bodyshot damage into an Explosive damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PvE.

Detonation time after hitting a target or surface varies on draw and distance.

[PvE] Total damage is increased by ~15% of the weapon's Bodyshot damage. On crits, the overall increase is 10.33% for Precision Bows and 9.69% for Lightweight Bows.

[PvP] Don't want to talk about it.
descriptions.zh-chs:
将 50% 原伤害量，转换为爆炸伤害，该爆炸伤害提升 30% 伤害量。
引爆延迟和距离相关。

[PVE] 实际增加 15% 命中身体的伤害。 精准伤害的提升量根据武器类型变化。

[PVP] 总伤害量不变（即只有射程上的收益）。

descriptions.en:
Scoring 3 Precision Hits within 2 seconds of each refills 1 Ammo into the Magazine from thin air.

Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.
descriptions.zh-chs:
3 次精准命中后，向弹夹内装填 1 枚弹药。
两次精准命中时间间隔不得超过 2 秒。

descriptions.en:
Readying the Sword grants 30% increased damage for 🡅2 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.5? seconds.

Reduces Incoming Void Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Deals increased damage against [Minibosses, Bosses, and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants), as well as Players in their Super Ability.

Damage increase by Ammo Type:
• Primary Weapons: 20% [60%]
• Special Weapons: 15% [20%]
• Heavy Weapons: 10% [20%]

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability or Guard Resistance (Swords).

Upon emptying the Magazine:
Refills 60% of the number of Hits landed (rounded up) into the Magazine from reserves.

Hits are counted from either your last reload or the last time the perk was triggered. Does not require Direct Hits.

Requires firing 28.75% of the Magazine Capacity (rounded up) for the refill to activate.

Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.

Hits after triggering a refill do not count while the Rewind Rounds buff is active (1? second).
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣为空时：
根据命中次数重新装填弹匣。

回弹比例：
主武器 50-60% | 特殊武器 30-40%

descriptions.en:
The next 5 Hits within 🡅9 seconds of using your Class Ability apply Sever to hit targets (even if they are currently immune to damage).

Applying Sever refreshes the buff duration. Activates even while stowed.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1? second.

Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Rampage for 4.5 seconds. Buff remains active while stowed.

Damage increase at 1|2|3 Stacks: 10%|21%|33.1%
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀时:
提高 10% | 21% | 33.1% 伤害，持续 4.5 秒。
击杀可刷新 Buff 时间。

descriptions.en:
Hits against non-Matching Element or Barrier Champion Shields deal increasingly higher damage.

Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.

Damage increase per Weapon Archetype:
• Fusion Rifles: 🡅34.8% per hit, up to 🡅522%
• Machine Guns, Auto/Pulse/Trace Rifles: 🡅40% per hit, up to 🡅600%
• Linear Fusion Rifles: 🡅180% per hit, up to 🡅540%
• Bows, Glaives, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 🡅200% per hit, up to 🡅600%

🡅 The damage buff is increased by 20%. (e.g. 150% 🠚 180%)

Grants Stat Bonuses depending on the number of Charged Abilities.

Stat Bonuses with 1|2|3+ Charged Abilities:
• 5|15|25 Stability
• 5|25|60 Handling
• 10|25|60 Reload Speed
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据完全充能的技能数量提升属性状态。

三个完全充能的技能达到最大效果。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights with Void Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

On Heavy Ammo Pickup:
Grants 🡅35% of your maximum Special Ammo Reserves.

Equipping two Special Weapons halves the amount of ammo granted.

🡅 Increases the amount of Special Ammo received by an additive 10%.

Finishers and Powered Melee Kills trigger a Kinetic Explosion centered on the enemy. 1 second cooldown between activations.

Explosion Damage based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 250 Damage, 10? meter Radius
• Elites: 665 Damage, ?m Radius
• Minibosses and higher: 797 Damage, 15?m Radius

Unknown for Players currently. Listed damage numbers are at the center of the explosion as the damage falls off toward the edge of the radius.

Finishers upgrade the explosion to the one triggered by a Powered Melee on a one rank higher target.

Explosions triggered by Powered Melee Kills (bugged with Finishers) can chain on Kills and will trigger weaker explosions that deal up to 268 damage in a 8? meter radius.

Reduces Incoming Stasis Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Grants 30|50|60 Intellect with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Increases Void Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Killing Frozen or Slowed enemies grants Class Ability Energy based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 9%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 13%
• Enemy Players: 15%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 20%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites: 30%
• T4 Elites, Minibosses: 40%
• Bosses: 50%

Slow you apply to targets and certain lingering abilities last longer.

Specific increases provided by Whisper of Durance can be found in the descriptions of the affected abilities and/or perks.

Freezing targets grants the following benefits for 11 seconds:
• 60 Mobility, Resilience, and Recovery
• 30? Stability
• 15 Aim Assist
• 20 Airborne Effectiveness

Shattering enemies or Crystals creates an additional damage instance, dealing up to 25 [9] damage in a 10 [8] meter radius. Falls off to 17 [4] Damage at the edge of the radius.

This translates to 12.5% [4.5%] total Shatter Damage Increase.

Killing Frozen enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.
Shattering a Stasis Crystal grants 500% [150%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 6 seconds, up to a maximum of 11 seconds.

While at Critical Health:
Being damaged releases a burst of Arc Energy, dealing 50 [?] damage and applying Jolt to enemies within ? meters.

15? second cooldown between activations.

After 1.25 seconds of sprinting and while maintaining both sprint and a movement speed of at least 5 meters per second:
Grants 20 Mobility, Resilience, and Recovery.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a 20% [15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.
This weapon's beam superheats its targets upon impact, causing delayed explosions.

Grants Passive Bonuses based on your selected Subclass:
• Solar: 50 Reload Speed
• Arc: 50 Handling
• Void: 20 Stability
• Strand: 20 Airborne Effectiveness
• Stasis: 20 Recoil Direction & 20% reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据当前的分支职业增加属性：

 +50 填装速度
 +50 操控性
 +20 稳定性
 +20 后座方向，降低 5% 瞄准时移动速度惩罚

descriptions.en:
Missing has a chance to refund 1 ammo into the magazine based on the ammo type:
• Primary Weapons: 35%
• Special and Power Weapons: 20%
descriptions.zh-chs:
子弹未命中时：
主武器有 35% 几率直接向弹匣返还弹药。
特殊武器和重武器有 20% 几率直接向弹匣返还弹药。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant 10% Grenade Ability Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant 20%.

Using your Grenade Ability refills the Magazine with a 3 second cooldown.
descriptions.zh-chs:
 主武器和  重武器击杀可获取 10% 手雷技能能量。
大多数  特殊武器获取 20% 能量。

追踪步枪和榴弹发射器相较其他特殊武器，仅获得一半能量。

使用手雷技能将 重新装填 弹匣。
重新装填效果有 3 秒冷却时间。

descriptions.en:
Precision Hits decrease Draw Time by 25% for 🡅4 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon blocking damage with Glaive Shield:
Decreases Glaive Block's Movement Speed Penalty by ?% for ? seconds, or until you stop blocking.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用偃月阻挡伤害时：
提高敏捷[?]持续 [?] 秒，或直到你停止阻挡。

descriptions.en:
Refills stowed weapon from reserves after 🡅2.3 seconds of stowing it.

🡅 Activation time is reduced by 0.2 seconds.

Reduces Incoming Arc Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

While your Super is uncharged but you have more than 80% Super Energy:
Ability Kills spawn 3 Orbs of Power that each grant 7.14% Super Energy.

LONG cooldown between activations.

Wearing Seasonal Armor decreases the threshold:
0/1x: 80% | 2x: 70% | 3x: 60% | 4/5x: 50%

Enhances the effects of the following Origin Traits and weapons with them are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Dragon's Vengeance (Season of the Wish):
Doubled? Stat Bonuses

Head Rush (Season of the Witch):
Doubled Stat Bonuses: 10 🠚 20 Reload Speed (and Handling?)

Noble Deeds (Season of Defiance):
Doubled Stat Bonuses:
• 30🠚60 Reload Speed and Handling
• Swords: 20🠚40 Charge Rate

Unsated Hunger (Season of the Deep):
Doubled Stat Bonuses:
• 20🠚40 Stability
• 60🠚120 Handling and Reload Speed (yes, 120)
• Swords: 50🠚100 Charge Rate, 40🠚80 Guard Endurance

On Solar Super Cast:
• Grants Radiant to you and Allies within 15 meters for 10 seconds.
• Grants Increased Super Damage based on the number of allies within ? meters (including you).

Super Damage Increases with 1|2|...|6 Allies:
6% | 9.57% | 13.14% | 16.71% | 18.14% | 19.57%

Also increases Weapon Damage from Well of Radiance casters for 5 seconds.
Grants 5% Increased Weapon Damage against enemies that are affected by Strand or Stasis debuffs while you're Radiant.

Grants Radiant for 10 seconds (15 with Ember of Solace) upon scoring multiple Precision Hits within 3 seconds of each, or upon scoring 3 Kills within 1 second of each with Solar Weapons.

Precision Hits required to trigger the perk:
• If Magazine Size is 1: 2 Hits
• Otherwise: 25% of Magazine Size rounded down + 1

While in Arc Staff Super:
• Blocking doesn't consume Super Energy
• Reflected projectiles deal 400% Increased Damage
• Reflecting ? damage generates an Orb of Power for allies that grants 7.14% Super Energy
descriptions.ko:
전기 지팡이 궁극기 사용 중:
반사시킨 투사체는 650%의 피해 증가를 받습니다.

투사체를 반사시키면 아군을 위한 힘의 보주가 생성됩니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在电弧法杖超能状态下：
• 格挡不消耗超能能量。
• 反弹的弹道造成 650% 的额外伤害。
• 反弹弹道可为队友产生能量球。

descriptions.en:
Reloading randomly overfills the Magazine from reserves by 10% to 50% of the base Magazine Capacity (rounded up). Average of a 33% overfill.

🡅 Improves the average overfill amount by 10%. (30%🠚33%)
Weapon Fires Full Auto. Identical to the Gameplay Setting.

1 second after stowing Kinetic Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

1 second after stowing Strand Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

On Weapon Kill:
Grants 8% Ability Energy split equally amongst all uncharged abilities.

Abilities with multiple charges only receive one third of the ability energy normally split to them once they have a full ability charge ready.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用武器击杀时：
获取 8% 的技能能量，平均分配到所有未充能的技能中。

如果你有 3 个以上技能充能完毕， 该 perk 将不会生效。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights with Strand Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Grants Melee Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Melee Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

If no enemies are within 15 meters:
Grants 10 Range, 30 Reload Speed, and decreases Accuracy Cone Growth by 5?%.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Upon landing after using Acrobat's Dodge:
• Allies within ? meters become Radiant
• Deals up to 40 [20] damage to targets over a ? meter radius

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload and will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.

Upon picking up Special or Heavy Ammo:
Refills and Overfills the Magazine from reserves.

Overfill amount maxes out at 100% of the Magazine Capacity. Activates even while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拾取  特殊或  重型弹药：
武器使用备弹过量装填至 200% 弹匣量。

武器收起时也可触发。

descriptions.en:
Powered Sword Hits apply Slow Stacks for 4.25 [1.5] seconds.

Light Attacks apply 40 Slow Stacks, Heavy Attacks apply 60.
descriptions.zh-chs:
充能刀剑命中可让目标减速 4.25 [1.5] 秒。

轻攻击施加 40 减速。
重攻击施加 60 减速。

descriptions.en:
Scoring 2 Precision Multikills generates an Orb of Power at the target's location for allies that grants 3.57% Super Energy.

Finishers spawn Ammo Bricks for allies based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Elites: Special Ammo Brick
• Miniboss or Boss: Heavy Ammo Brick

Spawned Ammo Bricks grant 60% of a Regular Ammo Brick's pickup amount but retain full variability.

Finishing an Elite, Miniboss, or Boss grants ?% Super Energy to Aeon Allies not using Sect of Insight.
descriptions.ko:
빠르게 정밀 처치 2회를 하면 아군을 위한 힘의 보주가 생성됩니다.

엘리트 적을 필살기로 처치하면 아군을 위한 특수 탄약이 생성됩니다.
미니보스를 필살기로 처치하면 아군을 위한 중화기 탄약이 생성됩니다.

추가로 영겁 시리즈를 장착한 아군은 20초 동안 35%의 피해 저항을 받습니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
2 次精准多杀会为队友掉落一个能量球。

终结一个精英敌人会为队友生成一盒特殊弹药。
终结一个次级首领会为队友生成一盒重弹药。

永劫教派同伴额外获得 35% 的伤害增加，持续 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Class Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Weapon Kills at Critical Health heal you to 70 HP.

While your Shields are active:
Taking damage grants 5% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy. 1 second cooldown between activations.

Upon scoring a Powered Arc Melee Kill:
Refunds used Melee Ability Charge and starts Health Regeneration.
descriptions.ko: 전기 근접 능력 처치는 근접 능력을 완전히 채워주고 바로 체력 회복을 발동합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs: 电弧近战技能击杀可恢复生命值并回复全部近战能量。

descriptions.en:
Weighted Throwing Knife gains a second bounce with greatly increased tracking.

Scoring 3 Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds of each grants Strengthened Throwing Knife for 10 seconds.
Additional Precision Hits increase buff duration by 5 seconds each, up to 30 seconds.

Strengthened Throwing Knife:
• Grants 50 Strength while the buff is active
• Deals 200% [100%] Increased Damage
• Stuns Unstoppable Champions
• Buff is consumed on Knife Hit
descriptions.ko:
추 달린 칼이 두번 튕길 수 있으며 막대한 추적 능력을 가집니다.

2.5초안에 정밀타를 3번 적중하면 강화된 칼을 얻습니다.
추가 정밀타는 지속시간을 5초 식 늘려줍니다.

강화된 칼은 200% [100%]의 피해 증가를 받으며 저지 불가 용사를 기절시킬 수 있습니다.

칼을 적중하면 강화된 칼 효과를 소모합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
权衡飞刀可以弹跳两次，跟踪能力大大增强。

在 2.5 秒内完成 3 次精确命中：获得强化权衡飞刀。
每完成一次精确命中，持续时间增加 5 秒，最多可增加到 30 秒。

强化权衡飞刀造成 200% [100%] 额外伤害，并可击晕势不可挡勇士。

命中敌人将消耗强化权衡飞刀。

descriptions.en:
Grants an extra Melee Charge to Solar Subclasses.

All Melee Charges are recharged simultaneously.
(e.g.: both are recharged on Gambler's Dodge)

Throwing Knife Kills increase Throwing Knife Damage by 30%|60%|100% after 1|2|3 Kills for 5 seconds. Class Ability usage refreshes the buff's duration.

Interaction with the Knock 'Em Down Aspect while Radiant:
• Knife Kills restore 1 Charge
• Knife Trick Precision Kills and Direct Ignition Kills in which Knife Trick applies Scorch restore both Charges

On Weapon Kill for 7 seconds:
• 30% increased damage
• 20% longer Firing Delay/Charge Time/Draw Time
• 10 Range

Bows and Shotguns only receive a 20% damage increase.
descriptions.es:
Durante 7 segundos luego de una baja con el arma:

Efectos por Tipo de Arma
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 7 秒内:
-20% 射速/充能效率

更多信息

descriptions.en:
While blocking and stationary:
Glaive Projectiles Hits grant 🡅100% increased Weapon Energy.

🡅 Energy Bonus on Hit is increased by an additive 10%.

1 second after stowing Solar Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Grants the following on Weapon Kills for 🡅5.5 seconds:
• 15% increased damage
• Maximized Movement Speed

Remains active even if stowed.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Ally Deaths grant 40% Damage Resistance in PVE for 15 seconds and 25% Class Ability Energy.

Reviving Allies grants 40% Damage Resistance in PVE for 10 seconds and 100% Class Ability Energy.

Allies at Critical Health within 10 meters receive 25% Damage Resistance in PVE. Aeon Allies who are not using Sect of Vigor additionally receive 15% Class Ability Energy per second. Buff lingers for 1 second once no longer at Critical Health.
descriptions.ko:
아군이 죽으면 25%의 직업 능력 에너지를 얻습니다.
아군을 부활시키면 직업 능력 에너지를 완전히 돌려받습니다.

궁극기를 시전하면 30미터 이내에 있는 아군들을 완전히 회복시킵니다.

추가로 영겁 시리즈를 장착한 아군들은 20초 동안 110HP 짜리 보호막을 얻으며 3초 이후 재생됩니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
队友死亡时你可获得 25% 的职业技能能量。
复活队友时获得完整的职业技能能量。

施放超能能在 30 米范围内完全治愈队友。

永劫教派队友获得 110 点覆盖护盾，持续 20 秒，3 秒后自动回复。

descriptions.en:
Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Class Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Weapon Hits against Orbs of Power collect them.

If collecting ammo is possible:
Weapon Hits against Ammo Bricks pick them up, trigger Ammo Pickup Effects, and refill all Weapons from reserves.
descriptions.zh-chs:
命中弹药盒时：
拾取弹药盒并从备弹中 重新装填 所有武器。

可触发弹药拾取相关特性。仅在可以拾取弹药时触发。

descriptions.en: Grants 60 Guard Resistance, Guard Endurance, and (Guard) Charge Rate on Sword Kills until stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
刀剑击杀时：
提升刀剑充能效率、防御持久、防御效率、防御抗性。
直到收起刀剑。

descriptions.en:
While within 8 meters of 3 Enemies:
40% increased damage that lingers for 1.5 seconds after the condition is no longer met.

Swords only receive a 35% damage increase.

Grenade and Rocket Launchers receive a 35% Explosive Damage increase and a 40% Impact Damage increase. Wolfpack Rounds receive a 35% Explosive Damage increase.
descriptions.zh-chs:
8 米范围内有 3 个以上敌人时：
+40% 伤害。
（刀剑 +35% 伤害）

线性持续 1.5 秒。

descriptions.en:
Collecting Elemental Pickups or destroying Tangles grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge upon reaching 100% Activation Progress.

Activation Progress with 1|2|3 Mods equipped:
• Firesprites,Breaches,Tangles: 50%|50%|100%
• Ionic Traces: 34%|50%|50%
• Stasis Shards: 25%|34%|50%

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13

Grants a scaling buff to Handling and Accuracy as your Shield Health drops below 40 and reaches maximum strength at 0 Shield HP.

Buff at maximum strength grants:
• 30 Handling
• 40% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 17% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

The buff linearly scales from 0% at 80 Shield HP to 100% at 0 Shield HP (Critical Health).

It initially triggers as you drop to 40 Shield HP — giving you 50% of the maximum buff. However, as you regenerate your Shield Health, the buff will still remain until you reach 80 Shield HP where the benefits scale down to zero.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Reduces Incoming AoE Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.
Decreases Ready/Stow Animation Duration by 10%.
descriptions.zh-chs: 获得 0.9x 收枪/拔枪动画系数。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 10 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness per stack for 5 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.

Grounded Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack while airborne kills grant 2 Stacks.
descriptions.es:
Mientras la vida esta baja:
Hasta +60 de Eficacia en el Aire

El efecto aumenta linealmente mientras la vida disminuye. Efecto maximo cuando la vida esta en estado critico

Otorga +10 de Eficacia en el Aire de forma pasiva

Mejorado: Otorga hasta +70 de Eficacia en el Aire. Otorga +12 de Eficacia en el Aire de forma pasiva
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用武器完成击杀时：
+30 空中效率，持续 [?] 秒。
该增益最多可叠加两层。空中击杀直接获取两层增益。

被动提升 +10 空中效率

descriptions.en: Restores 67 HP on Class Ability Usage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
闪身时：
恢复 67 生命值。

descriptions.en:
Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown after activation.

Class Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Upon dealing damage with all equipped Weapons within 7 seconds of each:
Grants 30% increased damage for 🡅11 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

After scoring a kill or multiple Precision Hits within 5 seconds of each with a different weapon:
Grants the 'Cascade Point Ready' buff for 5 seconds.

Readying the weapon while Cascade Point Ready is active reduces Firing Delay for 2.5 seconds.

Firing Delay is reduced by 30% on SMGs and Machine Guns and by 40% on other archetypes.

Activation progress on Precision Hits:
• Bows, Linear Fusion/Sniper Rifles, Shotguns: 50%
• Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Scout Rifles: 17.5%
• Auto/Trace/Pulse Rifles, SMGs, Machine Guns: 8%

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
• Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
• Sidearms: 12
• SMGs: 13

Grants linearly scaling benefits as the Magazine drops from 50% of its base capacity to empty:
• 🡅15% to 🡅30% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 0 to 30? Stability

🡅 Accuracy benefit is increased by 20%. (25%⁠🠚⁠30%)

Spawns a Special Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.66% to 1.8%. Average of 57.25 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• Primary Weapons: 3.25x
• Special Weapons: 1.1x
• Exotic Primary Weapons: further 1.3?x on top of the Primary Multiplier (total of 4.225?⁠x)

Rocket-Assisted Sidearms count as Primary Weapons. Eriana's Vow inherits the Exotic Primary Multiplier but is still treated as a Special Weapon.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

1 second after stowing Solar Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
Maximum Radar Distance is increased by 8 meters.
Grants 10%|13%|15% Ability Energy to the least-charged Ability on Orb of Power pickups.
Increases Impact Damage by 10%, resulting in a 2.2% total damage increase.
descriptions.zh-chs: 直接命中的冲击伤害 +10%，总伤害等效增加约 2.2%。

descriptions.en:
Upon finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Overfills Magazine from reserves based on the amount of Kills scored within 🡅8 seconds of each.

Overfill amount maxes out at 150% of the Magazine Capacity. Always rounds up.

Overfill amount per Kill scored:
• Primary Weapons: 20%
• Special and Power Weapons: 10%.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed. Allowed time between Kills is increased by 1 second.

1 second after stowing Arc Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

While blocking and stationary:
Glaive Projectiles Hits grant 90% increased Weapon Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
保持不动举起护盾时：
远程命中可提供额外 50%(?) 武器能量。

descriptions.en:
Grants Volatile Rounds for 10 [3] seconds upon exiting Void Invisibility, making hits with Void Weapons apply Volatile.

On Finishers while affected by Void Invisibility:
• Grants a 35% Weapon Damage Buff for 6 seconds
• Grants you and allies within 24 meters the Reserve Overshield buff

Reserve Overshield:
• Grants 500% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate
• Consumed on Class Abiliy usage, granting the user a 40 HP Void Overshield for 10 seconds

(Letting the timer run out with Echo of Persistence equipped will not grant you Volatile Rounds. Volatile explosions do not count as damage originating from your weapon.)
descriptions.zh-chs:
在虚空隐身结束后的 6 [3] 秒内，获得 35% [15%] 武器伤害增加。

隐身期间的终结技会在 [?] 米范围内的敌人施加挥发性效果，并使24米范围内的你和盟友获得备用护盾和375%额外的基础职业能力再生速度，直到死亡或使用职业能力。

备用护盾在你施放职业能力时激活，为你提供40 HP的虚空护盾，持续10秒。

descriptions.en:
On Precision Kill:
• Target explodes, dealing 104 [80] Solar damage in a 4 meter radius
• Grants 50 Reload Speed for 6 seconds

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准击杀时：
目标将爆炸，在 3 米范围内造成 80 点火元素伤害， 6 秒内 +50 填装速度。

对战斗人员将乘以 1.3 倍的伤害系数，之后再计算战斗人员等级相关的系数。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Weapons of Sorrow: Thorn, Osteo Striga, Touch of Malice, and Necrochasm.

Melee Hits apply Necrotic Poison (Poison for short). Poisoned enemies spread Poison on death in a 5 meter radius.

Kills with the following also spread Poison:
• Thorn's Bullets
• Osteo Striga's Poison Effect
• Touch of Malice's Blight's Poison Effect
• Necrochasm's Poison and Cursed Thrall Explosions

Poison ticks every 0.517 [0.7] seconds for a total of 19 [?] ticks over 9.3 [?] seconds. Deals a total of 1361 [?] damage over the entire duration.

Poison's first tick deals 32.35 [5?] damage.

In PvE, the damage of Poison ramps up every tick with the damage increases compounding together:
• 2nd-14th ticks each deal 3.5585 more damage compared to the one before
• 15th tick deals 9.705 more damage than the 14th
• 16th-19th ticks each deal 14.234 more damage than the one before

Weapon Hits grant stacks of Enlightened Action for 2 seconds. Stacks 12 times.

Stat bonuses at 1|2|…|12 Stacks:
2|7|12|15|20|25|30|35|38|40|45|50 Handling and Reload Speed

Stacks granted per hit by Weapon Type:
• Hand Cannons: 3 Stacks
• Bows: ? Stacks
• Automatic Weapons: 1 Stack

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Weapon matching your Subclass Element.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Reduces Incoming Solar Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with an Arc Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Finishers make enemies within ? meters Volatile.

Killing Volatile enemies spawns a Void Breach.

Killing an enemy while at Critical Health grants a 45 HP Void Overshield for 5 seconds (7.5 with Echo of Persistence).

8 second cooldown between activations.

Passively grants:
• 35% increased Projectile Velocity
• 🡅25 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier to Rocket Launchers
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier to Glaives and Grenade Launchers

(Reload Duration Multiplier for Bows and Rocket-Assisted Sidearms is unknown but it's likely one of the listed values)

🡅 Reload Speed Bonus is increased by 5.

While Aiming Down Sights with Void Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Scoring multiple Direct Hits against a target within 3 seconds of each emits 3 damaging shockwaves from its location at the time of activation.

Shockwaves appear 0.285 seconds after scoring enough Hits and have a 1 second delay between each pulse.

Each shockwave deals up to 120 [20] damage in a 5? meter radius. Shockwaves deal 25% less damage when activated on [Minor and Elite](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) PvE Combatants.

Shockwaves inherit Weapon Damage Buffs, the weapon's passive Kinetic Damage Bonus in PVE (10% on Primary, 15% on Special), and its [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling). They also count as non-direct Hits with the weapon for other interactions.

The perk cannot be retriggered by anyone on a target until 2? seconds after the last shockwave.

Hits Required for Activation:
• Submachine Guns: 14
• Auto Rifles: 12
• Pulse Rifles: 11
• Non-burst Sidearms: 8
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 6
• Sniper Rifles: 3

Grants an extra Skip Grenade Charge.

Skip Grenade drones chase enemies much more aggressively.

Drone Hits grant 4.2% [1.386%] Grenade Ability Energy. (Each drone can hit enemies 2-3 times)

Dealing Melee damage grants 10 Aim Assist and 10 Range for 10 seconds.

Dealing additional Melee damage while the Buff is active extends the duration by 10 seconds, up to 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
造成近战伤害会使此武器在 10 秒内 +10 瞄准辅助、+10 射程。

再次造成近战伤害可延长 10 秒持续时间，最高 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Powered Hits grant 3% increased damage for 3.5 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Buff.

Blocking removes all stacks.

Increases Void Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
• PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
• PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While Crouched:
• 🡅35 Handling and 🡅25 Stability
• -40% Accuracy Cone Size
• -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
• -80% horizontal Recoil

Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.

🡅 Grants 5 more Handling and Stability.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with with a Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Passively grants 50 Blast Radius.

Rockets attach on impact and detonate after 3 seconds, dealing 25% increased Explosive Damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
火箭弹头粘附在目标上，延迟 3 秒后引爆，+25% 爆炸伤害。
（总伤害提升约为 20%）

被动提升 +50 爆炸范围。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 15 Airborne Effectiveness and 50% Additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Regeneration Rate.

Highlights enemies below 50% HP in a red outline, and Enemy Players with fully-charged Supers in a yellow outline. Highlighting bypasses invisibility.
descriptions.ko:
상시로 공중 효율을 15만큼 증가시킵니다.

체력이 50% 이하인 적들을 붉게 지정시켜주며 궁극기가 준비된 수호자는 노란색으로 지정시켜줍니다.
만약에 적이 은신 상태여도 위의 조건을 만족하면 지정됩니다.

기본 수류탄, 근접 능력, 직업 능력 재생 속도가 50% 증가합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升 +15 空中效率。

以红色轮廓显示低于 50% 生命值的敌人，并以黄色轮廓显示完成超能充能的敌方守护者。
满足这些条件的隐形敌人也会被高亮显示。

+50% 手雷、近战、职业技能充能效率。

descriptions.en:
Void Kills grant Abyssal Extractors for 2.5 seconds.
Maxes out at 20 seconds.

While Abyssal Extractor is active:
300% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate.
200% Additional Base Class and Super Regeneration Rate.

Massively increases Damage Resist during Nova Bomb cast: starts at 99.5% and drops down to 75% near the end.
