Nova Bomb returns ~5% Super Energy on Kills, up to 50% Super Energy.

While on an Arc Subclass:
Arc Ability and Jolt Kills grant Conduction Tines for 7 [4] seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Conduction Tines 1|2|3 grant the following:
• 167.5%|335%|502.5% additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Super Regeneration Rate
• 22%|44%|66% Decreased Passive Super Drain while Stormtrance is active
descriptions.ko:
전기 능력 처치를 하면 7 [4]초 동안 전기 갈래가 활성화됩니다.

전기 갈래 x1 일때
기본 수류탄, 근접 능력, 그리고 궁극기 재생 속도가 175% 증가합니다. | 궁극기 소모 속도 약 [22%] 하락

전기 갈래 x2 일때
기본 수류탄, 근접 능력, 그리고 궁극기 재생 속도가 350% 증가합니다. | 궁극기 소모 속도 약 [44%] 하락

전기 갈래 x3 일때
기본 수류탄, 근접 능력, 그리고 궁극기 재생 속도가 525% 증가합니다. | 궁극기 소모 속도 약 [66%] 하락

궁극기 소모 속도 하락은 혼돈 범위를 제외한 모든 변신형 궁극기에 적용됩니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你使用电弧技能或者震颤击杀敌人时，会获得“导电针”7 [4]秒。

1层“导电针时”
175% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 22% 超能消耗速度降低。

2层“导电针时”
350% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 44% 超能消耗速度降低。

3层“导电针时”
525% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 66% 超能消耗速度降低。

超能消耗速度降低会影响到所有游走型超能，混沌之触除外。

descriptions.en:
Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload and will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.
Increases Super Energy Gains from Melee Kills based on enemy rank.

1 second after stowing a Weapon matching your Subclass Element:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Grants 35% Flinch Resistance after 🡅0.9 seconds of Aiming Down Sights (ADS) without firing. Remains active until you're no longer ADS.

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

🡅 Activation time is reduced by 10%.

While Aiming Down Sights and targeting an Enemy:
Fired Rockets track the targeted enemy. Diminshed effectiveness in PVP.

Tracking persists for 1 second once no longer aiming at the enemy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当瞄准敌人时：
火箭可追踪敌人 [PVP 时追踪效果减弱]

取消瞄准时，追踪效果持续 1 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following benefits for 11 seconds upon reaching Critical Health, or on Ally Death:
• Refills magazine from reserves
• 5 Range and 10 Handling
• Decreases Charge Time by 2.5%

Grants the following for 7 seconds upon readying the weapon within 7? seconds of scoring a kill with a different weapon:
• 0.75?x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
• 25% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness

Weapon Kills while Discord is active fully refill the Magazine of Primary Weapons, and refund 1 Ammo for Special Weapons. (Scoring multiple kills with a single shot/burst still only refunds 1 ammo.)

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

While Aiming Down Sights with Strand Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Grants the following to Void Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Hits have a chance to activate Veist Stinger for 7 seconds, granting the following bonuses:
• Refills 25% of Magazine from reserves on activation
• Decreases ADS Movement Speed Penalty by 10%
• Grants 15% decreased Draw Time to Bows
• Grants ? Charge Rate to Swords

4 second cooldown between activations.

Activation Chance on hits:
• Auto Rifle, Submachine Gun: 2%
• Sidearm: 4%
• Bow, Linear Fusion Rifle, Sniper Rifle: 10%
descriptions.zh-chs:
VEIST 尖刺：
• 使用备弹 重新填装 弹匣，4 秒冷却时间。
• 弓箭 -15% 蓄力时间，持续 6 秒。
• 刀剑加快 [15?]% 充能效率，持续 6 秒。

其他武器类型的触发概率 查看

descriptions.en:
On Enemy Player Kills while at or below 90 HP:
Grants an Enhanced Radar and removes you from passively pinging enemy radars for 10 seconds.

Firing weapons will still ping enemy radars for 2 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
低于 63 点生命值时，守护者使用此武器造成最后一击：
在 10 秒内提供强化雷达，并将你从敌方雷达上移除。

descriptions.en:
Upon scoring multiple hits within 6 seconds of each:
• Refills 10% of the Magazine (rounded up) from thin air. Can be reactivated without a cooldown. Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.
• Grants 40% increased damage against [Constructs and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) for 5 seconds. Additional hits refresh the buff duration.

Number of Hits Required:
• If Magazine Size is 1: 3 Hits
• Otherwise: 2 + 50% (25% on Primary Weapons) of Base Magazine Capacity rounded down

Hits against Constructs and Vehicles provide 1.5x activation progress for Primary weapons and 2x progress for Special weapons.

Pellet Shotguns, Rocket-Assisted Sidearms, and non-Wave Frame Grenade Launchers can trigger the perk twice on initial activations (when the buff isn't active). Note: please don't ask about the specifics of this.

Wave Frame Grenade Launchers:
• Direct Impacts count as 2 Hits
• Doesn't receive bonus activation progress against Constructs and Vehicles

Pellet Shotguns:
• Runs into network-related issues for triggering the perk and granting ammo on non-construct hits
• Only needs one pellet to hit per shot, they aren't considered separate Hits for the purpose of the perk
• Activation progress granted by each shot scales with distance: point-blank shots follow the standard formula but as few as 2 shots can trigger the perk on more distant targets
All Armor Charge sources grant an additional Stack.
Finishers consume 3 Stacks of Armor Charge and generate a Special Ammo Brick for you and allies.

Finisher consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant Melee Ability Energy.

Energy Gains with 3|4|5|6 Stacks Consumed:
70% | 80% | 90% | 100%

Finishers consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant a 45 HP Void Overshield.

Overshield lasts 8|10|12|14 seconds with 3|4|5|6 Stacks of Armor Charge consumed.
Finishers consume 1 Stack of Armor Charge to fully restore Health and Shields.
Finishers consume 1 Stack of Armor Charge and refill all your weapons from reserves.

Finisher consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant Grenade Ability Energy.

Energy Gains with 3|4|5|6 Stacks Consumed:
70% | 80% | 90% | 100%

Upon finishing a reload, for 6 seconds:
Grants 40 Handling and 20% Flinch Resistance.

Cannot be refreshed. Persists while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成填装时：
在 6 秒内为此武器提供额外 40 操控性、 20% 后仰抖动抗性。

持续时间无法被刷新。收起武器时仍然有效。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability Usage applies Misdirection to enemies within 22 meters.

Misdirection:
• Deals ~0 damage but counts as a Hit
• PVE: Disorients Minors and Elites for 5 seconds
• PVP: briefly distorts audio, Disorients, and disables Radar for 5 seconds
descriptions.ko:
회피 직후:
22미터 이내에 있는 적에게 잘못된 방향을 부여합니다.

잘못된 방향이 부하들과 리더들을 5초 간 혼란에 빠트립니다.

잘못된 방향이 오디오를 일그러트리고, 레이더를 5초간 제거하며, 아주 잠깐 동안 실명에 빠트립니다.

잘못된 방향이 부여될 때 1 피해를 입힙니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
躲闪时：
向 22 米范围内的敌人施加迷惑。

迷惑的效果：
• 使普通和精英敌人混乱5秒。
• 扭曲声音并在 5 秒内移除雷达，并短暂致盲。

迷惑不会造成伤害。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability Usage while within 15 meters of an enemy grants Grenade, Melee, Class Ability, and Super Energy.

Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods Equipped:
• Ability Energy: 4% [2%] | 6% [3%] | 7% [3.5%]
• Super Energy: 2% [1%] | 3% [1.5%] | 4% [2%]

After dealing Non-Precision Weapon damage:
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 0.1175
• 10 Aim Assist

Buff lasts 0.55 seconds. Dealing additional Non-Precision damage refreshes the timer.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grants 30|50|60 Mobility with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Orbs of Power grant an additional 2% Super Energy.

Picking up an Orb of Power with a charged Super Ability grants an Overcharge Stack. Maximum of 4 Stacks, consumed on Super cast.

Casting your Super while at 1|2|3|4 Stacks consumes all stack and grants the following benefits:
• 27.3%|54.6%|62.3%|70% Increased Super Damage
• Restores 125|170|190|200 HP
• 100 HP Overshield for 16 seconds if Cast at 4 Stacks

Scoring Weapon Hits against 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each grants 35% increased damage for 10 seconds.  Does not require Direct Hits.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
3 秒内命中 3 个不同目标：
+35% 伤害，持续 10 秒。

该增益无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Grants 1|2 Stacks while within 15 meters of 1|2+ enemies.

Bonuses at 1|2 Stacks:
• 15|40 Stability
• 18|60 Reload Speed
• 25|100 Handling
• 0.9x|0.81x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs: 15 米内有敌人时，获得以下提升：

descriptions.en: Grants a 200 HP Overshield for the duration of your Finisher Animation.

Weapon or Melee Kills grant a Stacking Damage Buff for 4.5 seconds. Melee Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly.

Damage increase at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器或近战击杀：
4.5 秒内提升伤害。

击杀可刷新持续时间，近战击杀直接获得 5 层增益效果。

descriptions.en:
Gain 1 Ammo after scoring 3 Powered Hits within 2? seconds of each.

🡅 Allowed time between Hits is increased.

Restores 70 HP on Orb of Power Pickups.

Equipping multiple copies provides no benefit.
Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against [Minor Combatants](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对普通敌人的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Grants 20 Handling, 40 Reload Speed, and a 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier while out of Combat. Can activate while stowed.

Swords receive up to a 25% increase to Movement Speed instead.

For One Quiet Moment, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 5 seconds. Kills reduce this to 1.5 seconds until damage is dealt or received.
descriptions.zh-chs: 脱离战斗时获得 40 装填速度。

descriptions.en:
Replaces Grenade Ability with 'Cage of Loyal Moths', grants an extra Grenade Ability Charge. Overrides Base (T3) Grenade Ability cooldown to 73 seconds.

Moth Cage explodes on impact, releasing 2 Loyal Moths that fly to their nearest target.

Loyal Moth variants:
• Arc Moths: slower-flying, offensive role. They seek out targets and detonate on contact, dealing up to 526 [31 to Players, 201 to Objects] damage in a 4 meter radius and Blinding targets. Counts as Arc Grenade Damage.
• Void Moths: faster-flying, support role. They seek out allies and grant them a 22.5 HP Void Overshield on contact.

When no enemies are within ? meters of the detonation area, it spawns 2 Void Moths. When only enemies are around, it spawns 2 Arc Moths.

When both allies and enemies are around, it spawns 1 Arc Moth and 1 Void Moth.

Upon missing multiple times within 2.5 seconds of each without scoring a hit:
Grants +25? Stability for 2.5? seconds.

Misses in a row required:
• Auto Rifle: 10
• Hand Cannon: 4
• Linear Fusion Rifle, Pulse Rifle: unknown

Buff is removed 1? second after scoring a hit.

🡅 Deactivation time after scoring a hit is increased.

Melee Hits with a Smoke Bomb ability charge instantly cast it on the meleed enemy.

Smoke Bombs deal 50% increased damage. Quickfall does not receive this damage increase.

Dealing damage with Smoke Bomb grants Truesight for 3 seconds, allowing you to see enemy outlines through walls from up to 64 meters away.

Grants 500% Additional Base Melee Recharge Rate while you have an undetonated Smoke Bomb on the field.

Void Invisibility prevents the Ability Recharge bonus from applying.
descriptions.ko:
근접 능력이 충전 된 상태에서 근접 공격을 하면 연막탄이 즉시 터집니다.
연막탄의 피해가 150% 증가합니다.

연막안에 들어가면 3초간 트루사이트를 부여하며 벽을 뚫고 64미터 이내의 적들의 위치를 알 수 있습니다.

descriptions.en:
After being in Combat for 12 seconds:
Grants 15% increased damage, 100 Handling, and 100 Reload Speed for 7.2 seconds.

Works and can activate while stowed. Dealing and receiving damage refreshes the buff duration.

For Frenzy, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
持续处于 战斗状态 12 秒后：
+15% 伤害， +50 操控性，+50 填装速度。

持续到脱离战斗，收枪状态也会触发。

descriptions.en: Targets killed with Sunshot explode in Solar energy.

Passively decreases the ADS Animation Duration:
• 50% decrease on Primary Weapons
• 20% decrease on Special Weapons

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grappling grants Woven Mail.

Grants ?% Flinch Resistance while Woven Mail is active.

As the Magazine drops from full to 50% capacity:
Linearly scales down from granting 10 Range and ? Handling to 50% strength.

As the Magazine drops from 50% capacity to empty:
Linearly grants 1.5% to 3% increased damage, reaching maximum strength with the second to last bullet.

Passively grants 30 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier.

Decreases Magazine Size Stat by 30. (Equivalent to the "inverse" of Extended Mag)
descriptions.zh-chs:
+30 填装速度，-10% 装填动画持续时间。

-20 弹匣容量。

descriptions.en:
The next Weapon Kill within 10 seconds of using your Class Ability spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.

10|5|1 second cooldown between activations with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Scoring 2 Hits with Pulse Rifles that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants the Overload Shot buff to your next shot within the next 6 seconds.

Pulse Rifles without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Overload Shots/effects apply Disruption for 6.5 [5] seconds. Applying Disruption stuns Overload Champions and prevents them from regenerating health for the duration of the effect.

Disruption decreases damage dealt by PvE Combatants by 25%. It also decreases Melee, Grenade, and Class Ability regeneration speeds by 40% in PvP.

Sustained fire for 0.6? seconds with Auto Rifles that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants the Overload Shot buff to your next shot within the next 6 seconds.

Auto Rifles without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Overload Shots/effects apply Disruption for 6.5 [5] seconds. Applying Disruption stuns Overload Champions and prevents them from regenerating health for the duration of the effect.

Disruption decreases damage dealt by PvE Combatants by 25%. It also decreases Melee, Grenade, and Class Ability regeneration speeds by 40% in PvP.

Sidearms without an intrinsic Breaker Type are granted Shield-Piercing rounds.

Sidearms without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Shield-Piercing weapons are required to break a Barrier Champion's immunity shield in order to stun them. Damaging their shields also halts their health regeneration for 1.6 seconds.

Additionally, Shield-Piercing weapons can overpenetrate an unlimited number of enemies. They also bypass Hydra Shields, Hobgoblin immunity, (Taken) Phalanx shields, and Scorn Buckler shields.

Titan Barricades receive 30% Increased Damage from Shield-Piercing weapons.

Holding a Full Draw for 1 second with Bows that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants Unstoppable Shots.

Bows without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Unstoppable Shots/effects are required to stun Unstoppable Champions – immobilizing them and removing their passive 70% Damage Resistance for the duration of the stun.

Aiming Down Sights without firing for 1 second with Hand Cannons that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants Unstoppable Shots.

Hand Cannons without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Unstoppable Shots/effects are required to stun Unstoppable Champions – immobilizing them and removing their passive 70% Damage Resistance for the duration of the stun.

Taking 20 damage grants a Stack of Bitterspite. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Reload Buff at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 | 50 Reload Speed Stat
• 0.97x | 0.96x | 0.95x | 0.92x | 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
受到 [20?] 伤害可获得一层苦涩怨恨，最多叠加 5 次。

增加的装填速度与苦涩怨恨叠加的层数相关，当重新装填或收起武器后将失效。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability usage grants Melee Energy.

Melee Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Energy Multipliers based on Class:
Hunters: x1 | Titans: x1.2 | Warlocks: x2

On Super Ability Activation:
• Fully restores Health, Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy
• Grants Cure x3 to Allies within ? meters

Grants 66% Grenade and Melee Ability Energy per second for 8 seconds after your Super ends.
descriptions.ko:
궁극기 발동 시:
체력, 수류탄, 근접 공격, 그리고 직업 능력을 완전히 채웁니다.

약 18미터 이내에 있는 아군들은 알 수 없는 만큼의 직업 능력 재생 속도를 추가로 받습니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
24 米范围内的队友获得额外 25% 的基础职业技能恢复速度。

在施放超能时：
完全恢复生命值，以及手雷、近战、职业技能的能量。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills reduce Pellet Spread by 20% for 🡅8.5 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.
Grenade Kills grant Cure x1.

Firesprite pickups grant Restoration x1 for 2 seconds (3 with Ember of Solace). Extends Restoration's duration by the same amount if it's already active.

Reviving allies grants you and allies within ? meters Restoration x1 for 5 seconds (7.5 with Ember of Solace).

When a Grenade Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Grenade Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Grenade Energy refunds.

Grenade Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Swords are refunded 1 Ammo after every other Powered Kill.

🡅 ?% Chance to be refunded 1 more Ammo.

Class Ability usage grants Grenade Energy.

Grenade Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Sentinel Shield's Forward Movement Speed Penalty while Blocking is reduced to 10%.

Converts incoming damage into Super Energy after Super ends, up to 50% Super Energy.

Blocking Damage with an active Overshield does not count towards the Super Energy Refund.

While Aiming Down Sights:
• Increased Body Shot damage
• 🡅-15%? Auto Aim Cone Size (No effect on Magnetism AKA reticle stickiness)

Body Shot damage increases:
• Auto/Scout Rifle, Bow, Hand Cannon: 20%
• Pulse/Trace Rifle, Sidearm, SMG: 10%

🡅 Reduces Auto Aim penalty by an additive 5%?.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅5.5 seconds:
• 50 Mobility
• 40 Handling and 20 Range
• 5% increased Damage Falloff Distance

Additional Kills extend the duration by 5 seconds, up to 8 seconds.

🡅 Initial Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Powered Melee Kills Grant Unraveling Rounds to your Strand Weapons for 8 [5] seconds.

Threadlings deal increased damage, move 30?% faster, and travel farther.

Damage Increases by [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors and Elites: 53%
• Minibosses and Bosses: 33%
• Enemy Players: 12.5%

Using your Grenade Ability refills your readied weapon from reserves and grants the following stat bonuses for 15 seconds:
• 40? Handling
• 40 Reload Speed
• 0.925x Reload Duration Multiplier
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness

4 second cooldown between Magazine Refills.
Finishers spawn a Threadling.

Killing Suspensded enemies grants Class Ability Energy based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 10%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 12%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites, Players: 15%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 30%

1? second cooldown between activations.

Dealing damage with Tangles grants Melee Energy per damage instance based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 10%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 18%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 20%
• Players: 25%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

Scoring Strand Weapon Kills spawns Threadlings upon reaching 100% Activation Progress.

Activation Progress gained and Threadling Count vary based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 34% Activation Progress | 1 Threadling
• Elites: 67% | 2
• Minibosses and Bosses: 100% | 3

Weapon Kills while you have Woven Mail spawn a Tangle at the target's location.

Shares the 12 second global Tangle creation cooldown.
Orb of Power Pickups grant Woven Mail for 10 seconds.

Killing Suspended enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Fusion Rifles and Linear Fusion Rifles.

Fusion Rifle and Linear Fusion Rifle Kills grant Radiant for 7.5 seconds.

Air Dodges refill all equipped weapons from reserves. Air Dodges include both Icarus Dash and Weavewalk.

Finishing a reload within 5.3? seconds of a Kill grants Cure x2 to you and Cure x1 to allies within 15? meters.

🡅 Allowed time before reloading is increased.

Thundercrash deals 100% increased damage.

On Thundercrash Deactivation:
Grants a 100 HP Overshield for 7 seconds.
Overshield duration scales with Thundercrash distance, up to 20 seconds.
descriptions.ko:
천둥충돌의 피해가 100% 증가합니다.

천둥충돌 사용 직후:
7초 동안 100HP 짜리 보호막을 얻습니다.
보호막의 지속시간은 천둥충돌 시전 시 날아간 거리에 비례하며 최대 20초 까지 가능합니다.
descriptions.zh-chs:
雷霆冲击提升 100% 伤害。

当雷霆冲击释放完成时：
在 7 秒内获得 100 生命值的覆盖护盾。
覆盖护盾持续时间会根据雷霆冲击释放距离而延长，最高为 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Strand Weapons 1 second after readying them:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Refills 🡅20% of the Magazine from reserves on Weapon Kills.

🡅 Refill amount is increased by an additive 10%. (3% on Submachine Guns and Auto Rifles)

Reduces Arc Staff's Passive Super Drain by 30%.

Can deactivate Arc Staff at any time to preserve ?% of unused Super Energy.

On Arc Staff deactivation:
Blinds enemies within ? meters and grants 4 Stacks of Arc Weapon Surge for 21 [16] seconds.

Passively grants 30 Magazine stat. (Identical to Extended Mag)

Kills refill the magazine while Last Guardian Standing. Does not activate when playing solo.
descriptions.zh-chs:
如果你是火力战队中唯一生还的成员：
每次最后一击都会刷新弹匣。

被动提升 +30 弹夹容量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Solar Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon in Arc, Solar, and Void modes to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating combatants in the Throne World, PsiOps Battlegrounds, or the "Vox Obscura" Exotic quest will unlock these objectives faster. Defeating Champions provides bonus progress to all 3 objectives.

Multiple Weapon Kills within ? seconds of each spawn a Dawning Gift for you and allies, which remais on the ground for 10 seconds.

Picking up Dawning Gifts grants 10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy, restores 22 HP, and starts Health Regeneration.

Activation progress on Kills by [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors and Guardians: 16.66%
• Majors and Bosses: 50%

Class Ability Usage while within 15 meters of an enemy grants Grenade, Melee, Class Ability, and Super Energy.

Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods Equipped:
• Ability Energy: 4% [2%] | 6% [3%] | 7% [3.5%]
• Super Energy: 2% [1%] | 3% [1.5%] | 4% [2%]

Weapon fires Full Auto. (Identical to the setting)

Decreases Firing Delay by 10% on Shotguns.
descriptions.zh-chs:
扣住扳机时将以全自动模式进行射击。

使用霰弹枪时会提高 10% 射速。

descriptions.en:
Taking any damage while Guarding increases Lunge Distance by 80% for 1 second.
Deactivates after 1 swing.

Guarding while being shot at by or receiving Healing Effects (inlcuding the Restoration Buff) from allies also activates the perk currently.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Taking any damage while Guarding increases Lunge Distance by 80% for 1 second.
Deactivates after 1 swing.

Guarding while being shot at by or receiving Healing Effects (inlcuding the Restoration Buff) from allies also activates the perk currently.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Currently bugged and does not work with Swords.

Weapon Kills increase damage by 15% for 7 seconds.

Matching Grenade or Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% increased damage for 10 seconds.

The 50% damage Buff's duration can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.

🡅 The 15% Buff is refreshed to 8 seconds if a weapon kill is made while it is active.

Applies 30 Scorch Stacks (40 with Ember of Ashes) and deals up to 30 damage to enemies within 4? meters of the target on Weapon Kills.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the radius to 8 meters.

Scorch damage can be increased through [Weapon Damage Buffs](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs).
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
对 [?] 米范围内的敌人造成 30 层灼烧效果。
骨灰余烬会将灼烧效果增加到 40 层。

击杀强大的战斗人员或敌方守护者可将范围增加到 8 米。

灼烧伤害可以因武器特性、敌人负面效果、战斗人员阶级而增加。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing Arc Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
